Key.Original:
%2Raider 1%1 - Lead element.
%2Raider 2%1 - Supporting team.
%3Keystone%1 - Group 14 Operative.

Watchtower - CTRG Headquarters.
Kingfish 1 - Boat Extraction.
Angel 1-3 - Supporting helicopter.
Key.Chinese:
%2"突襲者1"%1-領導小隊。
%2"突襲者2"%1-支援小隊。
%3"基石"%1-14分隊隊長。

"守望塔"-戰研小組指揮部。
"王魚1"-撤離船。
"天使1-3"-支援直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%2"突袭者1"%1-指挥分队。
%2"突袭者2"%1-支援小组。
%3"基石"%1-第14大队干员。

"守望塔"-战研大队指挥部。
"王鱼1"-撤离船。
"天使1-3"-支援直升机。

Container.name: y25_boats
Container.situation: player's team exfiltrated.

Key.Original: Raider 1 to Watchtower. On boat leaving Balavu. Over.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"呼叫"守望塔"。正在搭船離開巴拉武中。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"呼叫"守望塔"。正在搭船离开巴拉武中。完毕。

Key.Original: Knew you could handle it, Raider 1, outstanding.
Key.Chinese: 就知道你們能做到，"突襲者1"，幹的好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就知道你们能做到，"突袭者1"，干的好。

Key.Original: Angel 1-3's in the fold. No casualties. Standby, we're sourcing maritime escort from local CIVPOL. Out.
Key.Chinese: "天使1-3"也成功返航了。並無傷亡。請等待，我們正在調度當地的海巡單位前往護送你們。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "天使1-3"也成功返航了。并无伤亡。请等待，我们正在调度当地的海巡单位前往护送你们。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Escort %2Miller%1 from the island.
Key.Chinese: 護送%2米勒%1離開這個小島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 护送%2米勒%1离开这个小岛。

Key.Original: Extract by Boat
Key.Chinese: 使用船隻撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用船只撤离

Key.Original: EVAC
Key.Chinese: 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离

Key.Original: Find one of the boats near %2Katkoula%1, %3Lalai%1 or %4insertion boats%1 and leave the island.
Key.Chinese: 在%2卡特科拉%1或%3萊萊%1的附近尋找船隻，或是回去搭乘當初用來%4潛入用的小船%1也可以。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%2卡特科拉%1或%3莱莱%1的附近寻找船只，或是回去搭乘当初用来%4潜入用的小船%1也可以。

Key.Original: 1. Extract %2Keystone%1.
Despite multiple problems with extraction, you were able to escape from the island in a boat.
Key.Chinese: 儘管在撤離途中遇上了許多麻煩，但你們仍成功的搭上撤離船並離開這個島嶼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管在撤离途中遇上了许多麻烦，但你们仍成功的搭上撤离船并离开这个岛屿。

Container.name: y2_grimmCovering
Container.situation: player at lz, providing cover.

Key.Original: You're covered, move! I'll follow!
Key.Chinese: 我掩護你了，快走!我會跟上!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我掩护你了，快走！我会跟上！

Container.name: y1_warning
Container.situation: player at lz, syndikat interdict raider teams.

Key.Original: Weapons up, Raider 2. LZ's open and could be hot.
Key.Chinese: 提高警覺，"突襲者2"。降落點很空曠且有可能會有危險。
Key.Chinesesimp: 提高警觉，"突袭者2"。降落点很空旷且有可能会有危险。

Container.name: y19_splash
Container.situation: new instructions for team on groud.

Key.Original: Roger, Watchtower, we can improvise - out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"守望塔"，我們可以做到的-通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"守望塔"，我们可以做到的—通话完毕。

Key.Original: Sergeant Grimm, this is Watchtower.
Key.Chinese: 格里姆中士，這裡是"守望塔"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 格里姆中士，这里是"守望塔"。

Key.Original: Listen, we're going to see if we can un-fuck the situation for you.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，我們正在想辦法解救你們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，我们正在想办法解救你们。

Key.Original: Satellite intel confirms there are multiple means of egress at Katkoula and Lalai.
Key.Chinese: 據衛星情報指出在卡特坷拉與萊萊皆有逃脫機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据卫星情报指出在卡特科拉与莱莱皆有逃脱机会。

Key.Original: Rigid-hulled inflatables and motorboats. Considering your skillset, you shouldn't have trouble stealing one.
Key.Chinese: 有硬殼充氣快艇可以搭乘。考慮到你們的技巧，偷一臺對你們來說應該不會太難。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有硬壳充气快艇可以搭乘。考虑到你们的技巧，偷一艘对你们来说应该不会太难。

Key.Original: Syndikat are active at both locations however, so exercise caution. Avoid contact.
Key.Chinese: 辛迪加在這兩片區域皆有活動，提高警覺。避免交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加在这两片区域皆有活动，提高警觉。避免交战。

Key.Original: Don't forget your infil either, those landing craft are right where you left them.
Key.Chinese: 也別忘了你們還有潛入時搭的船隻，他們還留在你們丟下他們的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 也别忘了你们还有潜入时搭的船只，他们还留在你们丢下他们的地方。

Key.Original: Additional EVAC options are off the table. I'm sorry, but we've got to call force closure.
Key.Chinese: 所有撤離選項皆以報告完畢。我很抱歉，但我們的無線電通訊必須中斷了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 除此之外的撤离选项都不可用。我很抱歉，但我们的无线电通信必须中断了。

Container.name: y17_strike
Container.situation: player running away from lz.

Key.Original: Grimm, you catch that?
Key.Chinese: 格里姆，你有聽到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 格里姆，你有听到吗？

Key.Original: Better clear out, artillery's inbound - you're the new actual. Command's working on a gameplan; update in five.
Key.Chinese: 你最好趕快閃了，火炮即將抵達-我命你為新隊長。負責指揮剩下的人員;祝好運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你最好赶快撤，火炮即将抵达—我命你为新队长。负责指挥剩下的人员;祝好运。

Container.name: y10_moveBack
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Knox;EXC B Watchtower;
Container.situation: helicopter leaves without all on board.

Key.Original: Jesus Christ!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的！

Key.Original: Keystone and majority Raider elements RTB on Angel, minus figures three, I say again, we are minus figures three!
Key.Chinese: "基石"與大多數的突襲者成員皆已搭上天使開始返回中，尚有人員未登機，我重複一遍，我們尚有人員未登機!
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"与大多数的突袭者成员皆已搭上天使开始返回中，尚有人员未登机，我重复一遍，我们尚有人员未登机！

Key.Original: Requesting permission to put down and re-engage, how copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: 請求允許讓我們重新著陸並交戰，有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求允许让我们重新着陆并交战，有收到吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Raider 1, what's your status?
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，回報你們的狀況?
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，回报你们的状况？

Key.Original: Copy, Raider 1. Negative. Primary task has precedence. Allocate TACON - we'll send ordnance to on-call target. ETA one mike.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"突襲者1"。否定請求。請繼續遵循主要目標。分配戰術資源中-我們會送幾發彈藥到請求的地點上。預計1分鐘後抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"突袭者1"。否定请求。请继续遵循主要目标。分配战术资源中—我们会送几发弹药到请求的地点上。预计1分钟后抵达。

Key.Original:
%1Raider 1%2 - Your team.
%3Raider 2%2 - Lead Element.
Watchtower - CTRG Headquarters.
Key.Chinese:
%1"突襲者1"%2-你的小隊。
%3"突襲者2"%2-領導小隊。
"守望塔"-戰研小組指揮部。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%1"突袭者1"%2-你的小组。
%3"突袭者2"%2-指挥分队。
"守望塔"-战研大队指挥部。

Key.Original:
You will be inserted at %1an LZ%2 north-west of the %3target area%2, to establish blocking position. %4Raider 2%2 will insert to the south and reach %5main objective%2.
Once you establish blocking position, Raider 2 will attemt to capture %6Warlock%2. Once he is in custody, you are to proceed to the %7primary exfil point%2 and await extraction together with Raider 2.
Key.Chinese:
你們將從%3目標區%2的西北方%1降落點%2進入戰區，並在那邊建立起阻擋位置。%4"突襲者2"%2將從南方進入並執行%5主要目標%2。
當你們建立好阻擋位置以後，"突襲者2"會開始試圖逮捕%6"術士"%2。當逮捕行動成功以後，你們就可以前往%7第一撤離點%2與"突襲者2"會合並等待撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp:
你们将从%3目标区%2的西北方%1降落点%2进入战区，并在那边建立起阻滞阵地。%4"突袭者2"%2将从南方进入并执行%5主要目标%2。
当你们建立好阻滞阵地以后，"突袭者2"会开始试图逮捕%6"术士"%2。当逮捕行动成功以后，你们就可以前往%7第一撤离点%2与"突袭者2"会合并等待撤离。

Key.Original: scout
Key.Chinese: 偵察
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察

Key.Original: Search for Raider 2
Key.Chinese: 尋找"突襲者2"
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找"突袭者2"

Key.Original: Find Raider 2 north of Namavuka, at grid %1.
Key.Chinese: 前往那慕瓦卡的北方尋找"突襲者2"，座標為%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往那慕瓦卡的北方寻找"突袭者2"，座标为%1。

Key.Original: default
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: Reach Exfil
Key.Chinese: 抵達撤離點
Key.Chinesesimp: 抵达撤离点

Key.Original: Reach alternative exfiltration point.
Key.Chinese: 抵達備用撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 抵达备用撤离点。

Key.Original:
1. Establish %1Blocking Position%2
2. Wait for capture of %3Warlock%2.
3. Move to %4primary exfil.%2
Key.Chinese:
1. 建立%1阻擋位置%2。
2. 等待成功逮捕到%3"術士"%2。
3. 前往%4第一撤離點。%2
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 建立%1阻挡位置%2。
2. 等待成功逮捕到%3"术士"%2。
3. 前往%4第一撤离点。%2

Key.Original: DEFEND
Key.Chinese: 防守
Key.Chinesesimp: 防守

Key.Original: Defend Yourself
Key.Chinese: 保護你自己
Key.Chinesesimp: 保护你自己

Key.Original: Neutralize all hostiles.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭所有敌人。

Key.Original: DEFEND
Key.Chinese: 防守
Key.Chinesesimp: 防守

Key.Original: Set Up Blocking Position
Key.Chinese: 建立阻擋位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 建立阻挡位置

Key.Original: Establish blocking position to cut off enemy reinforcements.
Key.Chinese: 建立阻擋位置，阻擋任何敵人的增援部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 建立阻挡位置，阻挡任何敌人的增援部队。

Container.name: pre05_Blocking
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Knox;EXC B Grimm;
Container.situation: radio comms, synchronization of actions.

Key.Original: No shit.
Key.Chinese: 我們真強。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们真强。

Key.Original: One, this is Raider 2. Touching down.
Key.Chinese: 1隊，這裡是"突襲者2"。正在著陸中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 1队，这里是"突袭者2"。正在着陆中。

Key.Original: Received - connecting feed now... okay, visual, 5 by 5, wait out.
Key.Chinese: 收到-正在建立起實況...好，看到畫面了，訊號清晰，暫時通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到—正在建立起实况...好，看到画面了，信号清晰，暂时通话完毕。

Container.name: pre04_allDead
Container.situation: all enemies are dead.

Key.Original: Alright, we're good.
Key.Chinese: 好的，大夥做得好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，大伙做得好。

Container.name: pre03_Fire
Container.situation: riker gives proword to open fire.

Key.Original: Execute - go!
Key.Chinese: 預備-開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 预备—开火！

Container.name: pre02_Spooked
Container.situation: the noise from raider 2's helicopter alerts syndikat sentries.

Key.Original: You hear that?
Key.Chinese: 你們聽到了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们听到了吗？

Key.Original: Damn it. They don't seem spooked...?
Key.Chinese: 該死。敵人似乎沒有注意到...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。敌人似乎没有注意到...？

Key.Original: It's Raider 2's little bird.
Key.Chinese: 是"突襲者2"的小鳥直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是"突袭者2"的小鸟直升机。

Key.Original: No. Let's not give them the chance to call it in.
Key.Chinese: 沒有。我們也別留機會給他們了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有。我们也别留机会给他们了。

Container.name: pre01_Orders
Container.situation: raider 1 co-ordinates an attack on sentries at the holding point.

Key.Original: Riker. Stage's set, four targets, ready to fire.
Key.Chinese: 瑞克。有動靜，4名目標，已準備好開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 瑞克。有动静，4名目标，已准备好开火。

Key.Original: Copy that, execute to follow.
Key.Chinese: 收到，等待我的指示。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，等待我的指示。

Container.name: 43_atTruck
Container.situation: grimm meets raider 1 again.

Key.Original: Riker, I cordially invite you to go fuck yourself.
Key.Chinese: 瑞克，他媽的真高興見到你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 瑞克，他妈的真高兴见到你。

Key.Original: Better late than never, Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 我也是，"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我也是，"突袭者2"。

Key.Original: Everyone in!
Key.Chinese: 大家都進來!
Key.Chinesesimp: 大家都进来！

Container.name: 41_R2Found
Container.situation: grimm found raider 2.

Key.Original: I got cutoff. Riker and the others - they're heading to the secondary exfil point
Key.Chinese: 我被迫與他們分開了。瑞克與其他人-他們正在前往第二撤離點
Key.Chinesesimp: 我被迫与他们分开了。瑞克与其他人—他们正在前往第二撤离点

Key.Original: Grimm, what the hell? You're on your own?
Key.Chinese: 格里姆，搞啥阿?怎麼只有你一個人?
Key.Chinesesimp: 格里姆，搞啥啊？怎么只有你一个人？

Key.Original: Amateur hour's over then, huh? No problem - just, uh, you know - try and keep the pace, we ain't stoppin'.
Key.Chinese: 真驚險的一段時間，不是嗎?沒問題的-不過，恩，你知道的-趕快跟上我們的腳步，我們不會停下來休息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别再搞的那么难看了，成吗？没问题的—不过，嗯，你知道的—赶快跟紧，我们不会停下来休息。

Container.name: 39_Report_3
Container.situation: grimm is close to raider 2's position.

Key.Original: Raider 2, I'm approaching, watch your fire.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我正在靠近中，注意你們的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我正在靠近中，注意你们的目标。

Key.Original: Yeah, I hear you, 1-3, wilco with that.
Key.Chinese: 恩，我聽到了，1-3，完整收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，我听到了，1-3，完整收到。

Container.name: 37_Report_1
Container.situation: grimm didn't find raider 2.

Key.Original: Raider 1 Actual, Raider 1-3.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"隊長，這裡是"突襲者1"-3。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"队长，这里是"突袭者1"-3。

Key.Original: I see a lot of dead - but no sign of Raider 2. Can only guess they're following the contigency plan, over.
Key.Chinese: 我這邊見到了許多屍體-但沒有找到"突襲者2"。只能猜他們還在執行備用方案，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这边见到了许多尸体—但没有找到"突袭者2"。只能猜他们还在执行备用方案，完毕。

Key.Original: Riker!
Key.Chinese: 瑞克!
Key.Chinesesimp: 瑞克！

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Salvo's secured transportation, make -
Key.Chinese: 了解了。薩爾沃也找到了載具，請你-
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解了。萨尔沃已经控制车辆，请你-

Key.Original: Grimm, Syndikat - do not attempt to reach us here - you're behind their vector of attack.
Key.Chinese: 格里姆，這裡有辛迪加-不要嘗試來我們這邊-你正在他們的火線之後。
Key.Chinesesimp: 格里姆，这里有辛迪加—不要尝试来我们这边—你正在他们的火线之后。

Key.Original: Proceed to the extraction on foot, use the jungle - we'll RV on the other side. Expedite!
Key.Chinese: 請步行前往撤離點，使用叢林當掩護-我們會前往另一個撤離點。加緊腳步!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请步行前往撤离点，使用丛林当掩护—我们会前往另一个撤离点。加紧脚步！

Container.name: 33_r2response
Container.situation: raider 2 leader responds.

Key.Original: Got it. Hang tough - I'm en route, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。在那邊等我-我正在路上了，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。在那边等我—我正在路上了，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Fuck me dead. That you, Grimm?
Key.Chinese: 嚇死寶寶了。是你嗎，格里姆?
Key.Chinesesimp: 吓死宝宝了。是你吗，格里姆？

Key.Original: Enemy chewed up our comms, we're, uh, just a sec...
Key.Chinese: 敵人干擾了我們的通訊，我們在，恩，稍等下...
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌人干扰了我们的通信，我们在，恩，稍等下...

Key.Original: Namuvaka... you're sure?
Key.Chinese: 那慕瓦卡...你確定嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那慕瓦卡...你确定吗？

Key.Original: North of Namuvaka. Grid 027-058, moving on 059.
Key.Chinese: 那慕瓦卡的北面。座標為027-058，正在向059移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那慕瓦卡的北面。座标为027-058，正在向059移动。

Container.name: 32_CallingRaider2
Container.situation: calling raider 2 via radio.

Key.Original: Raider 2, do you read me? Over.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，你們有聽到我嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，你们有听到我吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Raider 2, Raider 1-3, Knox, what's your position? Over.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，這裡是"突襲者1"-3，諾克斯，你們在哪?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，这里是"突袭者1"-3，诺克斯，你们在哪？完毕。

Container.name: 31_FindRaider2
Container.situation: new tasking for player.

Key.Original: Nothing.
Key.Chinese: 沒動靜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没动静。

Key.Original: Secondary exfil... son of a bitch...
Key.Chinese: 第二撤離點...天殺的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 第二撤离点...天杀的...

Key.Original: Raider 1 to Raider 2 - report in, over...?
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"呼叫"突襲者2"-回答，完畢...?
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"呼叫"突袭者2"-回答，完毕...？

Key.Original: I'll hold here, patch up Truck. If they're alive, they might try and make a pass.
Key.Chinese: 我會守在這裡並照顧"卡車"。假如他們還活著，他們可能會試著前往撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会守在这里并照顾"卡车"。假如他们还活着，他们可能会试着前往撤离点。

Key.Original: Salvo, scope out Rautake, we need a ride. Grimm, search the target zone for Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 薩爾沃，你去偵察下勞塔克，我們需要輛載具。格里姆，你去目標區尋找"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 萨尔沃，你去侦察下劳塔克，我们需要辆载具。格里姆，你去目标区寻找"突袭者2"。

Key.Original: If you find them, bring them back here.
Key.Chinese: 如果你找到他們的話，把他們帶回來這邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你找到他们的话，把他们带回来这边。

Container.name: 14_Recovered
Container.situation: raider 1 recover after ambush.

Key.Original: Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 安全了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 安全了。

Key.Original: Salvo, check on Truck - Grimm - we clear?
Key.Chinese: 薩爾沃，去檢查下"卡車"-格里姆-我們安全了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 萨尔沃，去检查下"卡车"-格里姆—我们安全了吗？

Container.name: 13_LSVs
Container.situation: riker spots csat lsvs on the road.

Key.Original: On the road! LSVs!
Key.Chinese: 注意道路!有輕型突擊車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意道路！有轻型突击车！

Container.name: 12_TruckHit
Container.situation: truck is knocked unconscious by an explosion.

Key.Original: Truck's hit!
Key.Chinese: "卡車"中彈!
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡车"中弹！

Container.name: 10_Attack
Container.situation: riker spots viper.

Key.Original: Pointers on the tree line, 1-5-0 - light them up!
Key.Chinese: 瞄準樹林線，方位1-5-0-幹掉他們!
Key.Chinesesimp: 瞄准树林线，方位1-5-0-干掉他们！

Container.name: 051_LostComms
Container.situation: raider 1 is jammed by viper.

Key.Original: My GPS is out, we're being jammed!
Key.Chinese: 我的GPS沒有畫面了，我們的訊號正在被干擾!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的 GPS 没有画面了，我们被干扰了！

Key.Original: Say again, over.
Key.Chinese: 再說一次，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再说一次，完毕。

Key.Original: Raider 2 - respond.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"-回答。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"-回答。

Key.Original: Fuck - look alive, ready-up for contact!
Key.Chinese: 幹-提高警覺，準備接敵!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操—提高警惕，准备接敌！

Container.name: 01_ArrivedAtBlocking
Container.situation: riker gives orders to his team.

Key.Original: I'm on it.
Key.Chinese: 正在幹了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在干了。

Key.Original: Truck, Salvo - all around defence, make it happen.
Key.Chinese: "卡車"，薩爾沃-在這建立起防線，快準備好。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡车"，萨尔沃—在这建立起防线，快准备好。

Key.Original: Grimm - mine the road, we don't want anything getting through.
Key.Chinese: 格里姆-在道路上鋪設點地雷，我不想要有任何東西能突破我們的防線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 格里姆—在道路上铺设点地雷，我不想要有任何东西能突破我们的防线。

Key.Original: Escort Dragonfly 7
Key.Chinese: 護送"蜻蜓7"
Key.Chinesesimp: 护送"蜻蜓7"

Key.Original: Escort Dragonfly 7 from the %2airfield%1 to %3Lijnhaven%1. They will deliver reinforcements to our units defending the city.
Key.Chinese: 去%2機場%1護送"蜻蜓7"前往%3萊茵哈文%1。他們會運送援軍前往我軍防守的城市。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去%2机场%1护送"蜻蜓7"前往%3莱因哈文%1。他们会运送援军前往我军防守的城市。

Key.Original: Take off
Key.Chinese: 起飛
Key.Chinesesimp: 起飞

Key.Original: Take off from the airport using the designated runway or by increasing your vertical thrust.
Key.Chinese: 從指定的跑道起飛，或是直接原地垂直起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从指定的跑道起飞，或是直接原地垂直起飞。

Key.Original: Return to Base
Key.Chinese: 返回基地
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回基地

Key.Original: RTB and roll to the %2entrance of your hangar%1.
Key.Chinese: 返回基地降落並回到%2你的機堡%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回基地降落并回到%2你的机堡%1。

Key.Original: Rescue Lion 5
Key.Chinese: 救出"獅子5"
Key.Chinesesimp: 救出"狮子5"

Key.Original: Take the injured pilot to the %2first aid station%1 near Katkoula.
Key.Chinese: 把受傷的飛行員送回卡特科拉旁的%2急救站%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把受伤的飞行员送回卡特科拉旁的%2急救站%1。

Key.Original: Find Lion 5
Key.Chinese: 找到"獅子5"
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到"狮子5"

Key.Original:
Find Lion 5, a downed To-199 Neophron pilot. He should be %2somewhere in the vicinity of Vagalala%1. Look for a red smoke signal and land nearby.

Exercise caution, as the enemy will be searching for Lion 5 as well. Try to make the CSAR as fast as possible - we won't have anyone available to search for you, if you suffer a similar fate...
Key.Chinese:
找到"獅子5"，他是一名To-199"禿鷲"攻擊機的飛行員。他應該在%2瓦加拉拉的附近%1. 找到紅色煙霧並降落在旁邊。

你們要小心，敵人也正在尋找"獅子5"。請盡快搜索並救出他-我們沒有任何餘力能幫你進行搜索。
Key.Chinesesimp:
找到"狮子5"，他是一名 To-199"秃鹫"攻击机的飞行员。他应该在%2瓦加拉拉附近%1. 找到红色烟雾并降落在旁边。

你们要小心，敌人也正在寻找"狮子5"。请尽快搜索并救出他—我们没有任何余力能帮你进行搜索。

Key.Original: Load Rhino 3
Key.Chinese: 搭載"犀牛3"
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭载"犀牛3"

Key.Original: Collect Rhino 3 - a squad of paratroopers - from %2Bala Airfield%1. The long runway enables you to land horizontally.
Key.Chinese: 請前往%2巴拉簡易機場%1搭載"犀牛3"，他們是一支空降步兵小隊。這機場的長跑道能讓你進行一般的降落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请前往%2巴拉简易机场%1搭载"犀牛3"，他们是一个空降步兵班。这机场的长跑道能让你进行水平降落。

Key.Original: Drop Rhino 3
Key.Chinese: 空投"犀牛3"
Key.Chinesesimp: 空投"犀牛3"

Key.Original:
Drop Rhino 3 over %2Tuvanaka Island%1. Remember, to accomplish the objective safely, you will need to fly at least 80 meters above ground and at a speed of 200 kilometers per hour.

NATO forces from the Tuvanaka base have probably retreated to the mainland after our preliminary strike. Be warned, however, this information is not currently verified.
Key.Chinese:
空投"犀牛3"到%2圖瓦納卡島%1上。請記住，要安全的完成空投，你的飛行高度至少要80公尺以上以及空速每小時200公里。

圖瓦納卡基地的北約部隊應該在我們的初步打擊以後就撤往主島上去了。但是還是要小心，因為這個情報還沒有被核實。
Key.Chinesesimp:
空投"犀牛3"到%2图瓦纳卡岛%1上。请记住，要安全地完成空投，你的飞行高度至少要在80米以上，且空速至少每小时200千米。

图瓦纳卡基地的北约部队应该在我们的初步打击以后就撤往主岛上去了。但是还是要小心，因为这个情报还没有被核实。

Key.Original: Maintenance (optional)
Key.Chinese: 維修補給(可選)
Key.Chinesesimp: 维修补给（可选）

Key.Original: Land at the airport and follow the %2maintenance%1 procedure to repair, refuel and rearm your VTOL.
Key.Chinese: 降落在機場的%2維修補給站%1，你就可以對你的飛機進行維修，加油與補彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 降落在机场的%2维修补给站%1，你就可以对你的飞机进行维修，加油与补弹。

Key.Original: Destroy Enemy IFVs (optional)
Key.Chinese: 摧毀敵人的步兵戰車(可選)
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁敌人的步兵战车（可选）

Key.Original:
NATO has the upper hand when it comes to armored combat vehicles - our Marids are no match for their AMV-7s and 40mm cannons. Locate and destroy at least two of them to improve the strategic situation on the ground and elevate the morale of our troops.

Locations:
%2Sugarcane factory%1 - one confirmed, another possible
%3Harcourt%1 - one damaged during an assault on the city
%4Georgetown%1 - one spotted near the harbor, but it might have relocated

Take great care when you deal with these IFVs - their FCS can easily track low and slow-flying aircraft.
Key.Chinese:
北約在裝甲車的質量上佔有優勢，我們的"馬里德"裝甲運兵車無法應付他們AMV-7的40公厘火炮。尋找並摧毀至少兩輛敵人的AMV-7，這可以有效增加我軍地面部隊的士氣與戰術優勢。

地點:
%2甘蔗工廠%1-確認至少有一臺，可能還有另外一臺
%3哈爾庫爾%1-附近有一臺在進攻城市的行動中受損的步兵戰車
%4Georgetown%1-有一臺被發現在港口附近，但他很有可能已經移動位置了

在你應付這些步兵戰車時要小心，他們的火控系統能有效追蹤並打擊低空低速的飛行載具。
Key.Chinesesimp:
北约在装甲车的质量上占有优势，我们的"马里德"装甲运兵车无法应付他们 AMV-7的40mm 火炮。寻找并摧毁至少两辆敌人的 AMV-7，这可以有效增加我军地面部队的士气与战术优势。

地点：
%2甘蔗工厂%1-确认至少有一台，可能还有另外一台
%3哈尔库尔%1-附近有一台在进攻城市的行动中受损的步兵战车
%4Georgetown%1-有一台被发现在港口附近，但他很有可能已经移动位置了

在你应付这些步兵战车时要小心，他们的火控系统能有效追踪并打击低空低速的飞行载具。

Key.Original: Destroy Attack Heli (optional)
Key.Chinese: 摧毀攻擊直升機(可選)
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁攻击直升机（可选）

Key.Original: Shoot down the enemy attack helicopter. Or else, attempt to lure it towards our own anti-air defences.
Key.Chinese: 擊落敵人的攻擊直升機。或者你也可以引誘他飛到我們的防空單位頭上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 击落敌人的攻击直升机。或者你也可以引诱他飞到我们的防空单位头上。

Key.Original: Get in Y-32 Xi'an
Key.Chinese: 進入Y-32"西安"垂直起降機
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入Y-32"西安"垂直起降机

Key.Original: Get in your %2Y-32 Xi'an VTOL%1 and join your gunner.
Key.Chinese: 進入你的%2Y-32"西安"垂直起降機%1，你的砲手已經在等你了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入你的%2Y-32"西安"垂直起降机%1，你的炮手已经在等你了。

Key.Original:
Our units on Tanoa are in a fierce battle with NATO expeditionary forces. Although we have an advantage in the air, our opponent has committed a large number of superior ground vehicles, stalling our advance in places and forcing us to retreat in others.

If we cannot outmaneuver the enemy or reduce the threat of their armored assets, this whole operation could end in a stalemate. Needless to say, we can't let that happen.
Key.Chinese:
我軍正與北約的遠征隊在塔諾亞上激烈交火。儘管我們擁有空優，但敵人卻帶來了大量的地面載具，使我們不得不放棄某些區域。

假如我們不能智取敵人或想法減少他們裝甲載具的話，這場行動很有可能就會陷入僵局。不用說，我們當然不能讓這種情況發生。
Key.Chinesesimp:
我军正与北约远征军在塔诺亚激烈交火。尽管我们拥有空优，但敌人却投入了大量的地面车辆，使我们不得不放弃某些区域。

假如我们不能智取敌人或想法减少他们装甲车辆的数量的话，这场行动很有可能就会陷入僵局。不用说，我们当然不能让这种情况发生。

Key.Original: Aéroport de Tanoa, southern Tanoa
Key.Chinese: 塔諾亞機場，塔諾亞南部
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚机场，塔诺亚南部

Key.Original:
Shark 1 - your callsign
Swordfish - commanding officer, ATC
Rhino 3 - paratrooper squad
Dragonfly 6 - Mi-290 Taru support helicopter
Dragonfly 7 - Mi-290 Taru transport helicopter
Key.Chinese:
"鯊魚1"-你的呼號
"劍魚"-指揮官，航空管制員
"犀牛3"-傘兵小隊
"蜻蜓6"-米-290"塔魯"支援直升機
"蜻蜓7"-米-290"塔魯"運輸直升機
Key.Chinesesimp:
"鲨鱼1"-你的呼号
"剑鱼"-指挥官，航空管制员
"犀牛3"-伞兵班
"蜻蜓6"-米-290"塔鲁"支援直升机
"蜻蜓7"-米-290"塔鲁"运输直升机

Key.Original: VTOL aircraft, Overhauled radar functionality, New sensors and datalink features
Key.Chinese: 垂直起降機，全新雷達功能，新傳感器與資料鏈結功能
Key.Chinesesimp: 垂直起降机，全新雷达功能，新传感器与资料链接功能

Key.Original: Use your Y-32 Xi'an VTOL to support friendly troops against NATO forces on Tanoa.
Key.Chinese: 使用你的Y-32"西安"垂直起降機支援友軍部隊對抗塔諾亞島上的北約部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用你的Y-32"西安"垂直起降机支援友军部队对抗塔诺亚岛上的北约部队。

Key.Original: VTOL
Key.Chinese: 垂直起降機
Key.Chinesesimp: 垂直起降机

Key.Original:
As a pilot of a Y-32 Xi'an VTOL, you'll be supporting our forces in battle.

Do not actively engage the enemy with troops on board - their transportation to the combat zone is priority. Once we have boots on the ground, you are free to attack targets of opportunity or provide close air support upon request.

Major NATO positions are marked on your map - avoid these areas, as they have solid AA protection. Although our adversary has no self-propelled anti-aircraft guns on Tanoa, they do have man-portable anti-air defense systems.

In case of damage or shortage of fuel, land back at the airport and resupply at the maintenance area.
Key.Chinese:
作為一名Y-32"西安"垂直起降機的駕駛，你將在戰鬥中支援我方部隊。

不要在你還在搭載人員時就與敵人積極交戰-運輸他們到戰區才是你的首要目標。當我們的步兵成功抵達目的地後，你就可以自由攻擊各個機會目標或是提供密接空中支援給有需要的部隊。

北約部隊的主要位置都已經標記在地圖上-盡量避開這些地區，他們在那邊都有架設防空系統。儘管我們的敵人並沒有佈署自行防空高射炮在塔諾亞上，但他們有讓人員攜帶可攜式防空飛彈。

假如有需要的話，你可以返回機場的維修補給站去進行維修，加油與補彈。
Key.Chinesesimp:
作为一名Y-32"西安"垂直起降机的飞行员，你将在战斗中支援我方部队。

不要在你还在搭载人员时就与敌人积极交战—运输他们到战区才是你的首要目标。当我们的步兵成功抵达目的地后，你就可以自由攻击各个机会目标或是提供近距离空中支援给有需要的部队。

北约部队的主要位置都已经标记在地图上—尽量避开这些地区，他们在那边都有架设防空系统。尽管我们的敌人并没有在塔诺亚布署自行防空高射炮，但他们有便携式防空导弹。

假如有需要的话，你可以返回机场的维修补给站去进行维修，加油与补弹。

Key.Original: First aid station
Key.Chinese: 急救站
Key.Chinesesimp: 急救站

Key.Original: Maintenance
Key.Chinese: 維修補給站
Key.Chinesesimp: 维修补给站

Key.Original: Friendly units were KIA because of you...
Key.Chinese: 友軍因為你的愚蠢而全數陣亡...
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军因为你的愚蠢而全数阵亡...

Key.Original: Your VTOL is a write-off...
Key.Chinese: 你的垂直起降機已經被摧毀了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的垂直起降机已经被摧毁了...

Key.Original:
1. Get in your %2Y-32 Xi'an VTOL%1
2. Take off from the %3airport%1
3. Load Rhino 3 from %4Bala Airstrip%1
4. Drop Rhino 3 over %5Tuvanaka Island%1
5. Escort Dragonfly 7 with reinforcements from %3airport%1 to %6Lijnhaven%1
6. %7RTB%1 in case of no new orders
Key.Chinese:
1. 進入你的%2Y-32"西安"垂直起降機%1
2. 從%3機場%1起飛
3. 前往%4巴拉簡易機場%1搭載"犀牛3"
4. 前往%5圖瓦納卡島%1空投"犀牛3"
5. 護送"蜻蜓7"運送援軍從%3機場%1前往%6萊茵哈文%1
6.當沒有任何任務以後就%7返回基地%1
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 进入你的%2Y-32"西安"垂直起降机%1
2. 从%3机场%1起飞
3. 前往%4巴拉简易机场%1搭载"犀牛3"
4. 前往%5图瓦纳卡岛%1空投"犀牛3"
5. 护送"蜻蜓7"运送援军从%3机场%1前往%6莱因哈文%1
6.当没有任何任务以后就%7返回基地%1

Key.Original: You successfully completed all major tasks and have greatly improved our strategic situation by destroying several enemy IFVs and an attack helicopter! Excellent work!
Key.Chinese: 你成功完成了所有的主要目標並且透過擊毀敵人多量步兵戰車與一臺武裝直升機來大大增加了我們的戰術優勢!幹的好極了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功完成了所有的主要目标，并且通过击毁敌人多辆步兵战车与一架武装直升机大大增加了我们的战术优势！干的好极了！

Key.Original: You successfully completed all major tasks and even shot down an enemy gunship.
Key.Chinese: 你成功完成了所有的主要目標並且擊毀了一架敵人的武裝直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功完成了所有的主要目标并且击毁了一架敌人的武装直升机。

Key.Original: You successfully completed all major tasks and even managed to destroy several enemy IFVs.
Key.Chinese: 你成功完成了所有的主要目標並且設法摧毀了幾輛敵人的步兵戰車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功完成了所有的主要目标并且设法摧毁了几辆敌人的步兵战车。

Key.Original: You successfully completed all major tasks, but missed an opportunity to improve the strategic situation further.
Key.Chinese: 你成功完成了所有的主要目標，但卻錯失了增加我們戰術優勢的機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功完成了所有的主要目标，但却错失了增加我们战术优势的机会。

Key.Original: Swordfish
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"

Key.Original: Shark 1
Key.Chinese: "鯊魚1"
Key.Chinesesimp: "鲨鱼1"

Key.Original: Rhino 3
Key.Chinese: "犀牛3"
Key.Chinesesimp: "犀牛3"

Key.Original: Lion 5
Key.Chinese: "獅子5"
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮子5"

Key.Original: Dragonfly 7
Key.Chinese: "蜻蜓7"
Key.Chinesesimp: "蜻蜓7"

Key.Original: Dragonfly 6
Key.Chinese: "蜻蜓6"
Key.Chinesesimp: "蜻蜓6"

Container.name: x33_Ready
Container.situation: player reports after maintenance task

Key.Original: Roger, Shark 1, you're cleared for take-off. Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"鯊魚1"，你可以起飛。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鲨鱼1"，你可以起飞。完毕。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1, ready to continue with mission.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，這裡是"鯊魚1"，可以繼續執行任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，这里是"鲨鱼1"，可以继续执行任务。

Container.name: x32_LowFuel
Container.situation: vtol running out of fuel

Key.Original: Roger, Shark 1, return to base for refueling. Swordfish, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"鯊魚1"，請返回基地加油。"劍魚"，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鲨鱼1"，请返回基地加油。"剑鱼"，完毕。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1, I'm running low on fuel.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，這裡是"鯊魚1"，燃料即將耗盡。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，这里是"鲨鱼1"，燃料即将耗尽。

Container.name: x30_Damaged
Container.situation: vtol is damaged and player calls for repairs

Key.Original: Roger, Shark 1, return to the airport, ground staff will be ready. Swordfish, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"鯊魚1"，請返回機場，地勤人員會做好準備。"劍魚"，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鲨鱼1"，请返回机场，地勤人员会做好准备。"剑鱼"，完毕。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1 is in urgent need of repairs.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，"鯊魚1"需要立即進行維修。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，"鲨鱼1"需要立即进行维修。

Container.name: x25_PilotsDead
Container.situation: friendly pilot was kia

Key.Original: Abort mission and return to base immediately.
Key.Chinese: 中止任務並立刻返回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中止任务并立刻返回基地。

Key.Original: Swordfish - update - Lion 5's non-responsive, presumed KIA.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"-有新情況-"獅子5"已經沒有應答，推測已經喪生。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"-有新情况-"狮子5"已经没有应答，推测已经丧生。

Container.name: x20_TaruDead
Container.situation: player tells hq that taru is down

Key.Original: Abort mission, I repeat, abort mission!
Key.Chinese: 中止任務，重複一遍，中止任務!
Key.Chinesesimp: 中止任务，重复一遍，中止任务！

Key.Original: Dragonfly 7's down!
Key.Chinese: "蜻蜓7"被擊落!
Key.Chinesesimp: "蜻蜓7"被击落！

Container.name: x15_ParatroopersDead
Container.situation: paratroopers were killed during the task

Key.Original: That's unacceptable, Shark 1. Abort mission and return to base immediately!
Key.Chinese: 這種事我無法接受，"鯊魚1"。中止任務並立即返回基地!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这种事我无法接受，"鲨鱼1"。中止任务并立即返回基地！

Key.Original: Swordfish - update - Rhino 3 suffered heavy casualties!
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"-有新情況-"犀牛3"傷亡慘重!
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"-有新情况-"犀牛3"伤亡惨重！

Container.name: x11_TaruClose
Container.situation: player is too close to taru

Key.Original: That's a little too close!
Key.Chinese: 這也太近了點兒!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这也太近了点儿！

Container.name: x10_TaruFar
Container.situation: hq tells player not to leave taru unprotected

Key.Original: Do not break formation, Shark 1, stay close to Dragonfly 7.
Key.Chinese: "鯊魚1"，不要打亂陣型，離"蜻蜓7"近一些。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鲨鱼1"，不要打乱阵型，离"蜻蜓7"近一些。

Container.name: x05_FF
Container.situation: friendly fire

Key.Original: Those were friendlies!
Key.Chinese: 那些是友軍!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些是友军！

Container.name: x01_XianKO
Container.situation: player's vtol is down

Key.Original: Damn, game's over!
Key.Chinese: 該死，這下玩完了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，这下玩完了！

Container.name: 85_IFVsDestroyed
Container.situation: player reporting he destroyed second marshall

Key.Original: Outstanding work, Shark 1. That will significantly improve the situation down there.
Key.Chinese: 非常出色，"鯊魚1"。這樣一來下面就輕鬆多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 非常出色，"鲨鱼1"。这样一来下面就轻松多了。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1, second enemy IFV found and destroyed.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，"鯊魚1"，我們找到並摧毀了第二輛步戰車。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，"鲨鱼1"，我们找到并摧毁了第二辆步战车。

Container.name: 84_IFVDestroyed
Container.situation: player reports that he destroyed first enemy marshall

Key.Original: Well done, Shark 1. Swordfish, out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的漂亮，"鯊魚1"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的漂亮，"鲨鱼1"。完毕。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1, one enemy IFV found and destroyed.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，"鯊魚1"，我們找到並摧毀了一輛步戰車。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，"鲨鱼1"，我们找到并摧毁了一辆步战车。

Container.name: 82_RTBUncompleted
Container.situation: hq notices player he didn't complete the optional task and assigns it to him

Key.Original: But enemy IFVs are still a major threat. We cannot move to counterattack before we deal with them.
Key.Chinese: 但是敵軍的步戰車仍就是主要威脅。不把他們幹掉我們沒辦法進行反攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是敌军的步战车仍就是主要威胁。不把他们干掉我们没办法进行反攻。

Key.Original: If you have enough ammo left, consider a further seek-and-destroy mission.
Key.Chinese: 如果你還有足夠的彈藥，請考慮繼續任務，建議或尋找並摧毀敵軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你还有足够的弹药，请考虑继续任务，建议或寻找并摧毁敌军。

Key.Original: Alright, Swordfish, we'll see what we can do.
Key.Chinese: 好的，"劍魚"，我們盡力而為。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，"剑鱼"，我们尽力而为。

Container.name: 81_RTBCompleted
Container.situation: hq comments that player completed even the optional task

Key.Original: Due to your efforts and the destruction of so many IFVs, we may even be able to launch a counterattack.
Key.Chinese: 多虧了你們的努力，消滅了如此多的步戰車，現在我們甚至可以開始組織反攻了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 多亏了你们的努力，消灭了如此多的步战车，现在我们甚至可以开始组织反攻了。

Key.Original: This might prove to be a turning point in our campaign. Brilliant work.
Key.Chinese: 這也許會成為我們這場戰役的轉折點。幹的漂亮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这也许会成为我们这场战役的转折点。干的漂亮。

Key.Original: Glad to hear that, sir - we did everything we could.
Key.Chinese: 很高興聽你這麼說，長官-我們也是竭盡所能了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴听你这么说，长官—我们也是竭尽所能了。

Container.name: 80_RTB
Container.situation: hq telling player he can rtb

Key.Original: Shark 1, good news - our units in Lijnhaven managed to fend off the attack.
Key.Chinese: "鯊魚1"，有好消息-我們在萊茵哈文的部隊成功擋住了敵人的進攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鲨鱼1"，有好消息—我们在莱因哈文的部队成功挡住了敌人的进攻。

Key.Original: There were casualties, but the city's still under our control.
Key.Chinese: 有些傷亡，但城市仍在我們的控制下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有些伤亡，但城市仍在我们的控制下。

Key.Original: Rhino 3 confirms NATO have completely abandoned Tuvanaka Island.
Key.Chinese: "犀牛3"確認北約已經完全放棄了圖瓦鈉卡島了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "犀牛3"确认北约已经完全放弃了图瓦纳卡岛了。

Key.Original: This means we can redeploy some troops to reinforce weaker positions here on the mainland.
Key.Chinese: 這意謂著我們可以重新佈署一些部隊來增援大陸上的薄弱區域了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这意谓着我们可以重新布署一些部队来增援大陆上的薄弱区域了。

Container.name: 75_GunshipDestroyed
Container.situation: enemy gunship destroyed

Key.Original: That ought to teach those gweilos a lesson!
Key.Chinese: 給這幫洋鬼子點兒教訓!
Key.Chinesesimp: 给这帮洋鬼子点儿教训！

Container.name: 70_GunshipSpotted
Container.situation: enemy gunship spotted

Key.Original: Enemy helo!
Key.Chinese: 敵軍直升機!
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军直升机！

Container.name: 65_Home
Container.situation: player back at base

Key.Original: And here we are...
Key.Chinese: 終於回來了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 终于回来了...

Container.name: 60_Rescued
Container.situation: pilot delivered to first aid station

Key.Original: Excellent job, Shark 1. RTB.
Key.Chinese: 幹的漂亮，"鯊魚1"。請返回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的漂亮，"鲨鱼1"。请返回基地。

Key.Original: Lion 5 delivered to first aid station.
Key.Chinese: "獅子5"已經送達救助站。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮子5"已经送达救助站。

Container.name: 55_PilotsIn
Container.situation: pilot inside, hq orders to take him to first aid station

Key.Original: Understood, Shark 1, transport him to the first aid station near Katkoula.
Key.Chinese: 明白，"鯊魚1"，請將他送到卡特科拉附近的急救站。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"鲨鱼1"，请将他送到卡特科拉附近的急救站。

Key.Original: Lion 5 on board, alive but wounded.
Key.Chinese: "獅子5"已登機，還活著但受傷了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮子5"已登机，还活着但受伤了。

Key.Original: Affirmative. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。完毕。

Container.name: 51_GetInPilots
Container.situation: player landed at red smoke and is telling the downed guy to hurry

Key.Original: Move, move, move!
Key.Chinese: 快，快，快!
Key.Chinesesimp: 快，快，快！

Container.name: 50_Rescue
Container.situation: hq informs player about csar task

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1, priority tasking. CSAR mission - Lion 5, one jet pilot, possibly walking wounded.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"劍魚"，"鯊魚1"，當前優先任務。搜尋並救援"獅子5"，是一個飛行員，可能受了輕傷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"剑鱼"，"鲨鱼1"，当前优先任务。搜寻并救援"狮子5"，是一个飞行员，可能受了轻伤。

Key.Original: Location - Vagalala sector, land at red smoke.
Key.Chinese: 地點-瓦加拉拉區域，在紅色煙霧處降落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 地点—瓦加拉拉区域，在红色烟雾处降落。

Key.Original: Enemy contact unavoidable, expect enemy QRF searching the area. Good luck. Out.
Key.Chinese: 預計會有敵方的快速反應部隊搜尋這片區域，交火恐怕無法避免。祝你好運。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 预计会有敌方的快速反应部队搜寻这片区域，交火恐怕无法避免。祝你好运。完毕。

Key.Original: On it, Swordfish, changing course to Vagalala.
Key.Chinese: 明白，"劍魚"，立即修改航線到瓦加拉拉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"剑鱼"，立即修改航线到瓦加拉拉。

Container.name: 45_TaruDone
Container.situation: taru escorted, reinforcements to lijnhaven delivered successfuly

Key.Original: Copy, Shark 1. Provide close air support and standby for new tasking.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"鯊魚1"。提供密接空中支援並原地待命。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鲨鱼1"。提供 CAS 并原地待命。

Key.Original: Dragonfly 7 has reached the waypoint, hot LZ, but reinforcements delivered successfully.
Key.Chinese: "蜻蜓7"抵達目的地，降落區域正在交戰，但是支援順利送達了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "蜻蜓7"抵达目的地，降落区域正在交战，但是支援顺利送达了。

Key.Original: Roger that.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Container.name: 42_PawneeDown
Container.situation: enemy pawnee destroyed

Key.Original: Bandit down!
Key.Chinese: 敵軍被幹掉了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军被干掉了！

Container.name: 41_Pawnee
Container.situation: enemy pawnee picked up on a radar

Key.Original: We've got a bandit inbound!
Key.Chinese: 遭遇敵軍!
Key.Chinesesimp: 遭遇敌军！

Container.name: 40_TaruStart
Container.situation: player joined in with taru and is heading to lijnhaven

Key.Original: Understood, flight altitude 50.
Key.Chinese: 明白，飛行高度50。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，飞行高度50。

Key.Original: Check your flight plan, steerpoints updated. Enemy encounter unlikely but possible. Protect Dragonfly 7.
Key.Chinese: 請檢察你的飛行計畫，我們更新了導向點。遇敵機率較低但仍有可能。保護好"蜻蜓7"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请检察你的飞行计划，我们更新了导向点。遇敌机率较低但仍有可能。保护好"蜻蜓7"。

Key.Original: Visual contact with Dragonfly 7. Heading to Lijnhaven, course 180.
Key.Chinese: 已看到"蜻蜓7"。現在前往萊因哈文，航線180。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已看到"蜻蜓7"。现在前往莱因哈文，航线180。

Key.Original: Affirmative, Shark 1, out.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"鯊魚1"，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认，"鲨鱼1"，完毕。

Container.name: 35_Paradropped
Container.situation: informing hq about a successful paradrop

Key.Original: Affirmative. Avoid maintaining a direct course, intel suggests heavy air defenses are present in the area.
Key.Chinese: 確認。請避免直線航線，情報顯示這片區域有重型防空武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认。请避免直线航线，情报显示这片区域有重型防空武器。

Key.Original: Dragonfly 7 is ready to depart to Lijnhaven with reinforcements.
Key.Chinese: "蜻蜓7"已準備出發前往萊因哈文提供支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: "蜻蜓7"已准备出发前往莱因哈文提供支援。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1 - Rhino 3 descending over Tuvanaka Island; we're coming home.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，這裡是"鯊魚1"-"犀牛3"已空降圖瓦納卡島;我們現在返航。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，这里是"鲨鱼1"-"犀牛3"已空降图瓦纳卡岛;我们现在返航。

Key.Original: Rendezvous point, south of airport. Approach and escort.
Key.Chinese: 會合點在機場南部。請前往護送。
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点在机场南部。请前往护送。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Swordfish. Shark 1, out.
Key.Chinese: 明白，"劍魚"。"鯊魚1"，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"剑鱼"。"鲨鱼1"，完毕。

Container.name: 30_JumpOut
Container.situation: signal for paratroopers to jump out

Key.Original: Rhino 3 – green light - jump!
Key.Chinese: "犀牛3"–綠燈-跳!
Key.Chinesesimp: "犀牛3"–绿灯—跳！

Container.name: 26_Params
Container.situation: repeating params for successful paradrop

Key.Original: Setting approach for maximal speed, 200 klicks per hour, minimal altitude 80 meters.
Key.Chinese: 設定最大接近速度，200公里每小時，最低高度80米。
Key.Chinesesimp: 设定最大接近速度，200千米每小时，最低高度80米。

Container.name: 25_Nearby
Container.situation: player informing paratroopers they are closing in to the drop zone

Key.Original: Two klicks from the dropzone, get ready Rhino 3.
Key.Chinese: 距離投放地點2公里，"犀牛3"做好準備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 距离投放地点2千米，"犀牛3"做好准备。

Container.name: 20_AllIn
Container.situation: player is ready to take off with the paratroopers

Key.Original: Affirmative, Shark 1. NATO hold Balavu Island, north of your position; advise you bypass it altogether and vector from the west.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"鯊魚1"。位於你北部的巴拉武島目前被北約控制;建議你完全避開並從西邊侵入。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认，"鲨鱼1"。位于你北部的巴拉武岛目前被北约控制;建议你完全避开并从西边侵入。

Key.Original: Rhino 3 complete, moving to dropzone.
Key.Chinese: "犀牛3"就緒，前往投放地點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "犀牛3"就绪，前往投放地点。

Key.Original: Roger, Swordfish.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"劍魚"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"剑鱼"。

Container.name: 15_GetIn
Container.situation: player reporting to hq that paratroopers are boarding in the vtol

Key.Original: Understood, Shark 1. Report when ready.
Key.Chinese: 明白，"鯊魚1"。請在就緒後通知。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，"鲨鱼1"。请在就绪后通知。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1, current location Bala Airfield. Rhino 3 is boarding.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，這裡是"鯊魚1"，目前位於巴拉機場。"犀牛3"正在登機。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，这里是"鲨鱼1"，目前位于巴拉机场。"犀牛3"正在登机。

Container.name: 10_InTheAir
Container.situation: player took off with the vtol

Key.Original: Roger that, Shark 1. Local air traffic control not available, approach by visual.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"鯊魚1"。當地交通管制失效，接近時請通過目力自行判斷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鲨鱼1"。当地交通管制失效，接近时请通过目力自行判断。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1, setting course for Bala Airfield.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，這裡是"鯊魚1"，正在設定路線前往巴拉簡易機場。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，这里是"鲨鱼1"，正在设定路线前往巴拉简易机场。

Key.Original: Affirmative, Swordfish.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"劍魚"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认，"剑鱼"。

Container.name: 08_Runway35
Container.situation: player on runway 35

Key.Original: Say again, Shark 1.
Key.Chinese: "鯊魚1"，請重複。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鲨鱼1"，请重复。

Key.Original: You're on the wrong runway, Shark 1 - 35 is heading directly into the combat zone!
Key.Chinese: "鯊魚1"，你上錯跑道了-35號是直接通往戰場的!
Key.Chinesesimp: "鲨鱼1"，你上错跑道了-35号是直接通往战场的！

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1 has reached Runway 35.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，"鯊魚1"已到達35號跑道。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，"鲨鱼1"已到达35号跑道。

Key.Original: Vertical take-off advised.
Key.Chinese: 建議垂直起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 建议垂直起飞。

Key.Original: Shark 1 has reached Runway 35.
Key.Chinese: "鯊魚1"已到達35號跑道。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鲨鱼1"已到达35号跑道。

Key.Original: Message received, Swordfish. Shark 1, out.
Key.Chinese: 消息收到，"劍魚"。"鯊魚1"，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消息收到，"剑鱼"。"鲨鱼1"，完毕。

Container.name: 07_Runway17
Container.situation: player on runway 17

Key.Original: Roger, Shark 1. Wind is north, 2 MPS. You are cleared for take-off.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"鯊魚1"。風向正北，風速2公尺每秒。你可以起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鲨鱼1"。风向正北，风速2米每秒。你可以起飞。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1 has reached Runway 17.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，"鯊魚1"已到達17號跑道。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，"鲨鱼1"已到达17号跑道。

Key.Original: Message received, Swordfish. Shark 1 is good to go.
Key.Chinese: 消息收到，"劍魚"。"鯊魚1"準備出發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消息收到，"剑鱼"。"鲨鱼1"准备出发。

Container.name: 06_AirTraffic
Container.situation: atc (hq) giving info about current air traffic

Key.Original: Current air traffic - Dragonfly 6's INTRAN between airport and Katkoula, flight altitude 50 meters.
Key.Chinese: 當前空中交通狀況-"蜻蜓6"往返於機場和卡特科拉之間，飛行高度50公尺。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当前空中交通状况-"蜻蜓6"往返于机场和卡特科拉之间，飞行高度50米。

Key.Original: One reconnaissance UAV in Tanouka sector, flight altitude 1200 meters. That is all.
Key.Chinese: 一架偵察無人機位於塔諾卡區域，飛行高度1200公尺。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一架侦察无人机位于塔诺卡区域，飞行高度1200米。完毕。

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Shark 1, Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。"鯊魚1"，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。"鲨鱼1"，完毕。

Container.name: 05_GotIn
Container.situation: player got into the vtol and is starting engines

Key.Original: Shark 1, Swordfish, I read you 5.
Key.Chinese: "鯊魚1"，這裡是"劍魚"，非常清晰。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鲨鱼1"，这里是"剑鱼"，非常清晰。

Key.Original: Start-up approved.
Key.Chinese: 允許起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 允许起飞。

Key.Original: Swordfish, Shark 1, radio check.
Key.Chinese: "劍魚"，這裡是"鯊魚1"，無線電測試。
Key.Chinesesimp: "剑鱼"，这里是"鲨鱼1"，无线电测试。

Key.Original: Roll to Runway 17 or proceed with vertical take-off.
Key.Chinese: 請前往17號跑道或垂直起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请前往17号跑道或垂直起飞。

Key.Original: Requesting start-up.
Key.Chinese: 請求起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求起飞。

Key.Original: Affirmative, Runway 17 or vertical take-off.
Key.Chinese: 確認，17號跑道或者垂直起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认，17号跑道或者垂直起飞。

Container.name: 01_Prologue
Container.situation: intro at the base

Key.Original: At least the pre-flight procedure's already done.
Key.Chinese: 這艘起飛預檢程序已經完成了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这艘起飞预检程序已经完成了。

Key.Original: Well done securing the Schematics. Move to the upload location. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，我們已拿到武器藍圖。請前往上傳位置。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，我们已拿到武器蓝图。请前往上传位置。通话完毕。

Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"呼叫所有單位，請注意，我們已獲悉情報出現地點。請參照座標位置。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"呼叫所有单位，请注意，我们已获悉情报出现地点。请参照座标位置。通话完毕。

Container.name: 15_IntelRetrieved
Container.participants: EXC B HQ;EXC O HQ;EXC O PAC HQ;
Container.situation: hq commends the players for retrieving the intel

Key.Original: All callsigns, int. secured. Continue on mission. Out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，我們已獲得情報。請繼續任務。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，我们已获得情报。请继续任务。通话完毕。

Key.Original: All callsigns, int. secured. Continue on mission. Out.

Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，我们已获得情报。请继续任务。通话完毕。

Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，我们已获得情报。请继续任务。通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_FobControl
Container.participants: EXC B HQ;EXC O HQ;EXC O PAC HQ;
Container.situation: hq commends the players for establishing the fob

Key.Original: Good work setting up the FOB. Support assets are en route. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，你們成功設立了前線作戰基地。補給物資正在路上。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，你们成功设立了前线作战基地。补给物资正在路上。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Good work setting up the FOB. Support assets are en route. Out.

Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，你们成功设立了前线作战基地。补给物资正在路上。通话完毕。

Key.Chinese: 幹的好，你們成功設立了前線作戰基地。補給物資正在路上。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，你们成功设立了前线作战基地。补给物资正在路上。通话完毕。

Container.name: 07_EndBad
Container.participants: EXC B HQ;EXC O HQ;EXC O PAC HQ;
Container.situation: hq reprimands the players for losing the round

Key.Original: All callsigns - abort mission. I say again - abort mission. Return to base immediately. Broadway out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位-中止任務。我重複一遍-中止任務。請立即返回基地。"百老匯"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位—中止任务。我重复一遍—中止任务。请立即返回基地。"百老汇"通话完毕。

Key.Original: All callsigns - abort mission. I say again - abort mission. Return to base immediately. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位-中止任務。我重複一遍-中止任務。請立即返回基地。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位—中止任务。我重复一遍—中止任务。请立即返回基地。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: All callsigns - abort mission. I say again - abort mission. Return to base immediately. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位-中止任務。我重複一遍-中止任務。請立即返回基地。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位—中止任务。我重复一遍—中止任务。请立即返回基地。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Container.name: 05_EndGood
Container.participants: EXC B HQ;EXC O HQ;EXC O PAC HQ;
Container.situation: hq commends the players for winning the round

Key.Original: All callsigns, great work out there. Return to base. Broadway out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，幹得非常好。請返回基地。"百老匯"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，干得非常好。请返回基地。"百老汇"通话完毕。

Key.Original: All callsigns, great work out there. Return to base. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，幹得非常好。請返回基地。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，干得非常好。请返回基地。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: All callsigns, great work out there. Return to base. Griffin out.

Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，干得非常好。请返回基地。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Container.name: 03_Start
Container.participants: EXC B HQ;EXC O HQ;EXC O PAC HQ;
Container.situation: hq gives the order for players to start completing their objectives

Key.Original: Advance. Set up FOB, Broadway out.
Key.Chinese: 開始作戰。請設立前線作戰基地，"百老匯"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始作战。请设立前线作战基地，"百老汇"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Advance. Set up FOB, Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 開始作戰。請設立前線作戰基地，"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始作战。请设立前线作战基地，"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Advance. Set up FOB, Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 開始作戰。請設立前線作戰基地，"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始作战。请设立前线作战基地，"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Container.name: 01_Wait
Container.participants: EXC B HQ;EXC O HQ;EXC O PAC HQ;
Container.situation: hq tells players to wait

Key.Original: All callsigns, stand by.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，請準備就緒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，请准备就绪。

Key.Original: All callsigns, stand by.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，請準備就緒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，请准备就绪。

Key.Original: All callsigns, stand by.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，請準備就緒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，请准备就绪。

Key.Original: Keystone Extraction
Key.Chinese: "基石"撤離行動
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"撤离

Key.Original: Having secured %2Keystone%1 and with the enemy on high alert, it's time to leave this place.
Key.Chinese: 在我們成功救出%2"基石"%1後，敵人也進入了高度警戒的狀態，是時候離開這個地方了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们成功救出%2"基石"%1后，敌人也进入了高度警戒的状态，是时候离开这个地方了。

Key.Original: 06:45 Hours
Tuesday, August 14th, 2035
Key.Chinese: 2035年，8月14日，星期二
Key.Chinesesimp: 2035年，8月14日，星期二

Key.Original: Target location 'Toronto', Syndikat-held territory
Key.Chinese: 目標點'多倫多'，辛迪加領地
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标点'多伦多'，辛迪加领地

Key.Original:
%2Raider 1%1 - Lead element.
%2Keystone%1 - Mission target.
%3Raider 2%1 - Your team.
Watchtower - CTRG Headquarters.
Key.Chinese:
%2"突襲者1"%1-領導小隊。
%2"基石"%1-任務目標。
%3"突襲者2"%1-你的小隊。
"守望塔"-戰研小組指揮部。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%2"突袭者1"%1-指挥分队。
%2"基石"%1-任务目标。
%3"突袭者2"%1-你的小组。
"守望塔"-战研大队指挥部。

Key.Original: Forest
Key.Chinese: 森林
Key.Chinesesimp: 森林

Key.Original: Small Hills
Key.Chinese: 小山丘
Key.Chinesesimp: 小山丘

Key.Original: Fields
Key.Chinese: 平原
Key.Chinesesimp: 平原

Key.Original: LZ
Key.Chinese: 降落點
Key.Chinesesimp: 降落点

Key.Original: Deep in enemy territory and vastly outnumbered, Group 15 race to get Keystone to safety.
Key.Chinese: 深入敵人領土並面對為數眾多的敵人，15分隊正努力幫助"基石"安全撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 深入敌人领土并面对为数众多的敌人，15大队正努力帮助"基石"安全撤离。

Key.Original: 05 Extraction
Key.Chinese: 05撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 05 撤离

Key.Original: Assist %2Raider 1%1 with escorting %2Keystone%1 off the island.
Key.Chinese: 協助%2"突襲者1"%1護送%2"基石"%1離開這個小島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 协助%2"突袭者1"%1护送%2"基石"%1离开这个小岛。

Key.Original: Reach the LZ
Key.Chinese: 抵達降落點
Key.Chinesesimp: 抵达降落点

Key.Original: RV
Key.Chinese: 會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点

Key.Original: Move to secondary extraction point. Angel 1-3 is en route.
Key.Chinese: 前往第二撤離點。"天使1-3"正在路上了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往第二撤离点。"天使1-3"正在路上了。

Key.Original: Return to the Boats
Key.Chinese: 返回登陸艇
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回登陆艇

Key.Original: EVAC
Key.Chinese: 逃離
Key.Chinesesimp: 逃离

Key.Original: All attempts at extraction have failed. Move to the boats you inserted with.
Key.Chinese: 我們的撤離方案皆已失效。現在只能回去找我們當初潛入時用的船隻了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的撤离方案皆已失效。现在只能回去找我们当初潜入时用的船只了。

Key.Original: Board the Boat
Key.Chinese: 搭乘船隻
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘船只

Key.Original: BOARD
Key.Chinese: 搭乘
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘

Key.Original: Board Kingfish 1 and extract from the AO.
Key.Chinese: 搭乘"王魚1"的船來離開戰場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘"王鱼1"撤离作战区域。

Key.Original: 1. Extract %2Keystone%1
Extract Keystone
Key.Chinese: 撤離"基石"
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离"基石"

Key.Original: KEYSTONE
Key.Chinese: "基石"
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"

Key.Original: Escort Raider 1 and Keystone off the island.
Key.Chinese: 護送"突襲者1"與"基石"離開這個小島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 护送"突袭者1"与"基石"离开这个小岛。

Key.Original: Despite Viper's best efforts, you were able to successfully extract Captain Miller from the AO.
Key.Chinese: 儘管敵方"毒蛇"小隊盡了全力阻止你們，你們仍成功的把米勒上校救離了戰區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管敌方"毒蛇"小队尽了全力阻止你们，你们仍成功的把米勒上校救离了战区。

Key.Original: Board the Helicopter
Key.Chinese: 搭乘直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘直升机

Key.Original: BOARD
Key.Chinese: 搭乘
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘

Key.Original: Board Angel 1-3 and extract from the AO.
Key.Chinese: 搭乘"天使1-3"的直升機來離開戰場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘"天使1-3"的直升机来离开战场。

Key.Original: Move to the Beach
Key.Chinese: 前往海灘
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往海滩

Key.Original: RV
Key.Chinese: 會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点

Key.Original: Rendezvous with Kingfish 1 at the beach south-east of target location 'Toronto'.
Key.Chinese: 前往'多倫多'點東南方的海灘，與"王魚1"會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往'多伦多'点东南方的海滩，与"王鱼1"会合。

Key.Original: Extraction
Key.Chinese: 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离

Container.name: x15_KeyStoneSuppressed
Container.situation: support squad reports to players that they are taking enemy fire and need help

Key.Original: God dammit. Raider 2, give us some fucking covering fire.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的。"突襲者2"，趕快給我們掩護的火力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的。"突袭者2"，赶快给我们掩护的火力。

Key.Original: Under fire! Raider 2, we need help! Now!
Key.Chinese: 正遭受攻擊!"突襲者2"，我們需要你們的協助!現在!
Key.Chinesesimp: 正遭受攻击！"突袭者2"，我们需要你们的协助！现在！

Key.Original: Raider 2, we need to move from here, now! Keep moving!
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我們必須馬上離開這裡!趕快移動!
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我们必须马上离开这里！赶快移动！

Key.Original: Raider 2, support-fire!
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，支援火力!
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，支援火力！

Container.name: x10_KeepMoving
Container.situation: support squad reminds players about the importance of continuous movement towards the objective

Key.Original: Raider 2, clear our front. We need to keep moving.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，去肅清我們的前方。我們必須保持移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，去肃清我们的前方。我们必须保持移动。

Key.Original: Raider 2, we need to go!
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我們必須走了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我们必须走了！

Key.Original: Keep moving, Raider 2, over-exposed here!
Key.Chinese: 保持移動，"突襲者2"，這裡太空曠了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持移动，"突袭者2"，这里太空旷了！

Key.Original: Recce ahead, Raider 2, quit fuckin around!
Key.Chinese: 往前偵察，"突襲者2"，不要再閒晃了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 往前侦察，"突袭者2"，不要再闲晃了！

Container.name: x05_Holding
Container.situation: support squad stops moving because they are in range of players which are scouting ahead

Key.Original: Going firm. Raider 2, recce up ahead.
Key.Chinese: 原地待命中。"突襲者2"，請往前偵察。
Key.Chinesesimp: 原地待命中。"突袭者2"，请往前侦察。

Key.Original: Finding cover!
Key.Chinese: 正在尋找掩護!
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在寻找掩护！

Key.Original: Holding!
Key.Chinese: 停止移動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 停止移动！

Key.Original: On you!
Key.Chinese: 在你們後面了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 在你们后面了！

Container.name: x00_Moving
Container.situation: support squad starts moving to get closer to players which are scouting ahead

Key.Original: We're on the move!
Key.Chinese: 我們正在移動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正在移动！

Key.Original: Moving out!
Key.Chinese: 移動中!
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动中！

Key.Original: Moving!
Key.Chinese: 正在移動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在移动！

Key.Original: On the move!
Key.Chinese: 正在移動中!
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在移动中！

Container.name: b50_Reveal
Container.participants: EXC B Miller;EXC B Riker;EXC B CTRG Commander;
Container.situation: miller is revealed for the first time, support team lead registers his rescue

Key.Original: Roger that, Raider 1. Waterborne asset inbound. Callsign Kingfish 1. Move to primary exfil.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"突襲者1"。水上單位正在抵達。呼號為"王魚1"。請前往第一撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"突袭者1"。水上单位正在抵达。呼号为"王鱼1"。请前往第一撤离点。

Key.Original: Fucking hell, lads. What took you so long?
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，夥計們。你們怎麼這麼久才來?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，伙计们。你们怎么这么久才来？

Key.Original: Watchtower, Raider 1. Keystone secure. I say again, Keystone secure. Request exfil. Over?
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，這裡是"突襲者1"。"基石"已安全。我重複一遍，"基石"已安全。請求撤離。完畢?
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，这里是"突袭者1"。"基石"已安全。我重复一遍，"基石"已安全。请求撤离。完毕？

Container.name: b45_Clear
Container.situation: support team members call out that the room's clear

Key.Original: Clear!
Key.Chinese: 安全!
Key.Chinesesimp: 安全！

Key.Original: Clear!
Key.Chinese: 安全!
Key.Chinesesimp: 安全！

Container.name: b40_Flash_3
Container.situation: support lead throws a flashbang into the second room

Key.Original: 2 times enemy!
Key.Chinese: 2名敵人!
Key.Chinesesimp: 2名敌人！

Container.name: b40_Flash_2
Container.situation: support lead throws a flashbang into the second room

Key.Original: Flash!
Key.Chinese: 閃光彈!
Key.Chinesesimp: 闪光弹！

Container.name: b35_Man_Down
Container.situation: point man gets hit (non-lethal), other support team member sees it

Key.Original: Stay down, Truck! Stay down!
Key.Chinese: 趴著，"卡車"!趴著!
Key.Chinesesimp: 趴着，"卡车"！趴着！

Key.Original: Push, push! Second door! Stack up!
Key.Chinese: 推進，推進!第二扇門!預備!
Key.Chinesesimp: 推进，推进！第二扇门！预备！

Key.Original: Truck's hit!
Key.Chinese: "卡車"中彈了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡车"中弹了！

Container.name: b30_Contact
Container.situation: point man spots and engages first enemy

Key.Original: 1 times enemy front! Open door left!
Key.Chinese: 1名敵人在前方!門的左邊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 1名敌人在前方！门左边！

Key.Original: I'm hit!
Key.Chinese: 我中彈了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我中弹了！

Container.name: b25_Breaching
Container.situation: point man announces breach

Key.Original: Go! Go!
Key.Chinese: 衝!衝!
Key.Chinesesimp: 冲！冲！

Container.name: b20_Flash
Container.situation: support lead throws the flashbang into the building

Key.Original: Flash.
Key.Chinese: 閃光彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 闪光弹。

Container.name: b15_Door
Container.situation: support lead orders subordinate to handle the door

Key.Original: Salvo, you're up.
Key.Chinese: 薩爾沃，你上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 萨尔沃，你上。

Key.Original: On it.
Key.Chinese: 好的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。

Container.name: b10_Connected
Container.situation: watchtower notifies everyone that they're now watching through the live feed

Key.Original: Feed established. Go when ready.
Key.Chinese: 已看到畫面。準備好就進攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已看到画面。准备好就突入。

Container.name: b05_Connecting
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B CTRG Commander;
Container.situation: support lead notifies watchtower that they're about to breach

Key.Original: Roger that, Raider 1. Priority is Keystone. Watch arcs. PID all PAC's. Flicking to video feed.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"突襲者1"。優先目標是"基石"。掃視周遭。核對所有人員。正在開啟實況轉播。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"突袭者1"。优先目标是"基石"。扫视周遭。核对所有人员。正在开启实况转播。

Key.Original: Watchtower, be advised, we're clearing Toronto. Stacking for breach on obvious.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，請注意，我們正在肅清"多倫多"點。現在準備突襲一棟可疑的建築。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，请注意，我们正在肃清"多伦多"点。现在准备突袭一栋可疑的建筑。

Container.name: b01_Move_In
Container.situation: support lead orders everyone to converge on the target building.

Key.Original: Prepare to move.
Key.Chinese: 準備進入。
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备进入。

Key.Original: Move.
Key.Chinese: 移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动。

Key.Original: Watchtower, be advised, that's my callsign complete, feet wet.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，請注意，我的小隊已抵達，找到船了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，请注意，我的小队已抵达，找到船了。

Key.Original: Miller, I'm sure the boss'll wanna debrief from you.
Key.Chinese: 米勒，我很確定老大想聽聽你的匯報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒，我很确定老大想听听你的汇报。

Container.name: 80_LeaveTheJungle
Container.participants: EXC B Grimm;EXC B Riker;EXC B Salvo;

Key.Original: Heads up! The boats are still here.
Key.Chinese: 注意!我們的船仍在這邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意！我们的船仍在这边。

Key.Original: Alright. Mount up. Let's get outta here.
Key.Chinese: 好的。上船。讓我們離開這個地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。上船。让我们离开这个地方。

Key.Original: Raider 2, waiting on you.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，正在等你們。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，正在等你们。

Key.Original: Thank fuck for that.
Key.Chinese: 真是他媽的棒極了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是他妈的棒极了。

Container.name: 75_EnterTheJungle
Container.situation: miller issues a warning

Key.Original: Hold up. Atmospherics have changed.
Key.Chinese: 等等。現在的氣氛有點不太對勁。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等。现在的气氛有点不太对劲。

Key.Original: Viper isn't an ordinary unit. They're used specifically for destabilization ops. Move carefully.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇"並不是個普通的單位。他們擅長於擾動作戰。小心移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇"不是普通单位。他们擅长于扰乱战。小心移动。

Key.Original: Yeah. I feel it too.
Key.Chinese: 恩。我也感覺到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩。我也感觉到了。

Key.Original: Let's switch the fuck on. Be ready for an ambush.
Key.Chinese: 讓我們夾緊屁股。準備好面對任何埋伏。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我们夹紧屁股。准备好面对任何埋伏。

Container.name: 73_BoatsSplit
Container.situation: the players and raider 1 split up

Key.Original: Raider 2, we'll split up here. 2 parties. Move back to the infil point. Recover our boats.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我們在這邊分開。兩隊人馬。移動回到潛入點。取回我們的船。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我们在这边分开。两队人马。移动回到潜入点。取回我们的船。

Key.Original: Miller, with me. Let's roll.
Key.Chinese: 米勒，你跟著我。出發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒，你跟着我。出发。

Container.name: 70_MoveToBoats
Container.participants: EXC B Salvo;EXC B Truck;EXC B Grimm;
Container.situation: plan repetition

Key.Original: We're going back for our boats.
Key.Chinese: 我們回去找我們的船。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们回去找我们的船。

Key.Original: Fingers crossed they're still there.
Key.Chinese: 希望它們都還在那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 希望它们都还在那里。

Key.Original: What's the play?
Key.Chinese: 所以計劃是?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以计划是？

Container.name: 65_TheBoats
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Grimm;EXC B Riker;EXC B Miller;

Key.Original: Roger that. Move, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。開始移動，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。开始移动，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Boats.
Key.Chinese: 用船。
Key.Chinesesimp: 用船。

Key.Original: Any ideas? Now would be the time.
Key.Chinese: 有任何想法嗎?現在最好提出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有任何想法吗？现在最好提出来。

Key.Original: What was your infil?
Key.Chinese: 你們是怎麼潛入這裡的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们是怎么潜入这里的？

Key.Original: I thought you lads were extracting me.
Key.Chinese: 我本以為是你們來救我的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我本以为是你们来救我的。

Key.Original: Fuck, of course.
Key.Chinese: 該死，我怎麼忘了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，我怎么忘了。

Key.Original: Watchtower, SITREP. My callsign complete plus primary will move to the infil boats.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，狀況回報。我的小隊即將返回到潛入用的船那邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，状况回报。我的小队即将返回到潜入用的船那边。

Container.name: 60_PilotLeaves
Container.participants: EXC B SOF Liaison;EXC B Pilot;EXC B CTRG Commander;

Key.Original: Raider 1, go firm, we'll find another exfil for your teams.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，堅守住，我們會再找另一個撤離的方法。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，坚守住，我们会再找另一个撤离的方法。

Key.Original: Understood, Angel 3-2. Abort. Fall back.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"天使3-2"。取消任務。撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"天使3-2"。取消任务。撤退。

Key.Original: Shit! Hydraulics are hit.
Key.Chinese: 該死!尾槳被擊中了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！尾桨被击中了。

Key.Original: Angel 3-1, I'm limping home. Put SAR teams on standby.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"天使3-1"，我正努力撐回去。請叫救援小組待命。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"天使3-1"，我正努力撑回去。请叫救援小组待命。

Key.Original: Northstar, this is Angel 1-3! We're taking accurate fire from the radio mast.
Key.Chinese: "北極星"，這裡是"天使1-3"!我們正被來自無線電塔的火力攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "北极星"，这里是"天使1-3"！我们正被来自无线电塔的火力攻击。

Key.Original: Raider 1, be advised, Angel 1-3 is 1 mike from the LZ. Out.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，請注意，"天使1-3"距離降落點還有1分鐘。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，请注意，"天使1-3"距离降落点还有1分钟。通话完毕。

Container.name: 45_WhatWasThat2
Container.participants: EXC B Miller;EXC B Truck;EXC B Salvo;EXC B Grimm;
Container.situation: more context about the enemy while running to next location

Key.Original: Something tells me we're going stay there, too.
Key.Chinese: 某種直覺告訴我，我們也得繼續擋在那。
Key.Chinesesimp: 某种直觉告诉我，我们也得继续挡在那。

Key.Original: We're not the target. We're just in the way.
Key.Chinese: 我們並不是目標。我們只是擋到他們的路。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们并不是目标。我们只是挡到他们的路。

Key.Original: Are they targeting us?
Key.Chinese: 他們是在瞄準我們嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们是在瞄准我们吗？

Key.Original: Well, you have such pretty eyes, Truck, how could they not?
Key.Chinese: 你的眼睛挺利的啊，"卡車"，他們怎麼可能不是?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的眼睛挺利的啊，"卡车"，他们怎么可能不是？

Container.name: 40_WhatWasThat
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Miller;EXC B Grimm;
Container.situation: context about the enemy while running to next location

Key.Original: And advising Syndikat, obviously.
Key.Chinese: 顯然就是他們在指導辛迪加。
Key.Chinesesimp: 显然就是他们在指导辛迪加。

Key.Original: Some sort of embedded SOF. Codename Viper.
Key.Chinese: 某種特種部隊。代號為"毒蛇"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 某种特种部队。代号为"毒蛇"。

Key.Original: Miller, what are we facing here?
Key.Chinese: 米勒，我們到底在面對些什麼人?
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒，我们到底在面对些什么人？

Key.Original: It's unclear. More than I thought.
Key.Chinese: 還不清楚。但比我想像的還多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还不清楚。但比我想像的还多。

Key.Original: Estimated numbers?
Key.Chinese: 大約人數?
Key.Chinesesimp: 大约人数？

Key.Original: They're a threat. But we've made it this far. That's a good start.
Key.Chinese: 他們是個威脅。但我們都已經撐到了這邊。這是個不錯的開始。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们是个威胁。但我们都已经撑到了这边。这是个不错的开始。

Container.name: 35_MoveToLZ
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: players are ordered to move to secondary extraction zone and wait for transportation

Key.Original: That beach is a no-go. Move callsign complete plus primary to secondary LZ. Grid 049-031. Over.
Key.Chinese: 海灘已經無法使用了。移動所有單位到第二撤離點。座標049-031。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 海滩已经无法使用了。移动所有单位到第二撤离点。座标049-031。完毕。

Key.Original: All Raider callsigns, this is Northstar Actual. We've re-routed rotary transport to your LOCSTAT.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫所有突襲者小隊，這裡是"北極星"指揮。我們正在重新調派直升機過去你們的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼叫所有突袭者小队，这里是"北极星"指挥。我们正在重新调派直升机过去你们的位置。

Key.Original: Got it. Roger, Watchtower.
Key.Chinese: 了解。收到，"守望塔"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。收到，"守望塔"。

Container.name: 30_NatoChopper
Container.situation: telling players there's a secondary extraction available

Key.Original: Raider 1, be advised, there's a Task Force helo nearby.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，請注意，附近正好有一架特遣隊的直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，请注意，附近正好有一架特遣队的直升机。

Key.Original: Tasking rotary support now. Wait out.
Key.Chinese: 正在調派它過去支援。暫時通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在调派它过去支援。暂时通话完毕。

Container.name: 25_BoatDestroyed
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;EXC B Miller;
Container.situation: extraction boat is hit and destroyed, chaotic moment

Key.Original: Raider 1, SITREP?
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，狀況回報?
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，状况回报？

Key.Original: Raider 1, send SITREP as soon as, out!
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，等下盡快再進行回報，通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，等下尽快再进行回报，通话完毕！

Key.Original: Shit! Watchtower, Contact! Kingfish is hit! Suspected AT system! Wait out.
Key.Chinese: 該死!"守望塔"，接敵!"王魚1"中彈了!猜測是反裝甲武器!暫時通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！"守望塔"，接敌！"王鱼1"中弹了！猜测是反装甲武器！暂时通话完毕。

Key.Original: It's Viper. We're being hunted.
Key.Chinese: 是"毒蛇"。我們正在被獵殺。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是"毒蛇"。我们正在被猎杀。

Key.Original: Watchtower! Contact, wait out!
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"!接敵中，暫時通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"！接敌中，暂时通话完毕。

Key.Original: We need to move, get into cover!
Key.Chinese: 我們必須移動，快找掩護!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须移动，快找掩护！

Container.name: 20_WaitForBoat
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;
Container.situation: players reach the extraction position and have to wait for the boat which will transport them

Key.Original: Roger. Kingfish 1 will be there in figures few. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。"王魚1"幾分鐘後就會抵達。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。"王鱼1"几分钟后就会抵达。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Watchtower, Raider 1 at the extraction. Over.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，這裡是"突襲者1"，我們到達了撤離點。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，这里是"突袭者1"，我们到达了撤离点。完毕。

Container.name: 15_ExpositionTwo
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Truck;EXC B Miller;EXC B Salvo;
Container.situation: more plot exposure, foreshadowing viper

Key.Original: It's complicated. Part of something bigger.
Key.Chinese: 這很複雜。這事屬於一件更大的事情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这很复杂。这事属于一件更大的事情。

Key.Original: It's not the priority now. We'll sort out the details later.
Key.Chinese: 這件事先不急。我們之後再來了解這些問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这件事先不急。我们之后再来了解这些问题。

Key.Original: All these Chinese, Russian, Iranian weapons we keep finding - and who knows what else - someone's bringing them in.
Key.Chinese: 我們一直不斷發現到這些中國，俄羅斯和伊朗的武器-天知道還有些什麼-有人把這些給運進來的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们一直不断发现到这些中国，俄罗斯和伊朗的武器—天知道还有些什么—有人把这些给运进来的。

Key.Original: But what's their agenda?
Key.Chinese: 他們到底在策劃些什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们到底在策划些什么？

Container.name: 10_ExpositionOne
Container.participants: EXC B Grimm;EXC B Miller;EXC B Salvo;
Container.situation: plot explanation, why and by whom keystone was captured

Key.Original: We had a run-in with them. I heard Mandarin. Is it CSAT?
Key.Chinese: 我們曾碰見過他們。我聽到了普通話。他們是廣協同盟吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们曾碰见过他们。我听到了普通话。他们是广协吧？

Key.Original: I'll bring you up to speed once we're clear.
Key.Chinese: 等我們安全後我會在跟你們說明。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等我们安全后我会在跟你们说明。

Key.Original: So, what's the story? Who took you hostage?
Key.Chinese: 那麼，到底是怎樣?是誰綁架了你?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么，到底是怎样？是谁绑架了你？

Key.Original: They're not. Officially.
Key.Chinese: 官方上來說他們的確是沒有在這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 官方上来说他们的确是没有在这里。

Key.Original: CSAT definitely aren't meant to be here.
Key.Chinese: 照常理來說廣協同盟是不應該出現在這裡的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 照常理来说广协是不应该出现在这里的。

Container.name: 05_OnTheMove
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Truck;EXC B Miller;EXC B Salvo;EXC B Grimm;
Container.situation: re-ensuring players know what to do after all that initial chatter

Key.Original: Yeah, from Group 14. Hey, how you holding up, Captain?
Key.Chinese: 是阿，他來自14分隊。嘿，你怎麼也拿起裝備了，上尉?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是阿，他来自14大队。嘿，你还好吗，上校？

Key.Original: And Truck? How you doing back there?
Key.Chinese: 還有"卡車"?你有沒有怎麼樣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有"卡车"？你有没有怎么样？

Key.Original: So, this is Miller?
Key.Chinese: 所以，這就是米勒?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，这就是米勒？

Key.Original: I've been better.
Key.Chinese: 我已經好多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我已经好多了。

Key.Original: Salvo, shut it. Raider 2, move to exfil.
Key.Chinese: 薩爾沃，閉嘴。"突襲者2"，往前移動到撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 萨尔沃，闭嘴。"突袭者2"，往前移动到撤离点。

Key.Original: So what, Truck, you're like a bullet magnet these days?
Key.Chinese: 哈，"卡車"，你最近是個子彈磁鐵喔?
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈，"卡车"，你最近是个子弹磁铁喔？

Key.Original: I'm good, I'm good.
Key.Chinese: 我很好，我很好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我很好，我很好。

Key.Original: Hit my plate. Put me on my ass - but no real injuries.
Key.Chinese: 子彈擊中我的防彈衣。讓我跌坐到地板上-但沒有真正受傷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 子弹击中我的防弹衣。给我狠狠来了下—但没有真正受伤。

Container.name: 00_MoveToBeach
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;
Container.situation: right at the start of the mission, players are told to move to the extraction point

Key.Original: I say again, waterborne asset inbound. Callsign Kingfish 1. All callsigns move to primary exfil.
Key.Chinese: 我重複一遍，水上單位正在抵達。呼號為"王魚1"。所有單位請前往第一撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我重复一遍，水上单位正在抵达。呼号为"王鱼1"。所有单位请前往第一撤离点。

Key.Original: Understood. Be aware, Syndikat PAC's still observed in the area.
Key.Chinese: 了解。請留意，我們仍觀察到有辛迪加的人員在附近活動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。请留意，我们仍观察到有辛迪加的人员在附近活动。

Key.Original: Roger. Raider 1 stays with Keystone, Raider 2 will move on point. Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。"突襲者1"會待在"基石"旁邊，"突襲者2"會為我們開路。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。"突袭者1"会待在"基石"旁边，"突袭者2"会为我们开路。完毕。

Key.Original: Watchtower
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"

Key.Original: Eliminate the Technicals
Key.Chinese: 殲滅武裝越野車
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭武装越野车

Key.Original: Destroy the patrolling technicals.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀正在巡邏的武裝越野車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁正在巡逻的武装越野车。

Key.Original: Technical 3
Key.Chinese: 3號武裝越野車
Key.Chinesesimp: 3号武装越野车

Key.Original: Eliminate the third technical.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅第三臺武裝越野車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭第三辆武装越野车。

Key.Original: Technical 2
Key.Chinese: 2號武裝越野車
Key.Chinesesimp: 2号武装越野车

Key.Original: Eliminate the second technical.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅第二臺武裝越野車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭第二辆武装越野车。

Key.Original: Technical 1
Key.Chinese: 1號武裝越野車
Key.Chinesesimp: 1号武装越野车

Key.Original: Eliminate the first technical.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅第一臺武裝越野車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭第一辆武装越野车。

Key.Original:
Captain Miller has revealed to us the existence of CSAT's clandestine operatives, codename 'Viper', and has confirmed their base of operations to be on %1Sosovu Island%2, a former Japanese stronghold last occupied during the Second World War.

Worryingly still, we have reason to believe that Viper are housing an Eastwind Device on the island capable of triggering a natural disaster.

Your mission is to locate the Device, secure it and any other intel you find, and assist with its extraction.
Key.Chinese:
米勒上校向我們介紹了廣協同盟的特戰部隊，代號為'毒蛇'，而他們的作戰基地也被發現架設在%1索索武島%2上，該島曾被日本在二次世界大戰時當作要塞堡壘。

令人擔憂的是，我們相信"毒蛇"在島上裝設了一種叫做東風的裝置，此裝置能夠引起自然災害。

你們的任務是去找到這個裝置，搶到它與任何關於它的情報，並協助撤離這個裝置。
Key.Chinesesimp:
米勒上校向我们介绍了广协的特战部队，代号为'毒蛇'，而他们的作战基地也被发现架设在%1索索武岛%2上，该岛曾被日本在二次世界大战时当作要塞堡垒。

令人担忧的是，我们相信"毒蛇"在岛上装设了一种叫做东风的装置，此装置能够引起自然灾害。

你们的任务是去找到这个装置，抢到它与任何关于它的情报，并协助撤离这个装置。

Key.Original: 16:30 Hours
Thursday, August 16th, 2035
Key.Chinese: 2035年，8月16日，星期四
Key.Chinesesimp: 2035年，8月16日，星期四

Key.Original: Sosovu Island, western Tanoa
Key.Chinese: 塔諾亞西部，索索武島
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚西部，索索武岛

Key.Original:
%1Raider 1%2 - Lead element.
%3Raider 2%2 - Your team.
Watchtower - CTRG Headquarters.
Keystone - Captain Miller.
Key.Chinese:
%1"突襲者1"%2-領導小隊。
%3"突襲者2"%2-你的小隊。
"守望塔"-戰研小組指揮部。
"基石"-米勒上校。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%1"突袭者1"%2-指挥分队。
%3"突袭者2"%2-你的小组。
"守望塔"-战研大队指挥部。
"基石"-米勒上校。

Key.Original: Rendezvous with Miller
Key.Chinese: 與米勒會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与米勒会合

Key.Original: Miller has located %1Viper's base of operations%2. Meet him there.
Key.Chinese: 米勒已經找到了%1"毒蛇"的作戰基地%2。與他在那裡碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒已经找到了%1"毒蛇"的作战基地%2。与他在那里碰面。

Key.Original: Washington
Key.Chinese: '華盛頓'點
Key.Chinesesimp: '华盛顿'点

Key.Original: Virginia
Key.Chinese: '弗吉尼亞'點
Key.Chinesesimp: '弗吉尼亚'点

Key.Original: Viper Base
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇"基地
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇"基地

Key.Original: Texas
Key.Chinese: '德克薩斯'點
Key.Chinesesimp: '德克萨斯'点

Key.Original: Near Landing Area
Key.Chinese: 靠近登陸區
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近登陆区

Key.Original: Nebraska
Key.Chinese: '內布拉斯加'點
Key.Chinesesimp: '内布拉斯加'点

Key.Original: Near Washington
Key.Chinese: 靠近'華盛頓'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近'华盛顿'点

Key.Original: Near Virginia
Key.Chinese: 靠近'弗吉尼亞'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近'弗吉尼亚'点

Key.Original: Near Texas
Key.Chinese: 靠近'德克薩斯'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近'德克萨斯'点

Key.Original: Near Nebraska
Key.Chinese: 靠近'內布拉斯加'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近'内布拉斯加'点

Key.Original: Near Montana
Key.Chinese: 靠近'蒙大拿'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近'蒙大拿'点

Key.Original: Montana
Key.Chinese: '蒙大拿'點
Key.Chinesesimp: '蒙大拿'点

Key.Original: Landing Area
Key.Chinese: 登陸區
Key.Chinesesimp: 登陆区

Key.Original: Insertion Point
Key.Chinese: 進入點
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入点

Key.Original: Raider 2
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"

Key.Original: Raider 1
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"

Key.Original: Clear Montana
Key.Chinese: 肅清'蒙大拿'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清'蒙大拿'点

Key.Original: Remove all hostiles from the vicinity of the eastern outpost, codename %1'Montana'%2.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅東邊前哨裡的所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭东边前哨里的所有敌人。

Key.Original: Clear Nebraska
Key.Chinese: 肅清'內布拉斯加'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清'内布拉斯加'点

Key.Original: Remove all hostiles from the vicinity of the north-western outpost, codename %1'Nebraska'%2.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅西北邊前哨裡的所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭西北边前哨里的所有敌人。

Key.Original: Clear Virginia
Key.Chinese: 肅清'弗吉尼亞'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清'弗吉尼亚'点

Key.Original: Remove all hostiles from the vicinity of the western outpost, codename %1'Virginia'%2.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅西邊前哨裡的所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭西边前哨里的所有敌人。

Key.Original: Clear Washington
Key.Chinese: 肅清'華盛頓'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清'华盛顿'点

Key.Original: Remove all hostiles from the vicinity of the south-western outpost, codename %1'Washington'%2.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅西南邊前哨裡的所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭西南边前哨里的所有敌人。

Key.Original: Clear Texas
Key.Chinese: 肅清'德克薩斯'點
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清'德克萨斯'点

Key.Original: Remove all hostiles from the vicinity of the central outpost, codename %1'Texas'%2.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅中部前哨裡的所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭中部前哨里的所有敌人。

Key.Original: Eliminate the Patrol
Key.Chinese: 殲滅巡邏隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭巡逻队

Key.Original: Neutralize the remnants of the %1enemy patrol%2.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅剩餘的%1敵軍巡邏隊%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭剩余的%1敌军巡逻队%2。

Key.Original: Acting on intel uncovered by Captain Miller, Group 15 are sent to a former WW2 outpost in search of Viper.
Key.Chinese: 藉由米勒上校所提供的情報，15分隊被派往去一座第二次世界大戰的舊前哨，尋找"毒蛇"的蹤跡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 借由米勒上校所提供的情报，15大队被派往去一座第二次世界大战的旧前哨，寻找"毒蛇"的踪迹。

Key.Original: 06 Apex Protocol
Key.Chinese: 06頂尖協議
Key.Chinesesimp: 06 Apex 协议

Key.Original:
%1You%2 will %3insert%2 on %4Sosovu Island%2 and, with the assistance of Captain Miller, remove all enemy forces from its shores before proceeding to locate Viper's base of operations. The objective is the safe extraction of the Eastwind Device.

%5Raider 1%2 will clear %6Yasa Island%2, concentrating on the %7enemy mortar%2 position. Once their objectives have been met, they will assist you with the capture of %4Sosovu Island%2.
Key.Chinese:
%1你們%2將要%3進入%2到%4索索武島%2上，然後在米勒上校的協助下，殲滅所有藏在據點裡的敵人，最後再找出"毒蛇"作戰基地的位置。最終目標是撤離出東風裝置。

%5"突襲者1"%2將負責肅清%6雅撒島%2，處裡掉%7敵人的迫擊砲%2。當他們的目標完成後，他們便會過來幫助你們佔領%4S索索武島%2。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%1你们%2将要%3进入%2到%4索索武岛%2上，然后在米勒上校的协助下，歼灭所有藏在据点里的敌人，最后再找出"毒蛇"作战基地的位置。最终目标是撤离出东风装置。

%5"突袭者1"%2将负责肃清%6雅撒岛%2，处理掉%7敌人的迫击炮%2。当他们的目标完成后，他们便会过来帮助你们占领%4索索武岛%2。

Key.Original: Rendezvous with Miller
Key.Chinese: 與米勒會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与米勒会合

Key.Original: Rendezvous with Captain Miller at his position.
Key.Chinese: 去米勒的位置與他碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去米勒的位置与他碰面。

Key.Original: Clear the Landing Area
Key.Chinese: 肅清登陸區
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清登陆区

Key.Original: Remove all hostile forces in the vicinity of the landing area on the northern coast.
Key.Chinese: 肅清北海岸邊的登陸區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清北海岸边的登陆区。

Key.Original: Keystone
Key.Chinese: "基石"
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"

Key.Original: Insertion Point
Key.Chinese: 進入點
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入点

Key.Original:
1. Capture %1Sosovu Island%2.
2. Locate Viper's base of operations.
3. Secure and extract the Eastwind Device.
Key.Chinese:
1. 佔領%1索索武島%2。
2.尋找"毒蛇"的作戰基地。
3.確保並撤離東風裝置。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 占领%1索索武岛%2。
2.寻找"毒蛇"的作战基地。
3.确保并撤离东风装置。

Key.Original: Sosovu Island was captured and Viper's base of operations was discovered. However, the Eastwind Device has disappeared.
Key.Chinese: 索索武島已成功被我們佔領，而"毒蛇"的作戰基地也被我們找到。然而東風裝置卻不翼而飛了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 索索武岛已成功被我们占领，而"毒蛇"的作战基地也被我们找到。然而东风装置却不翼而飞了。

Key.Original: Investigate the Drone
Key.Chinese: 調查無人機
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查无人机

Key.Original: Move to the drone and investigate.
Key.Chinese: 過去調查無人機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 过去调查无人机。

Key.Original: Capture the Island
Key.Chinese: 佔領島嶼
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领岛屿

Key.Original: Eliminate all Syndikat forces on %1Sosovu Island%2.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅所有在%1索索武島%2上的辛迪加人員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭所有在%1索索武岛%2上的辛迪加人员。

Key.Original: Apex Protocol
Key.Chinese: 頂尖協議
Key.Chinesesimp: Apex 协议

Container.name: x20_Drone_Info
Container.situation: miller still relays the information about the drones

Key.Original: What I was going to suggest was that you may be able to hack Viper's network using that drone.
Key.Chinese: 我剛剛建議你們的方法，是叫你們去駭入"毒蛇"的網路來取得他們無人機的操縱權。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我刚刚建议你们的方法，是叫你们去侵入"毒蛇"的网络来取得他们无人机的操纵权。

Key.Original: If you happen across any more drones on your adventures, feel free to give it a shot.
Key.Chinese: 這樣只要你們有遇到任何一臺無人機，你們就可以把它搶過來使用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这样只要你们有遇到任何一台无人机，你们就可以把它抢过来使用。

Key.Original: You'll need a terminal to do so. Check their cargo bins, there may be one there.
Key.Chinese: 但你們必須擁有終端機才能連線。去檢查他們的包包或是箱子，那邊應該會有一個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但你们必须拥有终端才能连接。去检查他们的包包或是箱子，那边应该会有一个。

Container.name: x15_Skipped
Container.situation: players skipped the patrol and/or the drone

Key.Original: Fine. I'll do it myself.
Key.Chinese: 算了。我自己來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 算了。我自己来。

Container.name: x10_Skipping_Drone
Container.situation: players eliminated the patrol but are ignoring the drone

Key.Original: Raider 2, I thought I told you to check the drone.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我認為我剛剛是要你們去檢查那個無人機。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我认为我刚刚是要你们去检查那个无人机。

Container.name: x05_Skipping_Patrol
Container.situation: players are choosing to ignore the patrol

Key.Original: Raider 2, we need to dust that patrol.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我們必須解決掉那個巡邏隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我们必须解决掉那个巡逻队。

Container.name: x01_Skipped_Miller
Container.situation: players ignored rendezvousing with miller

Key.Original: Gents, when I give you an order, I expect you to follow it.
Key.Chinese: 先生們，當我下達一個命令的時候，我期待你們是可以照辦的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先生们，当我下达一个命令的时候，我期待你们是可以照办的。

Key.Original: 3 times Syndikat PAC's to the north. Sort them out.
Key.Chinese: 3名辛迪加的人員在北面。解決掉他們，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 3名辛迪加的人员在北面。解决掉他们，通话完毕。

Container.name: b30_GreenLight
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Miller MIL;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: operation given a green light

Key.Original: Agreed.
Key.Chinese: 同意。
Key.Chinesesimp: 同意。

Key.Original: The operation has a green light. Go get this done, Scott.
Key.Chinese: 作戰行動已開始。去完成這個任務，斯考特。
Key.Chinesesimp: 作战行动已开始。去完成这个任务，斯考特。

Key.Original: Alright. We can deal with the operational specifics once we're connected.
Key.Chinese: 好的。當我們握有這些後便能搞清楚所有的細節。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。当我们握有这些后便能搞清楚所有的细节。

Container.name: b25_OnMission
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Miller MIL;
Container.situation: commander explains mission

Key.Original: Two teams are en route to Balavu province now. Time is of the essence.
Key.Chinese: 兩隊人馬正在前往巴拉武省。兵貴神速。
Key.Chinesesimp: 两队人马正在前往巴拉武省。兵贵神速。

Key.Original: The priority is finding the Eastwind Device and any intel related to it.
Key.Chinese: 優先目標是找到東風裝置，並取回任何有相關的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 优先目标是找到东风装置，并取回任何有相关的情报。

Key.Original: Exactly. We need to hit them now before Viper can fold their operation.
Key.Chinese: 沒錯。我們現在就得進攻"毒蛇"，搶在他們把東西都運走之前。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错。我们现在就得进攻"毒蛇"，抢在他们把东西都运走之前。

Key.Original: We'll run ashore, advance into the island, and flush Viper out of hiding.
Key.Chinese: 我們將從岸邊登陸，向島內進攻，把"毒蛇"從他們的窩給踹出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将从岸边登陆，向岛内进攻，把"毒蛇"从他们的窝给踹出来。

Container.name: b23_ViperBlackSite
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Miller MIL;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: miller explains viper black site

Key.Original: And, what? Syndikat leadership just plays along with CSAT's 'earthquake weapon'?
Key.Chinese: 什麼?你是說辛迪加的老大一直在跟廣協同盟合作使用這項'地震武器'?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么？你是说辛迪加的老大一直在跟广协合作使用这项'地震武器'？

Key.Original: I see. So, what's the situation now?
Key.Chinese: 我懂了。所以，現在的狀況如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我懂了。所以，现在的状况如何？

Key.Original: I can't say if Warlock knows who he's really dealing with, let alone that they may be responsible for the disaster. Frankly, it's not my concern.
Key.Chinese: 我不清楚"術士"是否真的知道它正在面對著些什麼，更不用說他可能也要為災難負上點責任。坦白來說，這我並不關心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不清楚"术士"是否真的知道它正在面对着些什么，更不用说他可能也要为灾难负上点责任。坦白来说，这我并不关心。

Key.Original: Just before I was captured, I discovered the existence of a Viper black site. What I care about is getting some concrete intel.
Key.Chinese: 就在我被抓到之前，我發現到一處"毒蛇"的秘密藏匿點。我急迫想獲得一些重要的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就在我被抓到之前，我发现到一处"毒蛇"的秘密藏匿点。我急迫想获得一些重要的情报。

Container.name: b20_ProjectEastwind
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Miller MIL;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: miller introduces project eastwind

Key.Original: Project Eastwind. One sec, I'll bring it up.
Key.Chinese: 東風計劃。稍等，讓我打開它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 东风计划。稍等，让我打开它。

Key.Original: 'Viper'? Where have I heard that before..?
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇"?我好像在哪裡有聽過...?
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇"？我好像在哪里有听过...？

Key.Original: The fact is, we have scant intel. The little we have is classified.
Key.Chinese: 事實上，我們只握有一點的情報。而這些都是機密內容。
Key.Chinesesimp: 事实上，我们只握有一点的情报。而这些都是机密内容。

Key.Original: CTRG has been tracking a clandestine network of CSAT operatives. We know them as 'Viper'.
Key.Chinese: 戰研小組一直都在追蹤廣協同盟秘密部隊的通訊網路。這就是我們所知道的"毒蛇"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战研大队一直都在追踪广协秘密部队的通信网络。这就是我们所知道的"毒蛇"。

Key.Original: Group 14 got close in the Med, but the opportunity slipped away.
Key.Chinese: 14分隊曾經差點在地中海抓住他們，但最後還是錯失了機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 14大队曾经差点在地中海抓住他们，但最后还是错失了机会。

Key.Original: Bottom line: we believe Viper possess the means - a device - to trigger a natural disaster.
Key.Chinese: 重點是:我們相信"毒蛇"握有一種裝置-可以用它來引發自然災難。
Key.Chinesesimp: 重点是：我们相信"毒蛇"握有一种装置—可以用它来引发自然灾难。

Key.Original: It's clear they're using Tanoan dissidents as cover.
Key.Chinese: 他們現在很明顯是使用Tanoa上的異議人士來充當掩護。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们现在很明显是使用塔诺亚上的持不同政见组织充当掩护。

Container.name: b15_CSATAgenda
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Miller MIL;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: miller reveals csat agenda

Key.Original: Let's get to the meat of this, shall we?
Key.Chinese: 就讓我們直接把話講明吧，好嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 就让我们直接把话讲明吧，好吗？

Key.Original: Hold on now, that makes no sense. It was a goddamn Tsunami, Captain.
Key.Chinese: 等一下，這不符合邏輯啊。這應該是該死的海嘯所造成的，上尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等一下，这不符合逻辑啊。那是场该死的海啸啊，上校。

Key.Original: As we understand it, they aim to destabilise the region by proxy.
Key.Chinese: 正如同我們所知道的，他們是透過代理人來干涉一個區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正如同我们所知道的，他们是通过代理人来干涉一个区域。

Key.Original: In fact, it's my opinion that they're responsible for the Pacific disaster itself.
Key.Chinese: 事實上，就我認為他們也要為這場太平洋災難來負責。
Key.Chinesesimp: 事实上，就我认为他们也要为这场太平洋灾难来负责。

Key.Original: Caused by an sub-sea earthquake.
Key.Chinese: 由海底的地震所引起的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 由海底的地震所引起的。

Container.name: b10_CSATConnection
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Miller MIL;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: miller explains csat connection

Key.Original: Go on, Scott.
Key.Chinese: 繼續講，斯考特。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续讲，斯考特。

Key.Original: Wait. You guys have been operating here before we brought you in to deal with our Syndikat problem?
Key.Chinese: 等等。你們在我們把你們請過來對付辛迪加之前便已經在這裡了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 等等。你们在我们把你们请过来对付辛迪加之前便已经在这里了？

Key.Original: Over the past 4 weeks I've been on the ground and - in the last 4 days - focused on the Northern Division.
Key.Chinese: 在過去的4個星期中，我便已經開始行動-而在過去的4天裡-則是專注在北部的區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在过去的4个星期中，我便已经开始行动—而在过去的4天里—则是专注在北部的区域。

Key.Original: Yes. Although the connection wasn't clear, at first.
