Key.Chinese: 是的。儘管剛開始所有的連結都不是那麼的清楚。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。尽管刚开始所有的连结都不是那么的清楚。

Key.Original: It's clear now that a covert CSAT presence has been giving Syndikat all sorts of hardware.
Key.Chinese: 但現在我們已經知悉是廣協同盟在辛迪加的背後一直提供他們各式各樣的裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但现在我们已经知悉是广协在辛迪加的背后一直提供他们各式各样的装备。

Container.name: b05_MillerIntro
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Miller MIL;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commander introduces miller, who's in the field

Key.Original: Okay, we're on with CTRG 2 i/c, Captain, Scott Miller. Callsign: Keystone. Scott, you there?
Key.Chinese: 好的，我們正與戰研小組情蒐人員，上尉，史考特·米勒通話。呼號:"基石"。史考特，你在嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们正与战研大队情搜人员，上校，斯考特·米勒通话。呼号："基石"。斯考特，你在吗？

Key.Original: Scott, I'm here with our NATO SOF Liaison, Vince Broadale.
Key.Chinese: 史考特，我現在旁邊這位是北約特戰部隊的聯絡官，文思·布羅戴爾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯考特，我现在旁边这位是北约特战部队的联络官，文斯·布罗戴尔。

Key.Original: Okay, Scott, bring Vince up to speed. Everything you know.
Key.Chinese: 好的，斯考特，講出所有你知道的事情。讓文思了解狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，斯考特，讲出所有你知道的事情。让文斯了解状况。

Key.Original: Loud and clear, boss.
Key.Chinese: 非常清楚，老大。
Key.Chinesesimp: 非常清楚，老大。

Key.Original: Good to hear from you, Captain.
Key.Chinese: 很高興聽見你，上尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴听见你，上校。

Container.name: b01_BriefingStart
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: starting the briefing

Key.Original: Ready? We're on a timeline here.
Key.Chinese: 好了嗎?現在是個重要的時刻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了吗？现在是个重要的时刻。

Key.Original: Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了。

Container.name: 95_Apex
Container.situation: miller shows players what he discovered

Key.Original: Good to see you, Raider 2. Looks like we've hit the jackpot.
Key.Chinese: 很高興見到你們，"突襲者2"。看來我們中頭獎了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴见到你们，"突袭者2"。看来我们中头奖了。

Key.Original: There's some key data here. Maps, schematics, documents, imagery.
Key.Chinese: 這裡還有一些關鍵資料。地圖，藍圖，文件與照片等等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里还有一些关键资料。地图，蓝图，文件与照片等等。

Key.Original: Highly classified CSAT material. It all points to some type of doctrine.
Key.Chinese: 都是些廣協同盟的最高機密。它們都指向到一種協議上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 都是些广协的最高机密。它们都指向到一种协议上。

Key.Original: But it seems we have bigger problems. The Eastwind Device was here. Now it's not.
Key.Chinese: 但目前看來我們有個更大的問題。東風裝置本來在這裡。但卻不見了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但目前看来我们有个更大的问题。东风装置本来在这里。但却不见了。

Container.name: 90_Rendezvous
Container.participants: EXC B Miller;EXC B CTRG Commander;
Container.situation: miller updates situation, hq tells players to rv with him

Key.Original: Roger, sending transport. The helicopter's turn-around is gonna be longer than expected. You may as well dig-in. Out to you.
Key.Chinese: 收到，正在派遣運輸載具過去。要把直升機掉轉過來或許還需要一段時間。你先原地防守。對你通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，正在派遣运输载具过去。要把直升机掉转过来或许还需要一段时间。你先原地防守。对你通话完毕。

Key.Original: Raider 2, RV with Keystone and post security until transport arrives. Out.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，去與"基石"會合並鞏固該地直到運輸載具的抵達。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，去与"基石"会合并巩固该地直到运输载具的抵达。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Alright. ENDEX.
Key.Chinese: 好的。工作結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。工作结束。

Key.Original: Boss, I've located Viper's FOB. Grid 028-094. Roger my last, over.
Key.Chinese: 老大，我已經找到了"毒蛇"的前線作戰基地。座標是028-094。有收到嗎，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 老大，我已经找到了"毒蛇"的前线作战基地。座标是028-094。有收到吗，完毕。

Container.name: 85_Self_Destruct
Container.situation: viper activates the self destruct on their drones

Key.Original: Shit. Viper's activated a kill-switch.
Key.Chinese: 該死。"毒蛇"他們開啟了無人機的自毀開關。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。"毒蛇"他们开启了无人机的自毁开关。

Key.Original: They're detonating the drones. Get away from them, rapid!
Key.Chinese: 他們正在引爆無人機。快從無人機的旁邊離開，快!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们正在引爆无人机。快从无人机的旁边离开，快！

Container.name: 80_Island_Captured
Container.situation: hq tells players they've secured the island

Key.Original: Raider 2, Watchtower. All points of interest are clear. Great work.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，這裡是"守望塔"。所有目標點皆已肅清。幹的好。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，这里是"守望塔"。所有目标点皆已肃清。干的好。

Container.name: 75_Corpses
Container.situation: miller discovers viper corpses, suggests they were double-crossed by syndikat

Key.Original: Riker, looks like Syndikat caught up with Viper. It's a mess.
Key.Chinese: 瑞克，看來辛迪加他們逮到了"毒蛇"。這裡一片混亂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 瑞克，看来辛迪加他们逮到了"毒蛇"。这里一片混乱。

Key.Original: Syndikat double-cross.
Key.Chinese: 辛迪加黑吃黑了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加黑吃黑了。

Key.Original: Indeed. Keystone out.
Key.Chinese: 確實。"基石"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确实。"基石"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Syndikat double-cross?
Key.Chinese: 辛迪加黑吃黑?
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加黑吃黑？

Key.Original: This just got interesting.
Key.Chinese: 這真是越來越有趣了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这真是越来越有趣了。

Container.name: 70_Drone_Destroyed
Container.situation: one of the drones the players were using was destroyed

Key.Original: Looks like you lost a drone, Raider 2. Seems they're pretty fragile. Use them sparingly.
Key.Chinese: 看來你用壞了一架無人機，"突襲者2"。它們本身都很脆弱。請小心使用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来你用坏了一辆无人车，"突袭者2"。它们本身都很脆弱。请小心使用。

Container.name: 65_Terminal_Reminder
Container.situation: miller reminds players that they'll need a terminal to access whichever drone they've discovered

Key.Original: You'll need a terminal to slave that drone.
Key.Chinese: 你們必須使用終端機才能控制那臺無人機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们必须使用终端才能控制那台无人车。

Container.name: 60_Turret_Spotted
Container.situation: players discover an autonomous turret for the first time

Key.Original: You're looking at CSAT's autonomous grenade turret. Hoofin piece of kit.
Key.Chinese: 你們找到了廣協同盟的自動榴彈砲塔。使用腳架來站立。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们找到了广协的自动榴弹炮塔。使用脚架来站立。

Key.Original: It's extremely temperamental, but the 20mil will ruin anyone's day.
Key.Chinese: 這槍氣質非凡，20公厘的榴彈絕對能讓對方哭的哇哇叫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这枪气质非凡，20mm 榴弹绝对能让对方哭的哇哇叫。

Container.name: 55_UGV_Spotted
Container.situation: players discover a ugv for the first time

Key.Original: That's a 'Saif' UGV. Basically a remote weapon system.
Key.Chinese: 這是臺"薩夫"地面無人載具。基本上就是一種遙控武器系統。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是辆"萨夫"无人车。基本上就是一种遥控武器系统。

Key.Original: While not invincible, it's accurate as hell, and sports a fifty and a 20 mil GL.
Key.Chinese: 雖然不是完全無敵，但他的準頭不錯，而且能有效的越野各種地形，裝備著20公厘口徑榴彈槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 虽然不是完全无敌，但他的准头不错，而且能有效通过各种地形，装备20mm 榴弹发射器。

Container.name: 50_Terminal_Spotted
Container.situation: players spot the control station for the aerial drone

Key.Original: That station controls an aerial drone, Raider 2. You'll need a UAV terminal to hack it.
Key.Chinese: 這個控制站連接著空中無人載具，"突襲者2"。你們必須使用終端機來駭進去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个控制站连接着一架无人机，"突袭者2"。你们必须使用终端来黑进去。

Container.name: 45_Reveal
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Salvo;EXC B Grimm;EXC B Miller;
Container.situation: hq confirms the island has been taken over by syndikat

Key.Original: All callsigns, SITREP.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫所有單位，狀況回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼叫所有单位，状况回报。

Key.Original: A large Syndikat incursion force has run ashore north of Sosovu Island's main settlement. Several mounted and dismounted PAC's observed.
Key.Chinese: 一大群辛迪加的入侵部隊被發現在索索武島主村莊的北海岸邊。已觀察到多名人員與載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一大群辛迪加的入侵部队被发现在索索武岛主村庄的北海岸边。已观察到多名乘车和下车人员。

Key.Original: Intel's of the same mind. We're running contingencies now.
Key.Chinese: 我們這邊的情報也是這樣。我們正遇到一個意外的狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们这边的情报也是这样。我们正遇到意外状况。

Key.Original: Even though Syndikat's sub-par, complacency kills. Stay sharp. Out.
Key.Chinese: 儘管辛迪加他們很弱，跑來這送死。我們仍得保持警覺。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管辛迪加他们很弱，跑来这送死。我们仍得保持警觉。通话完毕。

Key.Original: I doubt Viper would invite a bunch of thugs to run around their FOB.
Key.Chinese: 我很懷疑"毒蛇"他們竟然會邀請一群暴徒來參觀他們的前線作戰基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我很怀疑"毒蛇"他们竟然会邀请一群暴徒来参观他们的前线作战基地。

Key.Original: Sounds like Syndikat are pissed off.
Key.Chinese: 感覺是辛迪加被惹毛了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感觉是辛迪加被惹毛了。

Key.Original: It's possible Syndikat learned of Project Eastwind.
Key.Chinese: 很有可能是辛迪加也知道了東風計劃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很有可能是辛迪加也知道了东风计划。

Container.name: 40_Drones_Attack
Container.situation: miller tells players to use the drones to their advantage

Key.Original: If you can get close, you should be able to slave control to your terminal.
Key.Chinese: 假如你們夠靠近控制站的話，你們就能轉移控制權限到手上的終端機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你们够靠近控制站的话，你们就能转移控制权限到手上的终端。

Key.Original: Fuck. Looks like their guidance systems are offline. You'll have to pilot them manually.
Key.Chinese: 該死。看來他們的導引系統皆已離線。你們必須手動操縱了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。看来他们的导引系统都已离线。你们必须手动操纵了。

Key.Original: As you crack that task, I'll recce the Viper black site. Have fun with your new toys.
Key.Chinese: 當你們忙著完成任務時，我會先去偵察"毒蛇"的秘密據點。祝你們與你們的新玩具玩得愉快。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当你们忙着完成任务时，我会先去侦察"毒蛇"的秘密据点。祝你们与你们的新玩具玩得愉快。

Container.name: 35_UAV_First
Container.situation: players connected to the aerial drone first

Key.Original: You should also be able to see what grid the other drones are in, too.
Key.Chinese: 你們應該也能看到其他無人機的各自座標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们应该也能看到其他无人机的各自坐标。

Container.name: 30_UAV_Connected
Container.situation: players connected to the aerial drone

Key.Original: Aerial drone's all yours. Control authority transferred to your terminal.
Key.Chinese: 空中無人載具已是你們的了。控制權限已轉移到你們手上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 无人机是你们的了。控制权限已转移到你们手上。

Container.name: 25_Drones_Revealed
Container.situation: players connected to the ground-based drones first

Key.Original: You should now see the locations of the remaining drones on the island.
Key.Chinese: 你們現在應該可以看到島上剩下的無人機位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们现在应该可以看到岛上剩下的无人机位置。

Key.Original: Looks like Viper's got one circling overhead, too. You'll need to access its control station if you want to use it.
Key.Chinese: 看來"毒蛇"已經讓它們的其中一個盤旋在我們頭上了。你們必須透過它們的控制站才能登入這些無人機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来"毒蛇"已经让它们的其中一个盘旋在我们头上了。你们必须通过它们的控制站才能登入这些无人机。

Container.name: 20_Drone_Connected
Container.situation: players broke into enemy drone network

Key.Original: Alright. You're in.
Key.Chinese: 好的。你們進去了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。你们进去了。

Container.name: 15_Drone_Connect
Container.situation: miller tells players to tap into the drone network

Key.Original: Hm. Fucking thing's unserviceable.
Key.Chinese: 嗯。該死，這臺壞了
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯。该死，这台坏了

Key.Original: Raider 2, that drone'll be connected to Viper's network. If you have a terminal, try to force your way in.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，這無人機是與"毒蛇"的網路一起連接的。假如你們有終端機的話，請試著登入看看。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，这无人机是与"毒蛇"的网络一起连接的。假如你们有终端的话，请试着登入看看。

Key.Original: May even be one in its cargo bins.
Key.Chinese: 它的貨箱裡或許會有一個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它的货箱里或许会有一个。

Container.name: 10_Patrol_Dead
Container.situation: players eliminate the enemy patrol

Key.Original: That's all of them.
Key.Chinese: 都解決了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 都解决了。

Key.Original: ... Raider 2, move in on that drone please.
Key.Chinese: ..."突襲者2"，請移動到那邊的無人機旁。
Key.Chinesesimp: ..."突袭者2"，请移动到那边的无人机旁。

Container.name: 105_ApexReport
Container.participants: EXC B Miller;EXC B CTRG Commander;
Container.situation: miller updates hq on the situation

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Keystone. Grab whatever intel you can - and get us some footage of that Viper camp.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"基石"。拿取所有能拿的情報-然後用畫面給我們看一下"毒蛇"的營地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"基石"。拿取所有能拿的情报—然后用画面给我们看一下"毒蛇"的营地。

Key.Original: Watchtower, Keystone. Objective is now clear.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，這裡是"基石"。目標已安全。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，这里是"基石"。目标已安全。

Key.Original: We've located the Viper black site, but no sign of the Device. I say again, Eastwind Device is not here, over.
Key.Chinese: 我們已找遍了"毒蛇"的秘密據點，但卻沒有看到裝置。我重複一遍，東風裝置不在這裡，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已找遍了"毒蛇"的秘密据点，但却没有看到装置。我重复一遍，东风装置不在这里，完毕。

Key.Original: Roger. Sending feed now.
Key.Chinese: 收到。正在傳送畫面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。正在传送画面。

Container.name: 05_Surprised
Container.situation: support lead informs others they're not facing viper so far

Key.Original: Raider 2, Raider 1, SITREP. We've got Syndikat PAC's on Yasa Island.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，這裡是"突襲者1"，狀況回報。我們已在雅撒島上遭遇辛迪加的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，这里是"突袭者1"，状况回报。我们已在雅撒岛上遭遇辛迪加的人。

Key.Original: Looks like they're part of this mess, too. Keep your eyes open.
Key.Chinese: 看起來他們也有參與這場混亂。保持警戒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看起来他们也有参与这场混乱。保持警戒。

Container.name: 03_Patrol
Container.situation: miller tells players about the patrol

Key.Original: Sighting. We have 3 times PAC's, 11 o'clock, lightly armed. Oddly enough, they're Syndikat.
Key.Chinese: 偵察中。有3名人員，11點鐘方向，輕武裝。奇怪的是，他們是辛迪加。
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察中。有3名人员，11点钟方向，轻武装。奇怪的是，他们是辛迪加。

Key.Original: Move up. Dust 'em.
Key.Chinese: 前進。解決掉他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前进。解决掉他们。

Key.Original: Mortar Position
Key.Chinese: 迫擊砲位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 迫击炮位置

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EXC B Miller;EXC B CTRG Commander;
Container.situation: hq connects the feed, miller tells players to regroup

Key.Original: Keystone, Watchtower, we're synced.
Key.Chinese: "基石"，這裡是"守望塔"，訊號已同步。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"，这里是"守望塔"，信号已同步。

Key.Original: Roger. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Raider 2, on me.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，过来。

Key.Original: 48 Hours before Keystone Extraction
Key.Chinese: "基石"撤離行動前48小時
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"撤离行动前48小时

Key.Original: Destroy the 4th Stockpile
Key.Chinese: 摧毀第四批庫存
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁第四批库存

Key.Original: Destroy the fourth stockpile of Syndikat supplies.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀辛迪加的第四批補給庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁辛迪加的第四批补给库存。

Key.Original: Destroy the 3rd Stockpile
Key.Chinese: 摧毀第三批庫存
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁第三批库存

Key.Original: Destroy the third stockpile of Syndikat supplies.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀辛迪加的第三批補給庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁辛迪加的第三批补给库存。

Key.Original: Destroy the 2nd Stockpile
Key.Chinese: 摧毀第二批庫存
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁第二批库存

Key.Original: Destroy the second stockpile of Syndikat supplies.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀辛迪加的第二批補給庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁辛迪加的第二批补给库存。

Key.Original: Destroy the 1st Stockpile
Key.Chinese: 摧毀第一批庫存
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁第一批库存

Key.Original: Destroy the first stockpile of Syndikat supplies.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀辛迪加的第一批補給庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁辛迪加的第一批补给库存。

Key.Original: Extract
Key.Chinese: 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离

Key.Original: Rendezvous with Angel 3-2 at the %2abandoned observatory%1.
Key.Chinese: 與"天使3-2"在%2廢棄的觀測站%1會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"天使3-2"在%2废弃的观测站%1会合。

Key.Original: Destroy Remaining Stockpiles
Key.Chinese: 摧毀剩餘的庫存
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁剩余的库存

Key.Original: Destroy the remaining supply stockpiles.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀剩餘的補給庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁剩余的补给库存。

Key.Original: Leave the Area
Key.Chinese: 離開該區
Key.Chinesesimp: 离开该区

Key.Original: Exfil from the vicinity of the lumberyard.
Key.Chinese: 離開儲木廠的附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 离开储木厂的附近。

Key.Original: Destroy Supply Stockpiles
Key.Chinese: 摧毀補給庫存
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁补给库存

Key.Original: Locate and destroy all Syndikat supply stockpiles within the lumberyard.
Key.Chinese: 搜索並摧毀所有在儲木廠裡的辛迪加補給庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索并摧毁所有在储木厂里的辛迪加补给库存。

Key.Original: Move to the Facility
Key.Chinese: 前往設施
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往设施

Key.Original: Move to the %2Syndikat facility%1 while avoiding the %3enemy checkpoint%1.
Key.Chinese: 前往%2辛迪加的設施%1並迴避%3他們的檢查哨%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往%2辛迪加的设施%1并回避%3他们的检查哨%1。

Key.Original: 06:30 Hours
Sunday, August 12th, 2035
Key.Chinese: 2035年，8月12日，星期日
Key.Chinesesimp: 2035年，8月12日，星期日

Key.Original: Central Tanoa, north-west of the Syndikat facility
Key.Chinese: 塔諾亞中部，辛迪加設施的西北方
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚中部，辛迪加设施的西北方

Key.Original: Prowler Position
Key.Chinese: "徘徊者"輕型突擊車位置
Key.Chinesesimp: "徘徊者"轻型突击车位置

Key.Original: Jungle
Key.Chinese: 叢林
Key.Chinesesimp: 丛林

Key.Original: Supply Depot
Key.Chinese: 補給倉庫
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给仓库

Key.Original: Overwatch
Key.Chinese: 觀察點
Key.Chinesesimp: 观察点

Key.Original: Insertion Point
Key.Chinese: 進入點
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入点

Key.Original: Following Syndikat's unchecked aggression towards the citizens of Tanoa, Group 15 launch an operation to draw out their leadership.
Key.Chinese: 隨著辛迪加無止境的在塔諾亞上侵略平民，15分隊策劃了一場除掉他們領導的行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着辛迪加无止境地在塔诺亚上侵略平民，15大队策划了一场除掉他们领导的行动。

Key.Original: Eyes On
Key.Chinese: 找到了
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到了

Key.Original: Stockpile Discovered
Key.Chinese: 發現庫存
Key.Chinesesimp: 发现库存

Key.Original: 03 Firestarter
Key.Chinese: 03縱火者
Key.Chinesesimp: 03 纵火者

Key.Original: You successfully destroyed all of Syndikat's supply stockpiles. This will definitely bring Warlock out of hiding.
Key.Chinese: 你成功摧毀了所有辛迪加的補給庫存。這樣肯定能把"術士"從他的藏身處給逼出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功摧毁了所有辛迪加的补给库存。这样肯定能把"术士"从他的藏身处给逼出来。

Key.Original: You successfully destroyed most of Syndikat's supply stockpiles. Hopefully this will bring Warlock out of hiding.
Key.Chinese: 你成功摧毀了大部分辛迪加的補給庫存。希望這樣能把"術士"從他的藏身處給逼出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功摧毁了大部分辛迪加的补给库存。希望这样能把"术士"从他的藏身处给逼出来。

Key.Original: Watchtower
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"

Key.Original: %2Raider 2%1
%2Raider 1%1
With the assistance of Raider 1, you are to locate and destroy all Syndikat supply stockpiles within the vicinity of the lumberyard.
Key.Chinese: 在"突襲者1"的幫助下，你們將尋找並摧毀所有辛迪加在儲木場裡的補給庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在"突袭者1"的帮助下，你们将寻找并摧毁所有辛迪加在储木场里的补给库存。

Key.Original: That's where you come in.
Key.Chinese: 接下來就該換你們登場了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接下来就该换你们登场了。

Key.Original: Blue Cap has informed us of a major %2Syndikat facility masked as a lumberyard%1 in central Tanoa. Recent satellite imagery suggests a large shipment of weapons and supplies has just come in, bound for the far reaches of Syndikat-controlled territory. The loss of these supplies would deal a major blow to Syndikat's operations and may just flush Warlock out into the open.
Key.Chinese: 藍帽向我們表明有一處%2偽裝成儲木場的辛迪加設施%1，坐落於塔諾亞的中部。根據最近的衛星照片表明，該設施有一大批貨剛進去那裡，舉凡武器與補給品等等，藏在他們領地的深處。失去這些物資肯定會造成辛迪加一個嚴重的打擊，或許還能把"術士"從他的藏身處給逼出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 蓝帽向我们表明有一处%2伪装成储木场的辛迪加设施%1坐落于塔诺亚的中部。根据最近的卫星照片表明，该设施刚刚接收了一大批进货，包括武器与补给品等等，藏在他们领地的深处。失去这些物资肯定会给辛迪加造成严重的打击，或许还能把"术士"从他的藏身处给逼出来。

Key.Original: Angel 3-2 - V-44 X Blackfish on loan from the NATO Task Force.
Key.Chinese: "天使3-2"-從北約特遣隊所借來的V-44X"黑魚"垂直起降機。
Key.Chinesesimp: "天使3-2"-从北约特遣队所借来的V-44X"黑鱼"垂直起降机。

Key.Original: Watchtower - CTRG Headquarters.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"-戰研小組指揮部。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"-战研大队指挥部。

Key.Original: %2Raider 2%1 - Your team.
Key.Chinese: %2"突襲者2"%1-你的小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"突袭者2"%1-你的小组。

Key.Original: %2Raider 1%1 - Lead element.
Key.Chinese: %2"突襲者1"%1-領導小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"突袭者1"%1-指挥分队。

Key.Original: Once all supply stockpiles have been destroyed, you are to rendezvous with Angel 3-2 at the %2abandoned observatory%1 atop the dormant volcano.
Key.Chinese: 當所有的補給庫存確認摧毀後，你們將前往休火山山頂的%2廢棄觀測站%1與"天使3-2"會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当所有的补给库存确认摧毁后，你们将前往休火山山顶的%2废弃观测站%1与"天使3-2"会合。

Key.Original: %2Raider 1%1 will provide overwatch from here, covering your approach. You are to infiltrate %3the facility%1, locate all supply stockpiles and rig them to blow. When ready, you are to %4exfil from the facility%1 and blow the charges.
Key.Chinese: %2"突襲者1"%1將會在觀察點提供支援，掩護你們靠近。而你們將入侵%3這個設施%1，找出所有的補給庫存並裝上炸藥。當你們好了以後，你們就%4撤離設施%1並引爆炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"突袭者1"%1将会在观察点提供支援，掩护你们靠近。而你们将入侵%3这个设施%1，找出所有的补给库存并装上炸药。当你们好了以后，你们就%4撤离设施%1并引爆炸药。

Key.Original: - Fuel reserves, commonly found in barrels.
Key.Chinese: -燃料儲存設備，通常應該是個桶子。
Key.Chinesesimp: -燃料储备，通常在桶中保存。

Key.Original: - Containers suspected of housing military weapons and equipment.
Key.Chinese: -藏有軍方武器與裝備的集裝箱。
Key.Chinesesimp: -藏有军方武器与装备的集装箱。

Key.Original: - Any container or object exhibiting military markings.
Key.Chinese: -任何有著軍方標記的箱子或物件。
Key.Chinesesimp: -任何有着军方标记的箱子或物件。

Key.Original: Valid Syndikat targets marked for demolition:
Key.Chinese: 需被摧毀的辛迪加目標:
Key.Chinesesimp: 需被摧毁的辛迪加目标：

Key.Original: 2. Move to %2extract%1.
Key.Chinese: 2. 前往%2撤離點%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 2. 前往%2撤离点%1。

Key.Original: 1. Locate and destroy all Syndikat supply stockpiles.
Key.Chinese: 1. 尋找並摧毀所有辛迪加的補給庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 1. 寻找并摧毁所有辛迪加的补给库存。

Key.Original: Overwatch
Key.Chinese: 觀察點
Key.Chinesesimp: 观察点

Key.Original: Firestarter
Key.Chinese: 縱火者
Key.Chinesesimp: 纵火者

Container.name: x03_late_arrival
Container.situation: players lost their vehicle

Key.Original: Raider 2, Angel 3-2, what the hell is taking so long? Get to the LZ, now!
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，這裡是"天使3-2"，你們在搞啥飛機阿，搞那麼久?趕快過來降落點，馬上!
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，这里是"天使3-2"，你们怎么搞那么久？赶快来降落点，马上！

Container.name: x02_slow_players
Container.situation: players lost their vehicle

Key.Original: Where are rest of you guys?
Key.Chinese: 你們其他人在哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们其他人在哪里？

Container.name: x01_accident
Container.situation: players lost their vehicle

Key.Original: For Christ's sake, Raider 2, who taught you to drive?
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，"突襲者2"，是誰教你們開車的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 看在老天爷份儿上，"突袭者2"，是谁教你们开车的？

Key.Original: On your feet, and hump it to the LZ. On the double!
Key.Chinese: 趕快用你們的腳走到降落點那裡。加緊速度!
Key.Chinesesimp: 赶快用你们的脚走到降落点那里。加紧速度！

Container.name: b25_Situation_3
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: The compound's in this grid, here.
Key.Chinese: 那個倉庫位在這個座標，這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个仓库位在这个座标，这里。

Key.Original: Two teams will move in, blow any and all supplies they find, and fade back into the jungle.
Key.Chinese: 兩隊人馬將會進去，炸掉任何他們可以找到的庫存，然後隱身回去叢林。
Key.Chinesesimp: 两队人马将会进去，炸掉任何他们可以找到的库存，然后隐身回去丛林。

Key.Original: Yeah. The kind of operation that should force Warlock out into the open.
Key.Chinese: 是阿。這個行動應該就能把"術士"給逼出來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。这个行动应该就能把"术士"给逼出来了。

Key.Original: Sounds surgical.
Key.Chinese: 聽起來是一場快速與精準的打擊呢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来是一场快速与精准的打击呢。

Container.name: b20_Situation_2
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: No time for politics. As I said: this is time sensitive.
Key.Chinese: 沒有時間去搞政治了。而且就像我說的:現在時機很緊迫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有时间去搞政治了。而且就像我说的：现在时机很紧迫。

Key.Original: My CTRG team is here now. We'll finish the job.
Key.Chinese: 我的戰研小組已經在這裡了。我們可以完成這個工作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的战研大队已经在这里了。我们可以完成这个工作。

Key.Original: Wouldn't the NATO Task Force be better positioned to ...
Key.Chinese: 難道不交給有更好立場的北約特遣隊去做這件事...
Key.Chinesesimp: 难道不交给有更好立场的北约特遣队去做这件事...

Key.Original: That being said, some heavy lifting on the logistics end would be more than welcome.
Key.Chinese: 話雖如此，但那些大量運輸物資救援的任務還是比較受歡迎。
Key.Chinesesimp: 话虽如此，但那些大量运输物资救援的任务还是比较受欢迎。

Key.Original: You boys can take all the credit.
Key.Chinese: 你的人馬可以拿到所有好處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的人马可以拿到所有好处。

Key.Original: That can be arranged. Okay, lay it out for me.
Key.Chinese: 這我倒可以安排下。好的，說說計劃吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这我倒可以安排下。好的，说说计划吧。

Container.name: b20_Situation_1
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: We've got intel about a storage compound in the heart of Syndikat-controlled territory.
Key.Chinese: 我們打聽到一處位於辛迪加領地深處的一個儲存倉庫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们打听到一处位于辛迪加领地深处的一个储存仓库。

Key.Original: Unusual spike in activity. Seems like a shipment of weapons, fuel, etcetera, is moving in.
Key.Chinese: 有著不尋常的活動。看起來像是一批批的武器，燃油等正在搬進去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有不寻常活动。看起来像是一批的武器燃料什么的正在进货。

Key.Original: What's the play?
Key.Chinese: 有什麼計劃?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有什么计划？

Key.Original: Maybe, maybe not. Could just be a distribution hub.
Key.Chinese: 或許是，也或許不是。那邊可能就只是個調配站。
Key.Chinesesimp: 或许是，也或许不是。那边可能就只是个调配站。

Key.Original: That's why we need to hit them now - before they can move this kit out to the adjacent islands.
Key.Chinese: 這就是為什麼我們得現在立刻攻擊他們-搶在他們把這些東西給移到別的島嶼上之前。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这就是为什么我们得现在立刻攻击他们—抢在他们把这些东西给移到别的岛屿上之前。

Key.Original: Syndikat planning something big?
Key.Chinese: 辛迪加打算做什麼大事嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加打算做什么大事吗？

Container.name: b15_WeaponsCache
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: Yeah. Unexpected. But we might be able to work it to our advantage.
Key.Chinese: 是阿。的確很令人意外。但搞不好我們可以利用它們來做些什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是阿。的确很令人意外。但搞不好我们可以利用它们来做些什么。

Key.Original: These kinda weapons are not simple to get a hold of - they're valuable.
Key.Chinese: 基於這些武器的價值，它們肯定是非常得來不易的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 基于这些武器的价值，它们肯定是非常得来不易的。

Key.Original: The weapons your team uncovered. Advanced stuff. Military grade.
Key.Chinese: 你的小隊所發現的那些武器箱啊。先進的玩意兒。軍用等級的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的小组所发现的那些武器箱啊。先进的玩意儿。军用等级的。

Key.Original: If we keep smashing all of Syndikat's toys, it'll provoke a response.
Key.Chinese: 假如我們繼續把辛迪加的玩具給搗毀，他們將不得不做出回應。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如我们不断捣毁辛迪加的玩具，他们将不得不做出响应。

Key.Original: How so?
Key.Chinese: 怎麼說?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么说？

Key.Original: Exactly. We've not been able to get a LOCSTAT on him as of yet. Guy's a ghost.
Key.Chinese: 正確。我們一直無法偵蒐出他的確切位置。他太會躲了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正确。我们一直无法搞到他的确切位置。他太会躲了。

Key.Original: You want to draw Warlock out into the open.
Key.Chinese: 你想要把"術士"給引出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你想要把"术士"给引出来。

Container.name: b10_Interrupt
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: What's that?
Key.Chinese: 什麼箱子?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么箱子？

Key.Original: That cache was a curveball.
Key.Chinese: 那些箱子真令人訝異。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些箱子真令人讶异。

Container.name: b01_AltisWrapUp
Container.situation: wrapping up the situation on altis

Key.Original: Following the defeat of forces loyal to General Akhanteros, the provisional ceasefire has held firm.
Key.Chinese: 隨著擁護阿克漢泰羅斯將軍的部隊失敗之後，停火協議到目前都維持著穩定的狀態。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着拥护阿坎特罗斯将军的部队的失败，暂时性的停火一直持续到现在。

Key.Original: With a new round of NATO-CSAT talks due imminently, strategic analysts point to encouraging signs of a lasting peace, with a shared peacekeeping deal on the table.
Key.Chinese: 而藉由新一輪的北約-廣協同盟緊急會談，各戰略分析人員都指出世界有正走向長久和平的跡象，最後雙方也在談判桌上達成共同維持和平的協議。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而借由新一轮的北约—广协紧急会谈，各战略分析人员都指出世界有正走向长久和平的迹象，最后双方也在谈判桌上达成共同维持和平的协议。

Container.name: 60_LZ
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Pilot;EXC B SOF Liaison;EXC B Salvo;
Container.situation: talk near the chopper

Key.Original: Correct. The rest of Group 15 is en route. Standby.
Key.Chinese: 還有的。其餘的15分隊人馬還在路上。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有的。其余的15大队人马还在路上。请稍等。

Key.Original: Raider 1, this is Northstar Actual. Send LOCSTAT, over.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，這裡是"北極星"指揮。請報告所在位置，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，这里是"北极星"指挥。请报告所在位置，完毕。

Key.Original: Welcome to LZ Vesuvius, boys! We've been waiting for you.
Key.Chinese: 歡迎來到維蘇威降落點，伙計們!我們正在等著你們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 欢迎来到维苏威降落点，伙计们！我们正在等着你们。

Key.Original: Hey, hold up, weren't you supposed to arrive in an LSV?
Key.Chinese: 嘿，等等，你們不是該駕駛著一臺輕型突擊車過來嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，等等，你们不是该驾驶着一台轻型突击车过来吗？

Key.Original: Northstar Actual, this is Angel 3-2. We picking up anyone else? Over.
Key.Chinese: "北極星"指揮，這裡是"天使3-2"。還有要接送的人嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "北极星"指挥，这里是"天使3-2"。还有要接送的人吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that. We'll put aside some bacon and eggs for you, Angel 3-2. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。我們會留些培根與雞蛋給你們的，"天使3-2"。通話結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。我们会留些培根与鸡蛋给你们的，"天使3-2"。通话结束。

Key.Original: Raider 1, Angel 3-2. Double in, boys. We don't much enjoy sitting around a combat zone.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，這裡是"天使3-2"。請加緊腳步，兄弟。我們可沒那閒情逸致坐在這戰區裡面。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，这里是"天使3-2"。请加紧脚步，兄弟。我们可没那闲情逸致坐在这战区里面。

Key.Original: Raider 1, should be at the LZ in figures few.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"突襲者1"，我們應該幾分鐘內就可以趕到降落點了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"突袭者1"，我们应该几分钟内就可以赶到降落点了。

Key.Original: Once repairs are complete, we need to get in the air, rapid.
Key.Chinese: 一旦維修完成後，我們就會立刻升空，快點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦维修完成后，我们就会立刻升空，快点。

Key.Original: Raider 2, all board. Everyone, belt up. Once Raider 1 finally shows up, we can go.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，你們都上機。所有人都準備好。一旦"突襲者1"抵達後，我們就可以走了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，你们都上机。所有人都准备好。一旦"突袭者1"抵达后，我们就可以走了。

Key.Original: Repairs? Is this guy for real?
Key.Chinese: 維修?他不是在說笑吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 维修？他不是在说笑吧？

Key.Original: Now let's try to get back to the Task Force before all the breakfast is gone.
Key.Chinese: 讓我們試著在早餐都被吃完之前趕回特遣隊吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我们试着在早餐都被吃完之前赶回特遣队吧。

Key.Original: Angel of deathtrap more like...
Key.Chinese: 他們還比較像是死亡天使...
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们还比较像是死亡天使...

Container.name: 58_debriefing
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;EXC B Grimm;EXC B Salvo;
Container.situation: players get information about their mission's success

Key.Original: Raider callsigns, be advised, we're already seeing an increase in Syndikat comms.
Key.Chinese: 突襲者小隊，請注意，我們已經發現到辛迪加的通訊頻道開始繁忙了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突袭者小队，请注意，我们发现辛迪加的通信频道变繁忙了。

Key.Original: If Warlock makes a move, we'll be all over it.
Key.Chinese: 假如"術士"有所行動，我們就會找到他了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如"术士"有所行动，我们就会找到他了。

Key.Original: Now we wait.
Key.Chinese: 現在我們只要等就行了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在我们只要等就行了。

Key.Original: Good. Sounds like we pissed em off.
Key.Chinese: 不錯。看來我們真的把他們給惹毛了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不错。看来我们真的把他们给惹毛了。

Key.Original: And done with this goddamn island.
Key.Chinese: 然後也終於可以離開這天殺的小島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然后也终于可以离开这天杀的小岛。

Container.name: 57_reach_observatory
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Grimm;EXC B Truck;EXC B Salvo;
Container.situation: support team is ordered to board the chopper at extraction point

Key.Original: The boss is liaising with the Task Force for the duration. Logistical support, mostly.
Key.Chinese: 我們老大最近都在跟特遣隊的聯絡官合作。大部分是為我們提供後勤支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们老大最近都在跟特遣队的联络官合作。大部分是为我们提供后勤支援。

Key.Original: That's correct.
Key.Chinese: 沒錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错。

Key.Original: So, NATO's gonna be our chauffeur again?
Key.Chinese: 所以，北約再次成為了我們的司機?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，北约再次成为了我们的司机？

Key.Original: Let's move.
Key.Chinese: 我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走吧。

Key.Original: Raider 2, see you at the RV.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我們在會合點碰面吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我们在会合点碰面吧。

Key.Original: That's one way of putting it.
Key.Chinese: 這方法也不賴。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这方法也不赖。

Container.name: 55_reach_observatory
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;EXC B Salvo;EXC B Truck;
Container.situation: support team is ordered to board the chopper at extraction point

Key.Original: All Raider callsigns, mission update, RV at abandoned comms station.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫所有突襲者小隊，任務更新，從新在廢棄的觀測站集結。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼叫所有突袭者小队，任务更新，从新在废弃的观测站集结。

Key.Original: We've got a Blackfish moving to extract.
Key.Chinese: 我們派了臺"黑魚"去撤離你們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们派了台"黑鱼"去撤离你们。

Key.Original: Raider 2, we left a Prowler nearby during insertion. Saddle up, and move to the LZ.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我們在任務開始時留了一臺"徘徊者"給你們。坐上他，然後趕緊前往降落點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我们在任务开始时留了一辆"徘徊者"给你们。坐上他，然后赶紧前往降落点。

Key.Original: Raider 1, quick time. Transport's leaving in figures few. Watchtower out.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，你們也加快速度。撤離載具將在幾分鐘後就離開。"守望塔"通話結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，你们也加快速度。撤离载具将在几分钟后就离开。"守望塔"通话结束。

Key.Original: A Blackfish? I'd rather walk.
Key.Chinese: 一臺"黑魚"?我還比較情願用走的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一架"黑鱼"？我还比较情愿用走的。

Key.Original: Shut up, Salvo.
Key.Chinese: 閉嘴，薩爾沃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 闭嘴，萨尔沃。

Key.Original: Riker, c'mon. We really catching a ride in one of those death traps?
Key.Chinese: 瑞克，拜託。我們真的要去搭那種死亡陷阱嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 瑞克，拜托。我们真的要去搭那种死亡陷阱吗？

Key.Original: Roger your last, Watchtower.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守望塔"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守望塔"。

Container.name: 50_support_team_leave
Container.situation: support team is ordered to return to extraction point

Key.Original: Raider 1, be advised, Raider 2 now leaving the area.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，請注意，"突襲者2"正在離開該區。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，请注意，"突袭者2"正在离开该区。

Key.Original: Disengage. Move to exfil. Out.
Key.Chinese: 停止交戰。前往撤離點。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 停止交战。前往撤离点。通话完毕。

Container.name: 40_Reinforcements_2
Container.situation: large wave of enemies nearing players.

Key.Original: Raider 2, SITREP, we're seeing a large QRF moving to your position.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，狀況回報，我們看到了一大群的快速應變部隊正在靠近你們的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，状况回报，我们看到一支大规模的快速反应部队正在靠近你们的位置。

Key.Original: Quick time. We're not here for a prolonged contact.
Key.Chinese: 加緊腳步。我們並不是來這裡大火拚的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加紧脚步。我们并不是来这里火拼的。

Key.Original: Complete your objective before that Syndikat force is on top of you. Watchtower out.
Key.Chinese: 在這支辛迪加部隊包圍你們之前趕快完成任務。"守望塔"通話結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这支辛迪加部队包围你们之前赶快完成任务。"守望塔"通话结束。

Container.name: 35_Reinforcements_1
Container.situation: enemy reinforcements are nearing player's operation depot.

Key.Original: All Raider callsigns, be advised, we see a Syndikat reaction force moving on your position.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫所有突襲者小隊，請注意，我們看到了一支辛迪加的應變部隊正在向你們的位置靠近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼叫所有突袭者小队，请注意，我们看到了一支辛迪加的反应部队正在向你们的位置靠近。

Key.Original: The QRF's coming in along the road from north and south. Don't get cut off, Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 快速應變部隊將沿著道路的北方與南方靠近。別被包圍了，"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快速应变部队将沿着道路的北方与南方靠近。别被包围了，"突袭者2"。

Container.name: 30_SupportTeamRetreating
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;
Container.situation: support team is under fire and requesting.

Key.Original: Negative, Raider 1, withdraw to the exfil point.
Key.Chinese: 否決，"突襲者1"，請撤回到撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行，"突袭者1"，请撤回到撤离点。

Key.Original: Raider 2, you are to continue on task.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，你們繼續你們的任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，你们继续你们的任务。

Key.Original: Watchtower, Raider 1 taking concentrated fire at the overwatch.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，"突襲者1"已經被集火在觀察點上。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，"突袭者1"已经被集火在观察点上。

Key.Original: We're not doing much good from up here - my callsigns gonna press an attack, over.
Key.Chinese: 我們從這邊無法有效的還擊-我的小隊正打算發起進攻，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们从这边无法有效的还击—我的小队正打算发起进攻，完毕。

Container.name: 25_allSuppliesDestroyed
Container.situation: players rig all supplies with explosives

Key.Original: Nice one, Raider 2. That should be all of Warlock's kit dealt with now.
Key.Chinese: 棒極了，"突襲者2"。這樣"術士"的所有裝備應該都被解決了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 棒极了，"突袭者2"。这样"术士"的所有装备应该都被解决了。

Key.Original: New mission: your callsign, complete, is to move to exfil.
Key.Chinese: 新任務:你們的主要目標已達成，現在請前往撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 新任务：你们的主要目标已达成，现在请前往撤离点。

Container.name: 20_SuppliesDestroyed
Container.situation: players rig explosives on most of supply crates.

Key.Original: Fine work, Raider callsigns. Three caches destroyed. That should put a dent in Syndikat operations.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，突襲者小隊。三處儲存點皆已摧毀。這應該能使辛迪加的行動陷入困難。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，突袭者小队。三处储存点皆已摧毁。这应该能使辛迪加的行动陷入困难。

Key.Original: Raider 2, search for more supplies, or move to exfil. Your call. Out.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，搜索其餘的庫存，或是直接前往撤離。你們自己決定。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，搜索其余的库存，或是直接前往撤离。你们自己决定。通话完毕。

Container.name: 15_Detected
Container.situation: player get detected and base goes to alert

Key.Original: Contact! Wait out!
Key.Chinese: 接敵!先停火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 接敌！先别打！

Container.name: 10_Overwatch
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;
Container.situation: players reached overwatch on depot

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Raider 2, recce enemy positions. When you're happy, move in.
Key.Chinese: 了解。"突襲者2"，偵察敵人的位置。準備好後就自行進入。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。"突袭者2"，侦察敌人的位置。准备好后就自行进入。

Key.Original: Search all buildings and shipping containers. Execute when ready. Out.
Key.Chinese: 搜索所有建築與貨櫃。都設置好了以後就引爆。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索所有建筑与货柜。都设置好了以后就引爆。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Watchtower, SITREP, we have eyes on Raider 2, now on task.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，狀況回報，我們已經看到了"突襲者2"，現在開始任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，状况回报，我们已经看到了"突袭者2"，现在开始任务。

Container.name: 07_ConvoyDepart
Container.situation: convoy is departing the depot

Key.Original: Be advised, mounted convoy departing the complex.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，一隊載好貨的車隊剛離開了倉庫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，一队载好货的车队刚离开了仓库。

Container.name: 06_SupportTeamChatter
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;EXC B Grimm;
Container.situation: reference to blue cap

Key.Original: Roger that. Blue Cap's int points to at least three large deliveries.
Key.Chinese: 收到。藍帽的情報指出這邊至少有三處大型庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。蓝帽的情报指出这边至少有三处大型库存。

Key.Original: Raider 2, search and destroy everything you find in the target facility. Watchtower, out.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，搜索並摧毀所有你找的到的庫存。"守望塔"，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，搜索并摧毁所有你找的到的库存。"守望塔"，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Watchtower, SITREP, looks like Blue Cap's int was solid. Grimm's got eyes on.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，狀況回報，看來藍帽的情報是正確的。格里姆他已經看到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，状况回报，看来蓝帽的情报是正确的。格里姆他已经看到了。

Key.Original: Lot of movement here. Gang members moving in and out of structures. Getting busier. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡很熱鬧。那些混混一直在進出建築。看起來很忙。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里很热闹。那些混混一直在进出建筑。看起来很忙。完毕。

Container.name: 05_SupportTeamOverwatch
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;
Container.situation: support team reached the mission location

Key.Original: Roger. Continue to observe, but do not engage. Raider 2, same orders.
Key.Chinese: 收到。繼續觀察，但不要交戰。"突襲者2"，你們也是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。继续观察，但不要交战。"突袭者2"，你们也是。

Key.Original: If you raise hell now, it'll be that be much harder for Raider 1 to provide effective fire support. Out.
Key.Chinese: 假如你們現在就交戰，這將讓"突襲者1"很難有效的幫你們進行掩護。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你们现在就交战，这将让"突袭者1"很难有效的帮你们进行掩护。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Watchtower, this is Raider 1, that's my callsign complete in position.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，這裡是"突襲者1"，我的小隊已就定位。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，这里是"突袭者1"，我的人已就位。

Key.Original: We currently have eyes on a small convoy. At least a handful of mounted paramilitaries, over.
Key.Chinese: 我們目前觀察到一個小車隊。附近至少有幾個全副武裝的準軍事人員，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们目前观察到一支小车队。附近至少有几个全副武装的准军事人员，完毕。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;
Container.situation: mission start, notification of nearby checkpoint

Key.Original: Raider 1, SITREP, over.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，狀況回報，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，状况回报，完毕。

Key.Original: Acknowledged. We're seeing a spike in Syndikat presence in the area. Out to you.
Key.Chinese: 了解。我們看到這片區域的辛迪加活動正逐漸增加。對你通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。我们看到这片区域的辛迪加活动正逐渐增加。对你通话完毕。

Key.Original: Raider 2, be advised, you have a similar checkpoint to your front along the Main Supply Route.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，請注意，在你們前方的主要補給路線上有一個小型檢查哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，请注意，在你们前方的主要补给路线上有一个小型检查哨。

Key.Original: Watchtower, Raider 1, that's my callsign moving to overwatch now.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，這裡是"突襲者1"，我這小隊正在進入觀察點中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，这里是"突袭者1"，我这小队正在进入观察点中。

Key.Original: Just avoided an enemy VCP on the southern approach, over.
Key.Chinese: 剛剛從南方過來時曾避開過一個載具檢查哨，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 刚刚从南方过来时曾避开过一个载具检查哨，完毕。

Key.Original: Suggest you avoid it en route to the supply depot. No need to make our presence known. Watchtower, out.
Key.Chinese: 建議你們移動時最好避開它。沒有必要讓敵人知道我們在這裡。"守望塔"，通話結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 建议你们移动时最好避开它。没有必要让敌人知道我们在这里。"守望塔"，通话结束。

Key.Original: 72 Hours before Keystone Extraction
Key.Chinese: "基石"撤離行動前72小時
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"撤离行动前72小时

Key.Original: RV with Raider 1
Key.Chinese: 與"突襲者1"會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"突袭者1"会合

Key.Original: Move through the jungle and %2rendezvous%1 with %3Raider 1%1.
Key.Chinese: 穿過叢林前往%2會合點%1與%3"突襲者1"%1碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 穿过丛林前往%2会合点%1与%3"突袭者1"%1碰面。

Key.Original: Investigate the Footpath
Key.Chinese: 調查小徑
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查小径

Key.Original: Search the nearby %2footpath%1 for any signs of Syndikat forces.
Key.Chinese: 搜索附近的%2小徑%1，調查是否有辛迪加部隊的蹤跡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索附近的%2小径%1，调查是否有辛迪加部队的踪迹。

Key.Original: Extract
Key.Chinese: 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离

Key.Original: Board the UH-80 Ghosthawk %2at the LZ%1 and exfil from the AO.
Key.Chinese: 在%2降落點%1搭乘UH-80"鬼鷹"運輸直升機並撤離戰場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%2降落点%1搭乘 UH-80"幽灵鹰"运输直升机并撤离战场。

Key.Original: Ambush the Convoy
Key.Chinese: 伏擊車隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击车队

Key.Original: Move to the %2ambush site%1 and ambush the convoy.
Key.Chinese: 前往%2伏擊點%1伏擊車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往%2伏击点%1伏击车队。

Key.Original: 11:10 Hours
Saturday, August 11th, 2035
Key.Chinese: 2035年，8月11日，星期六
Key.Chinesesimp: 2035年，8月11日，星期六

Key.Original: Central Tanoa, east of the capital, Georgetown
Key.Chinese: 塔諾亞中部，首都喬治敦的東邊
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚中部，首都乔治敦以东

Key.Original: AA Site
Key.Chinese: 防空陣地
Key.Chinesesimp: 防空阵地

Key.Original: Dirt Footpath
Key.Chinese: 森林小徑
Key.Chinesesimp: 森林小径

Key.Original: Ambush Site
Key.Chinese: 伏擊地點
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击地点

Key.Original: Rendezvous Point
Key.Chinese: 會合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合点

Key.Original: Insertion Point
Key.Chinese: 進入點
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入点

Key.Original: Group 15 is deployed to ambush a Syndikat convoy en route to a Tanoan village.
Key.Chinese: 15分隊被佈署去伏擊一隊即將前往一處塔諾亞人村莊的辛迪加車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 15大队被布署去伏击一队即将前往一处塔诺亚人村庄的辛迪加车队。

Key.Original: 02 Warm Welcome
Key.Chinese: 02熱烈歡迎
Key.Chinesesimp: 02 热烈欢迎

Key.Original: The convoy was destroyed and Syndikat's anti-air weaponry was disposed of. We have to figure out how CSAT weapons are making their way into Syndikat hands.
Key.Chinese: 辛迪加的車隊與防空武器皆已摧毀。現在我們必須搞清楚為什麼會有廣協同盟的武器出現在辛迪加的手上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加的车队与防空武器都被摧毁。现在我们必须搞清楚为什么会有广协的武器出现在辛迪加的手上。

Key.Original: Watchtower
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"

Key.Original: %2Raider 2%1
%2Raider 1%1
Your job is to stop the Syndikat convoy from reaching its destination.
Key.Chinese: 你們的目標就是阻止辛迪加的車隊抵達他們的目的地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们的目标就是阻止辛迪加的车队抵达他们的目的地。

Key.Original: Our local informant, codename 'Blue Cap', has revealed that Syndikat intend to attack the town of Regina, one of the hardest-hit locations following the tsunami some months ago. With both the local populace and various NGOs in the vicinity, the likelihood of civilian casualties is extremely high. As such, local police have asked us to assist.
Key.Chinese: 我們當地的線人，代號為'藍帽'，向我們報告有一批辛迪加隊伍即將攻擊一個叫雷吉納的小鎮，這裡在幾個月前的海嘯中為較嚴重的災區之一。目前那邊有許多平民與非政府組織，這樣極有可能會讓平民傷亡慘重。因此當地的警察便向我們請求協助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们当地的线人，代号为'蓝帽'，向我们报告有一批辛迪加队伍即将攻击一个叫雷吉纳的小镇，这里在几个月前的海啸中为较严重的灾区之一。目前那边有许多平民与非政府组织，这样极有可能会让平民伤亡惨重。因此当地的警察便向我们请求协助。

Key.Original: Once the convoy has been eliminated you are to radio for extraction.
Key.Chinese: 當車隊被殲滅後，你們就可以使用無線電請求撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当车队被歼灭后，你们就可以使用无线电请求撤离。

Key.Original: You will rendezvous with Raider 1 %2here%1, north-west of the %3ambush site%1. From there, you will proceed to the ambush site and co-ordinate with Raider 1 to neutralize the incoming Syndikat convoy.
Key.Chinese: 你將與"突襲者1"在%2這邊%1會合，在%3伏擊點%1的西北方。從那邊再與"突襲者1"一同前往伏擊點，殲滅來襲的辛迪加車隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你将与"突袭者1"在%2这边%1会合，在%3伏击点%1的西北方。从那边再与"突袭者1"一同前往伏击点，歼灭来袭的辛迪加车队。

Key.Original: 3. Extract.
Key.Chinese: 3. 撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 3. 撤离。

Key.Original: 2. %2Ambush%1 the %3convoy%1.
1. %2Rendezvous%1 with Raider 1.
Warm Welcome
Key.Chinese: 熱烈歡迎
Key.Chinesesimp: 热烈欢迎

Container.name: b30_Context_3
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: bringing nato liaison up to speed

Key.Original: Nature abhors a vacuum.
Key.Chinese: 自然厭惡真空。
Key.Chinesesimp: 自然厌恶真空。

Key.Original: We ran your intel. 'Warlock', right?
Key.Chinese: 我們讀了你的情報。'術士'，對吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们读了你的情报。'术士'，对吧？

Key.Original: We've been tracking 'Syndikat' for a while. Face value? Bunch of thugs. Guns, drugs. Very violent.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經追蹤'辛迪加'這個組織一段時間了。他們嗎?一堆暴徒。槍枝，毒品。非常暴力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经追踪'辛迪加'这个组织一段时间了。他们吗？一堆暴徒。枪支，毒品。非常暴力。

Key.Original: But - given the current mess - they're expanding.
Key.Chinese: 而且-藉由這次災害-他們還不斷的擴大組織。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且—借由这次灾害—他们还不断的扩大组织。

Key.Original: Right. But there's more to it.
Key.Chinese: 對。但還不只這樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对。但还不只这样。

Key.Original: Correct. Solomon Maru. One of the few living remnants of failed 'Red Tiger' coup.
Key.Chinese: 正確。所羅門·馬魯。他是少數幾個之前政變失敗的'紅虎'組織倖存者。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正确。所罗门·马鲁。他是少数几个之前政变失败的'红虎'组织幸存者。

Container.name: x20_Ambush_Backstop
Container.situation: players failed ambush. fail-safe is detonated.

Key.Original: Convoy's hit the line. Blowing my charges, clear!
Key.Chinese: 車隊碰到線了。正在引爆我的炸藥，淨空!
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队碰到线了。正在引爆我的炸药，闪开！

Container.name: x15_Ambush_Spatne
Container.situation: players fucking ambush up. select a line at random.

Key.Original: Raider 2, you need to place your charges in advance of the bridge.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，你們必須把炸藥裝在橋的前面。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，你们必须把炸药装在桥的前面。

Key.Original: Raider 2, my charge is the stop line. Hit them before it.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我的炸藥為停止線。你們必須在他們撞到這條線之前就攻擊他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我的炸药为停止线。你们必须在他们撞到这条线之前就攻击他们。

Container.name: x10_Stalled_Ambushed
Container.situation: players are messing around

Key.Original: Raider 2, we need you back at the ambush site.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我們需要你們回到伏擊點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我们需要你们回到伏击点。

Container.name: x05_Stalled_Preparing
Container.situation: players are messing around

Key.Original: Get back to that ambush site, Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 給我滾回來伏擊點，"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 给我滚回伏击点，"突袭者2"。

Container.name: x01_Stalled_RV
Container.situation: players are messing around

Key.Original: Get moving, Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 快行動，"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快行动，"突袭者2"。

Container.name: b50_Situation_3
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: bringing nato liaison up to speed

Key.Original: We've sent a team to the area. We're setting up an ambush.
Key.Chinese: 我們把隊伍派往了這區域。我們準備進行一場伏擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们把队伍派往了这区域。我们准备进行一场伏击。

Key.Original: If he's there, we'll snatch him up.
Key.Chinese: 假如他也在的話，我們會順便幹掉他。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如他也在的话，我们会顺便干掉他。

Key.Original: One squad's already in position. Another's a few minutes out.
Key.Chinese: 一個小隊已經就定位。另一隊幾分鐘後就趕到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个小队已经就定位。另一队几分钟后就赶到。

Key.Original: And Warlock?
Key.Chinese: 那"術士"呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那"术士"呢？

Key.Original: We can do one better than that. I'll set up a feed.
Key.Chinese: 我們可以做到更好的功能。讓我開啟實況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们可以做到更好的功能。让我开启实况。

Key.Original: We got eyes on?
Key.Chinese: 我們看的到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们看的到吗？

Container.name: b45_Situation_2
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: bringing nato liaison up to speed

Key.Original: So, 'Blue Cap' indicates a Syndikat gang are planning to hit a village, here.
Key.Chinese: 近日'藍帽'向我們表示有一隊辛迪加隊伍即將攻擊一個村莊，這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 近日'蓝帽'向我们表示有一队辛迪加队伍即将攻击一个村庄，这里。

Key.Original: After the disaster, it was being used as a staging post for aid workers. Fuel, medicine, etcetera.
Key.Chinese: 在災後，這邊變成一個救援物資的分配站。舉凡燃油，藥物等等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在灾后，这边变成一个救援物资的分配站。燃油，药物等等。

Key.Original: There are still a handful of NGOs around. The local community embraced them.
Key.Chinese: 那裡還有一些非政府組織。當地人很歡迎他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里还有一些非政府组织。当地人很欢迎他们。

Key.Original: Syndikat are out to make a point. We're not clear if Warlock himself will make it.
Key.Chinese: 辛迪加打算在這邊分杯羹。但我們不清楚"術士"他是否會親自帶隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加打算在这边分杯羹。但我们不清楚"术士"他是否会亲自带队。

Key.Original: Brutal. Yeah. It'll be a bloodbath.
Key.Chinese: 殘暴。是的。這將會血流成河。
Key.Chinesesimp: 残暴。是的。这将会血流成河。

Key.Original: Hm. We've seen these gangs at work in the past, they're, um...
Key.Chinese: 恩。我們之前已經見過這群惡棍會幹出那些事，他們很，呃...
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩。我们之前已经见过这群恶棍会干出那些事，他们很，呃...

Container.name: b40_Situation_1
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: bringing nato liason up to speed

Key.Original: Yeah - hold up a sec - let me bring that up.
Key.Chinese: 是阿-等我幾秒鐘-讓我把他點開。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊—等我几秒钟—让我把他点开。

Key.Original: Alright, so your local source, uh...
Key.Chinese: 好的，所以你的當地線人，呃...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，所以你的当地线人，呃...

Key.Original: That brings us to the current situation.
Key.Chinese: 這就是我們當前的情況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这就是我们当前的情况。

Key.Original: Yeah, 'Blue Cap', we ran his intel. We've put assets in place.
Key.Chinese: 是的，'藍帽'，我們讀了他提供的情報。所以我們就把隊伍派過去了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，'蓝帽'，我们读了他提供的情报。所以我们就把队伍派过去了。

Key.Original: 'Blue Cap'.
Key.Chinese: '藍帽'。
Key.Chinesesimp: '蓝帽'。

Key.Original: Okay. Run me through it.
Key.Chinese: 好的。說來讓我聽聽。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。说来让我听听。

Container.name: b35_Context_4
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: bringing nato liaison up to speed

Key.Original: So, we cut the head off the dragon.
Key.Chinese: 所以，我們得砍掉這個龍頭。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，我们得砍掉这个龙头。

Key.Original: Let the dogs rip each other apart.
Key.Chinese: 使這群傢伙分崩離析。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使这群家伙分崩离析。

Key.Original: Syndikat are pretty big - but they're scattered.
Key.Chinese: 辛迪加的確很大-但他們卻很鬆散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加的确很大—但他们却很松散。

Key.Original: They operate in cells. Somehow Warlock holds it all together.
Key.Chinese: 他們本來是各個單位自行運作。但不知道"術士"是怎樣使他們團結在一起的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们本来是各个单位自行运作。但不知道"术士"是怎样使他们团结在一起的。

Key.Original: That's our end game. Neutralise the leadership.
Key.Chinese: 這就是我們的計劃。殲滅掉他們的領導。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这就是我们的计划。歼灭掉他们的领导。

Container.name: b25_Context_2
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: bringing nato liaison up to speed

Key.Original: Besides our ISTAR remit, we've been running counter-cyber operations in the South China Sea.
Key.Chinese: 除了一直在進行情報偵蒐以外，我們也一直在中國南海進行反網路犯罪的行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 除了一直在进行情报侦搜以外，我们也一直在中国南海进行反网络作战。

Key.Original: Now, we've got assets in the field, so this Exercise - this disaster 'clean up' shit - it's a distraction for us.
Key.Chinese: 現在我們在這邊還有佈署著單位，但這個行動-災害該死的'清理'工作-卻使我們分神了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在我们在这边还有布署着单位，但这个行动—灾害该死的'清理'工作—却使我们分神了。

Key.Original: Heh.
Key.Chinese: 嘿。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。

Key.Original: I get that. Look, it's political, strategic. The region's a mess - we're just here to help.
Key.Chinese: 我明白了。你看，他們的政治，戰略。這個國家真是一團糟-而我們只是過來幫忙的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我明白了。你看，他们的政治，战略。这个国家真是一团糟—而我们只是过来帮忙的。

Key.Original: That's where CTRG comes in. We need a ... special tool for the job.
Key.Chinese: 而這就該讓戰研小組登場了。我們需要個...特殊的工具來完成工作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而这就该让战研大队登场了。我们需要个...特殊的工具来完成工作。

Container.name: b20_Context_1
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: bringing nato liaison up to speed

Key.Original: So, as you know, CTRG's taking part in 'Exercise Safe Horizon'. Anti-piracy, security, etcetera.
Key.Chinese: 恩，就像你知道的，戰研小組正參與一場'安全地平線行動'。舉凡反海盜，維安等等業務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，就像你知道的，战研大队正参与一场'安全地平线演戏'。反海盗，保安，诸如此类。

Key.Original: But - as our NATO liaison - you should be aware of a few, uh, 'operational extras'.
Key.Chinese: 但-作為北約的聯絡人-你應該也知道一些，恩，'額外的行動'吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但—作为北约的联络人—你应该也知道一些，嗯，'额外的行动'吧。

Key.Original: Heh. Well - as your NATO liaison - I'm all ears, commander.
Key.Chinese: 嘿。這個嗎-既然我是你的北約聯絡人-我知道的可多了，指揮官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。这个嘛—既然我是你的北约联络人—我知道的可多了，指挥官。

Container.name: b15_TechGrumble
Container.situation: bitching about security timeout

Key.Original: Ah, piece of junk.
Key.Chinese: 哼，爛東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哼，烂东西。

Container.name: b10_VoicesOff
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: You ready?
Key.Chinese: 你好了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好了吗？

Key.Original: Sure. Let's get started.
Key.Chinese: 當然。讓我們開始吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然。让我们开始吧。

Container.name: b05_TanoaReport
Container.situation: introducing the tanoa background

Key.Original: The Horizon Islands were one of the nations worst hit by the disaster; yet, it is a new threat that poses the real danger.
Key.Chinese: 地平線群島為災害最為嚴重的幾個國家之一;然而，島上新崛起的威脅卻逐漸變成一種真正的危險。
Key.Chinesesimp: 地平线群岛为灾害最为严重的几个国家之一;然而，岛上新崛起的威胁却逐渐变成一种真正的危险。

Container.name: b01_TanoaSituation
Container.situation: switching to the tanoa disaster

Key.Original: The aftermath of the South Pacific Disaster shows little sign of improvement, and the scale of the humanitarian crisis has been exacerbated by a marked rise in criminality.
Key.Chinese: 在南太平洋的災害之後並沒有顯示任何改善的跡象，相反的隨著犯罪活動的提升，使人道危機越加劇烈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在南太平洋的灾害之后并没有显示任何改善的迹象，相反的随着犯罪活动的提升，使人道危机越加剧烈。

Key.Original: AAN's Mark Cole is in the region with this special report.
Key.Chinese: 接下來請看AAN世界新聞馬克·科爾為您在這個國家所帶來的特別報導。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接下来请看 AAN 世界新闻马克·科尔为您在这个国家所带来的特别报导。

Container.name: 95_Search_Wreck
Container.situation: players ordered to investigate a weapons cache

Key.Original: Search and clear that wreckage, Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 搜索並肅清那個殘骸，"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索并肃清那个残骸，"突袭者2"。

Container.name: 90_Confirmed_Enemy
Container.situation: players approach a weapons cache in the jungle

Key.Original: Watchtower, Raider 2's definitely got something. Standby.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，"突襲者2"肯定找到了某些東西。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，"突袭者2"肯定找到了某些东西。请稍等。

Container.name: 85_On_Path
Container.situation: players come across the footpath

Key.Original: That would be the path, Raider 2. Follow it down.
Key.Chinese: 那應該就是小徑了，"突襲者2"。跟著路線走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那应该就是小径了，"突袭者2"。跟着路线走吧。

Container.name: 84_NewIntel
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;EXC B Riker;EXC B Grimm;
Container.situation: new intel from nato command

Key.Original: Raider callsigns, we've received new int from our NATO liaze. Possible Anti-Air threat. Patching it through.
Key.Chinese: 突襲者小隊，我們剛從北約的聯絡官那邊得知一個情報。應該是個防空威脅。正在轉接聯絡人給你們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突袭者小队，我们刚从北约的联络官那边得知一个情报。应该是个防空威胁。正在转接联络人给你们。

Key.Original: Raider 1, your rotary exfil can not move to extract while the threat is still in the area.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，你們的直升機在這個威脅還在之前都無法靠近撤離區。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，你们的直升机在这个威胁还在之前都无法靠近撤离区。

Key.Original: Find any and all Syndikat PACs in the area. Roger, over?
Key.Chinese: 去該區找到並殲滅所有辛迪加的人員。收到了嗎，完畢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 去该区找到并歼灭所有辛迪加的人员。收到了吗，完毕？

Key.Original: Raider 1, this is Northstar Actual, local police spotted a handful of heavily-armed paramilitaries in your area.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，這裡是"北極星"指揮，當地警察在你們的區域內發現全副武裝的準軍事人員。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，这里是"北极星"指挥，当地警察在你们的区域内发现全副武装的准军事人员。

Key.Original: They were last seen moving along a footpath near the bridge at grid 072-095. Heading deeper into the jungle.
Key.Chinese: 他們最後出現在橋附近的小徑中，座標是072-095。他們已經深入了叢林之中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们最后出现在桥附近的小径中，座标是072-095。他们已经深入了丛林之中。

Key.Original: No problem.
Key.Chinese: 沒問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没问题。

Key.Original: Roger, Watchtower. Raider 1, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守望塔"。"突襲者1"，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守望塔"。"突袭者1"，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Grimm, fall back and link up with us. We're going back for the quads.
Key.Chinese: 格里姆，回來與我們會合。我們回去牽我們的四輪摩托車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 格里姆，回来与我们会合。我们回去牵我们的四轮摩托车。

Key.Original: Raider 2, you're up. Deal with Syndikat so we can get the hell out of here.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，該你們上了。去解決那些辛迪加好讓我們撤離這鬼地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，该你们上了。去解决那些辛迪加好让我们撤离这鬼地方。

Container.name: 84_2_NewIntel_Comment
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Grimm;EXC B Truck;EXC B Salvo;
Container.situation: evaluating the info as the players move out.

Key.Original: They are. Mostly. But there's a hardcore element, too.
Key.Chinese: 他們大部分是這樣沒錯。但他們也是有菁英部隊的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们大部分是这样没错。但他们也是有精锐部队的。

Key.Original: Rebels. The ones who survived that failed coup a decade ago.
Key.Chinese: 叛軍。他們是在十年前政變失敗卻活下來的那批人其中之一。
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军。他们是在十年前政变失败却活下来的那批人其中之一。

Key.Original: What did Northstar mean, 'paramilitaries'? Aren't Syndikat just a bunch of untrained thugs?
Key.Chinese: "北極星"的那句話是什麼意思，'準軍事人員'?難道辛迪加不單純只是些沒經過訓練的混混嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "北极星"的那句话是什么意思，'准军事人员'？难道辛迪加不单纯只是些没经过训练的混混吗？

Key.Original: Exactly.
Key.Chinese: 沒錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错。

Key.Original: Raider 2, take it slow. Switch on. Watch your arcs. Out.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，速度放慢點。開啟保險。眼觀四面。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，速度放慢点。开启保险。眼观四面。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Like Warlock.
Key.Chinese: 就像"術士"一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就像"术士"一样。

Container.name: 83_WaitOne
Container.participants: EXC B Grimm;EXC B Truck;EXC B Salvo;
Container.situation: players wait for command to reply

Key.Original: NATO. Our transport's handled by the Task Force.
Key.Chinese: 北約。我們的運輸正要交給特遣隊來處理。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约。我们的运输正要交给特遣队来处理。

Key.Original: We'll just sit here while they pull the paperwork outta their ass.
Key.Chinese: 那我們就坐在這邊，等他們把文書工作都做完好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那我们就坐在这边，等他们把文书工作都做完好了。

Key.Original: What's the hold up?
Key.Chinese: 為啥要等一下阿?
Key.Chinesesimp: 为啥要等一下啊？

Container.name: 80_Convoy_Destroyed
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Grimm;EXC B Truck;EXC B Salvo;
Container.situation: players destroyed the convoy

Key.Original: Roger, Raider 1. Interrogative, any sign of Warlock?
Key.Chinese: 收到，"突襲者1"。提個問題，有任何"術士"的蹤跡嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"突袭者1"。提个问题，有任何"术士"的踪迹吗？

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Wait.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到。請等待。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到。请等待。

Key.Original: All clear.
Key.Chinese: 都解決了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 都解决了。

Key.Original: Nice one.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好。

Key.Original: Watchtower, SITREP, 2 times technicals and multiple PAC's engaged and destroyed, CASREP to be sent later.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，狀況回報，2輛武裝越野車與多名敵人皆以殲滅，傷亡報告等下會再回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，状况回报，2辆武装越野车与多名敌人都已歼灭，伤亡报告等下会再回报。

Key.Original: Uh, standby, Watchtower.
Key.Chinese: 喔，請稍待，"守望塔"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，请稍待，"守望塔"。

Key.Original: Truck, Salvo, SITREP.
Key.Chinese: "卡車"，薩爾沃，報告狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡车"，萨尔沃，报告状况。

Key.Original: Watchtower, that's a negative on Warlock. No PID on enemy dead, either. Send extraction.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，這邊沒有發現到"術士"。敵人的屍體中也沒有出現"術士"。準備開始撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，这边没有发现到"术士"。敌人的尸体中也没有出现"术士"。准备开始撤离。

Key.Original: Nothing here, Riker.
Key.Chinese: 這裡什麼都沒有，瑞克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里什么都没有，瑞克。

Key.Original: Nada.
Key.Chinese: 沒東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没东西。

Container.name: 75_Open_Fire
Container.situation: player have started the engagement

Key.Original: Weapons free.
Key.Chinese: 自由開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 自由开火。

Container.name: 70_Hold_Fire
Container.situation: tip for players to hold fire

Key.Original: Wait for it, Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 沉住氣，"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 沉住气，"突袭者2"。

Container.name: 65_Convoy_Spotted
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Grimm;EXC B Truck;
Container.situation: convoy approaching the ambush point

Key.Original: Yup. Got it.
Key.Chinese: 恩。知道了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩。知道了。

Key.Original: Raider 2, standby. We'll be waiting for your go.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，請預備。我們會等待你們的信號。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，请预备。我们会等待你们的信号。

Key.Original: Heads up, convoy sighted. Couple technicals, nothing fancy.
Key.Chinese: 注意，已發現車隊。有兩輛武裝越野車，沒什麼特別的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意，已发现车队。有两辆武装越野车，没什么特别的。

Key.Original: Grimm, get set to mop up anything Raider 2 might miss.
Key.Chinese: 格里姆，你也準備好清掉任何"突襲者2"的漏網之魚。
Key.Chinesesimp: 格里姆，你也准备好清掉任何"突袭者2"的漏网之鱼。

Container.name: 60_Charge_Set
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Grimm;
Container.situation: players are notified the convoy is moving

Key.Original: All Raider callsigns, SITREP, that convoy's stepping off now. Inbound to your position in figures few. Over.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫所有突襲者單位，狀況回報，那個車隊開始移動了。過幾分鐘就會到達你們那邊了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼叫所有突袭者单位，状况回报，那个车队开始移动了。过几分钟就会到达你们那边了。完毕。

Key.Original: Charge in place. Climbing into my hidey-hole. Raider 2's getting set up now.
Key.Chinese: 炸藥設好了。正在躲到我的窩裡面。"突襲者2"他們正在設置中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 炸药设好了。正在躲到我的窝里面。"突袭者2"他们正在设置中。

Key.Original: Roger your last, Watchtower.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守望塔"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守望塔"。

Key.Original: Grimm, how you doing?
Key.Chinese: 格里姆，你那邊怎樣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 格里姆，你那边怎样？

Key.Original: Alright. We're good to go on our end.
Key.Chinese: 很好。我們也會過去到我們的位置等待。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。我们也会过去到我们的位置等待。

Key.Original: Raider 2, make sure you're out of sight before that convoy shows up. We'll keep you posted. Out.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，請確保你們不要被車隊給發現了。我們會為你們進行偵察。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，请确保你们不要被车队给发现了。我们会为你们进行侦察。通话完毕。

Container.name: 35_Joke_1
Container.situation: waiting for the convoy nonsense

Key.Original: Cut the crap, Salvo.
Key.Chinese: 不要講廢話，薩爾沃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要讲废话，萨尔沃。

Key.Original: Mary had a little lamb...
Key.Chinese: 瑪莉有隻小羊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 玛莉有只小羊...

Key.Original: ... She also had a duck...
Key.Chinese: ...她還有一隻鴨子...
Key.Chinesesimp: ...她还有一只鸭子...

Key.Original: She put em on the mantlepiece to see if they would -
Key.Chinese: 她把他們放到壁爐裡來看看他們會不會-
Key.Chinesesimp: 她把他们放到壁炉里来看看他们会不会-

Key.Original: To see if they would.
Key.Chinese: 看看他們會不會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看看他们会不会。

Key.Original: ... Fall off.
Key.Chinese: ...我閉嘴。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...我闭嘴。

Container.name: 30_Plan
Container.situation: clearer briefing about the convoy ambush

Key.Original: Raider 2, I'm gonna plant a charge just ahead of the bridge. That's our stop line.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，我會放置一些炸藥在橋的前面。那是我們的停止線。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，我会放置一些炸药在桥的前面。那是我们的停止线。

Key.Original: Feel free to throw down your own stuff. Just keep it low profile, yeah? And hit the convoy before they reach the stop line.
Key.Chinese: 你們可以在前面點隨意放置炸藥。但請保持低調，記得囉?然後記得在車隊碰到停止線之前就攻擊他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们可以在前面点随意放置炸药。但请保持低调，记得啰？然后记得在车队碰到停止线之前就攻击他们。

Key.Original: Remember: it's on your go. Riker, Truck and Salvo will box them in once you've set things off.
Key.Chinese: 記住:由你們來決定時機。瑞克，"卡車"和薩爾沃會在你們引爆炸藥後包圍他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 记住：由你们来决定时机。瑞克，"卡车"和萨尔沃会在你们引爆炸药后包围他们。

Container.name: 25_Briefing
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Grimm;EXC B Salvo;EXC B Truck;
Container.situation: players are given information in some temple ruins

Key.Original: Raider 1, Watchtower. No movement yet. We'll update when they roll out. Over.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，這裡是"守望塔"。他們還沒有移動。他們移動的時候我們會再另行通知。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，这里是"守望塔"。他们还没有移动。他们移动的时候我们会再另行通知。完毕。

Key.Original: Yup.
Key.Chinese: 恩。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩。

Key.Original: Alright, listen in.
Key.Chinese: 好的，聽著。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，听着。

Key.Original: Militia's set on killing civvies. We're gonna stop em.
Key.Chinese: 暴徒他們準備攻擊平民。而我們要阻止他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 暴徒准备攻击平民。而我们要阻止他们。

Key.Original: And Warlock?
Key.Chinese: 那"術士"呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那"术士"呢？

Key.Original: Got it. Moving.
Key.Chinese: 知道了。開始移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了。开始移动。

Key.Original: If he's here, we'll snatch him.
Key.Chinese: 假如他在這的話，我們就幹掉他。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如他在这的话，我们就干掉他。

Key.Original: Watchtower, Raider 1. Send SITREP on Syndikat convoy, over?
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，這裡是"突襲者1"。請回報辛迪加車隊的狀況，完畢?
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，这里是"突袭者1"。请回报辛迪加车队的状况，完毕？

Key.Original: Roger, Watchtower. Raider 1 out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守望塔"。"突襲者1"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守望塔"。"突袭者1"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Truck, Salvo, you're with me.
Key.Chinese: "卡車"，薩爾沃，你們跟著我。
Key.Chinesesimp: "卡车"，萨尔沃，你们跟着我。

Key.Original: Grimm, you there?
Key.Chinese: 格里姆，你在嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 格里姆，你在吗？

Key.Original: Take Raider 2 and post on the road. I'll move east with Truck and Salvo to cut their egress.
Key.Chinese: 你帶著"突襲者2"他們去路上設伏。我會跟著"卡車"與薩爾沃前往東邊截斷他們的退路。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你带着"突袭者2"他们去路上设伏。我会跟着"卡车"与萨尔沃前往东边截断他们的退路。

Key.Original: Raider 2, Truck was kind enough to lug those explosives up the hill just for you. Take what you need. Meet Grimm at the snap-ambush.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，"卡車"已經好心幫你們把這箱炸藥給拖上來山上了。你們要什麼就拿吧。然後去與格里姆會合並設置伏擊點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，"卡车"已经好心帮你们把这箱炸药给拖上来山上了。你们要什么就拿吧。然后去与格里姆会合并设置伏击点。

Key.Original: Remember, folks, there's a bridge over there. Leave it standing. Locals have it hard enough as it is - we're here to help, not hinder.
Key.Chinese: 記住了大夥，那邊有一座橋。不要把他炸斷了。當地人很需要它-我們是來幫助的，不是來搞破壞的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 记住了大伙，那边有一座桥。不要把他炸断了。当地人很需要它—我们是来帮助的，不是来搞破坏的。

Container.name: 23_LOL
Container.situation: sal is looking at an ugly statue. separated in case va does a horrible job.

Key.Original: Hey, Truck.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，"卡車"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，"卡车"。

Key.Original: He kinda looks like you.
Key.Chinese: 他長得有點像你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他长得有点像你。

Key.Original: What?
Key.Chinese: 幹嘛?
Key.Chinesesimp: 干嘛？

Key.Original: Fuck off, Sal.
Key.Chinese: 去你的，薩爾沃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去你的，萨尔沃。

Container.name: 20_No_Touch
Container.situation: support team member tells players not to touch their quadbikes. (randomised sentence?)

Key.Original: Watch it. Riker's gonna be pissed if you scratch up his quad.
Key.Chinese: 小心。如果你摸了瑞克的四輪摩托車他一定會氣瘋了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心。如果你摸了瑞克的四轮摩托车他一定会气疯了。

Key.Original: Easy. The sergeant'll kick your ass for touching his quad.
Key.Chinese: 當心點。如果你摸了中士的四輪摩托車他一定會踹你屁股的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当心点。如果你摸了中士的四轮摩托车他一定会踹你屁股的。

Container.name: 15_Continue
Container.situation: players pass the support team member standing guard

Key.Original: Rest of the guys are just up ahead, Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 其他人都在前面，"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 其他人都在前面，"突袭者2"。

Container.name: 125_Weapons_Destroyed
Container.participants: EXC B SOF Liaison;EXC B CTRG Commander;
Container.situation: nato liaison confirms drone strike

Key.Original: Roger that, Northstar Actual, thanks for the assist.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"北極星"指揮，感謝你的協助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"北极星"指挥，感谢你的协助。

Key.Original: Raider callsigns, fine work out there. RTB for debrief.
Key.Chinese: 突襲者小隊，幹的好。請返回基地進行匯報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突袭者小队，干的好。请返回基地进行汇报。

Key.Original: All callsigns, be advised, target destroyed.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫所有單位，請注意，目標已摧毀。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼叫所有单位，请注意，目标已摧毁。

Container.name: 120_UAV_Fired
Container.situation: nato liaison updates on drone strike

Key.Original: Missile off the rail.
Key.Chinese: 飛彈發射。
Key.Chinesesimp: 导弹发射。

Container.name: 115_UAV_Targeting
Container.situation: nato liaison introduces drone strike

Key.Original: Greyhawk on site. Going into loiter and hunt.
Key.Chinese: "灰鷹"無人機已抵達。準備擊毀目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: "灰鹰"无人机已抵达。准备击毁目标。

Container.name: 110_Helicopter_Ready
Container.situation: nato liaison introduces the extraction

Key.Original: This is Northstar Actual. Rotary asset on standby. Callsign Angel 3-1.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"北極星"指揮。直升機已在待命。呼號為"天使3-1"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"北极星"指挥。直升机已在待命。呼号为"天使3-1"。

Key.Original: Waiting on you, Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 正在等待你們，"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在等待你们，"突袭者2"。

Container.name: 10_Watch_Fire
Container.situation: players approach the rendezvous

Key.Original: Check fire around the temple, Raider 2.
Key.Chinese: 在寺廟附近請小心誤擊，"突襲者2"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在寺庙附近请小心误击，"突袭者2"。

Container.name: 107_ChineseForeshadow
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B Grimm;EXC B Truck;EXC B Salvo;
Container.situation: evaluating the weapons cache as the players move out

Key.Original: It's documented on Raider 2's live-feed. We'll know more soon enough.
Key.Chinese: 我們剛剛只能透過"突襲者2"的實況來判斷。我們之後肯定會知道更多訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们刚刚只能通过"突袭者2"的实况来判断。我们之后肯定会知道更多信息。

Key.Original: Switch on. We need to move to the secondary exfil.
Key.Chinese: 進入狀況。我們必須移動到第二撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入状况。我们必须移动到第二撤离点。

Key.Original: See the markings on those crates? Looked Chinese to me.
Key.Chinese: 你們有看到箱子上那些標記嗎?我看起來像是中文字。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们有看到箱子上那些标记吗？我看起来像是中文字。

Key.Original: Hardly surprising. Black market's saturated with their shit.
Key.Chinese: 不足為奇。黑市中充滿了各種商品。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不足为奇。黑市中充满了各种商品。

Key.Original: That stuff looked high quality, Salvo. Maybe even CSAT. And higher ain't exactly waiting around to nuke it from orbit.
Key.Chinese: 但那些裝備看起來挺高級的，薩爾沃。搞不好廣協同盟他們還有核武可以從軌道上攻擊地面呢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但那些装备看起来挺高级的，萨尔沃。搞不好广协他们还有核武可以从轨道上攻击地面呢。

Container.name: 105_Support_Plan
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B CTRG Commander;
Container.situation: raider 1 sent to secondary extraction

Key.Original: Raider 1, move to secondary exfil. Extraction helo will pick you up there. Over.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，請前往第二撤離點。撤離直升機會去那邊接你們。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，请前往第二撤离点。撤离直升机会去那边接你们。完毕。

Key.Original: Got it, Watchtower, out to you.
Key.Chinese: 知道了，"守望塔"，對你通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了，"守望塔"，对你通话完毕。

Key.Original: Raider 2, you heard it. Get your asses down the hill to the extraction. Out.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，你們都聽到了。趕快滾下山去撤離點。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，你们都听到了。赶快滚下山去撤离点。通话完毕。

Container.name: 100_Weapons_Found
Container.participants: EXC B Riker;EXC B CTRG Commander;
Container.situation: players told to get to one extraction

Key.Original: Roger your last. Raider 2, we see your location. Diverting an armed drone to you. Move to ERV. Grid 077-092. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到了。"突襲者2"，我們看到了你們的位置。正在調遣無人機前往你們那邊。請前往撤離位置。座標077-092。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到了。"突袭者2"，我们看到了你们的位置。正在调遣无人机前往你们那边。请前往撤离位置。座标077-092。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Watchtower, Raider 1. Be advised, Raider 2 has destroyed that Syndikat group.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，這裡是"突襲者1"。請注意，"突襲者2"已經殲滅了辛迪加的小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，这里是"突袭者1"。请注意，"突袭者2"已经歼灭了辛迪加的小队。

Key.Original: Their feed shows a large weapons cache, Watchtower. Awaiting further tasking. Over.
Key.Chinese: 由他們的畫面顯示出有許多的武器箱在那裡，"守望塔"。正在等待更進一步的命令。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 由他们的画面显示出有许多的武器箱在那里，"守望塔"。正在等待更进一步的命令。完毕。

Container.name: 05_Convoy_Update
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;
Container.situation: command informs everyone of the convoy's status

Key.Original: Raider callsigns, be advised, we're seeing increased activity in Tanouka.
Key.Chinese: 突襲者小隊，請注意，我們發現到塔諾卡的活動開始增加。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突袭者小队，请注意，我们发现到塔诺卡的活动开始增加。

Key.Original: We suspect the Syndikat convoy's gearing up to leave. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們推測應該是辛迪加的車隊要準備出發了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们推测应该是辛迪加的车队要准备出发了。完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that, Watchtower, out to you.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守望塔"，對你通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守望塔"，对你通话完毕。

Key.Original: Raider 2, get your ass moving, double.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"，加緊速度趕快過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"，加紧速度赶快过来。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B Riker;
Container.situation: mission opens with commander checking on support lead

Key.Original: Raider 1, we're patched into your helmet-cam. Over.
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"，我們正在監看你們的頭盔攝影機。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"，我们正在监看你们的头盔摄影机。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood. Raider 2, move up to the marked RV point. You're in Syndikat-controlled territory. Stay switched on. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。"突襲者2"，請前往標記的會合點。你們正身處在辛迪加掌控的領土中。保持警覺。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。"突袭者2"，请前往标记的会合点。你们正身处在辛迪加掌控的领土中。保持警觉。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Roger, Watchtower. Glad to have you with us.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"守望塔"。很高興你與我們在一起。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"守望塔"。很高兴你与我们在一起。

Key.Original: SITREP, we've secured the RV. Spotted some minor movement on our way up here. Waiting on Raider 2. Over.
Key.Chinese: 狀況回報，我們已經肅清了會合點。在我們來這裡的路上有發現一些小部隊。現在正在等待"突襲者2"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 状况回报，我们已经肃清了会合点。在我们来这里的路上有发现一些小部队。现在正在等待"突袭者2"。完毕。

Key.Original: Watchtower
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"

Key.Original: 24 Hours before Keystone Extraction
Key.Chinese: "基石"撤離行動前24小時
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"撤离行动前24小时

Key.Original:
Following our assault on Syndikat's supply lines, Blue Cap informed us that Warlock has called a meeting of Syndikat leadership at a %1safehouse%2 near the village of %3Namuvaka%2. This presents us with an opportunity we can't afford to pass up.

The location is heavily guarded and lies within Syndikat territory, so expect a sizable enemy presence.

We have the element of surprise, so let's use it. If we're quick, we'll be able to catch them off guard.
Key.Chinese:
在我們打擊完辛迪加的補給線後，藍帽跟我們表明"術士"他即將與其他部下一起在%3那慕瓦卡%2附近村莊裡的%1安全屋%2開會。這對我們來說是個大好機會。

該地為重兵把守的辛迪加領土，所以預期會遭遇到很多敵人。

我們有著偷襲的優勢，讓我們來好好利用它。假如我們手腳夠快的話，便能在他們有所反應之前就逮到他們。
Key.Chinesesimp:
在我们打击完辛迪加的补给线后，蓝帽跟我们表明"术士"他即将与其他部下一起在%3那慕瓦卡%2附近村庄里的%1安全屋%2开会。这对我们来说是个大好机会。

该地为重兵把守的辛迪加领土，所以预期会遭遇到很多敌人。

我们有着偷袭的优势，让我们来好好利用它。假如我们手脚够快的话，便能在他们有所反应之前就逮到他们。

Key.Original: 00:00 Hours
Monday, August 13th, 2035
Key.Chinese: 2035年，8月13日，星期一
Key.Chinesesimp: 2035年，8月13日，星期一

Key.Original: Western Tanoa, near the target area
Key.Chinese: Tanoa西部，靠近目標區
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚西部，靠近目标区

Key.Original:
%1Raider 1%2 - Lead element.
%3Raider 2%2 - Your team.
Watchtower - CTRG Headquarters.
Key.Chinese:
%1"突襲者1"%2-領導小隊。
%3"突襲者2"%2-你的小隊。
"守望塔"-戰研小組指揮部。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%1"突袭者1"%2-指挥分队。
%3"突袭者2"%2-你的小组。
"守望塔"-战研大队指挥部。

Key.Original: Target Building
Key.Chinese: 目標建築
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标建筑

Key.Original: Near Forest
Key.Chinese: 靠近森林
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近森林

Key.Original: Insertion point
Key.Chinese: 進入點
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入点

Key.Original: Raider 2
Key.Chinese: "突襲者2"
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者2"

Key.Original: Raider 1
Key.Chinese: "突襲者1"
Key.Chinesesimp: "突袭者1"

Key.Original: Recently acquired intel sends Group 15 on a mission to kill or capture Warlock.
Key.Chinese: 根據最新的情報，15分隊將前往擊殺或逮捕"術士"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据最新的情报，15大队将前往击杀或逮捕"术士"。

Key.Original: 04 Heart of Darkness
Key.Chinese: 04黑暗之心
Key.Chinesesimp: 04 黑暗之心

Key.Original:
You will be inserted at %1an LZ%2 south of %3the target area%2. Raider 1 will insert %4to the north-west%2 and establish %5a blocking position%2 along the north-east road.

You are to move on %6the target building%2 and capture Warlock. Once he is in custody, you are to proceed to %7the primary exfil point%2 and await extraction.
Key.Chinese:
你們將從%3目標區%2的南方%1降落點%2進入戰區。"突襲者1"將前往%4西北方%2並沿著東北方道路建立起%5阻擋位置%2。

你們將前往%6目標建築%2逮捕"術士"。當你們逮到他以後，你們就前往%7第一撤離點%2並等待撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp:
你们将从%3目标区%2的南方%1降落点%2进入战区。"突袭者1"将前往%4西北方%2并沿着东北方道路建立起%5阻滞阵地%2。

你们将前往%6目标建筑%2逮捕"术士"。当你们逮到他以后，你们就前往%7第一撤离点%2并等待撤离。

Key.Original: Insertion point
Key.Chinese: 進入點
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入点

Key.Original: EXTRACT
Key.Chinese: 撤離點
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离点

Key.Original: Extract
Key.Chinese: 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离

Key.Original: Extract from the AO
Key.Chinese: 撤離戰區
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离战区

Key.Original:
1. Clear the %1target area%2.
2. Capture %3Warlock%2.
3. Move to %4primary exfil%2.
Key.Chinese:
1. 肅清%1目標區%2。
2.逮捕%3"術士"%2.
3.前往%4第一撤離點%2。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 肃清%1目标区%2。
2.逮捕%3"术士"%2.
3.前往%4第一撤离点%2。

Key.Original: Despite being lured into a trap, you managed to extract safely from the AO. Whoever these CSAT operatives are, it's likely we haven't seen the last of them
Key.Chinese: 儘管我們被誘入了陷阱，但你們仍成功且安全的撤離出戰場。不管這些廣協同盟部隊到底是誰，我們勢必都得遭遇到一種全新的挑戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管我们被诱入了陷阱，但你们仍成功且安全的撤离出战场。不管这些广协部队到底是谁，我们势必都得遭遇到一种全新的挑战。

Key.Original: DEFEND
Key.Chinese: 防守
Key.Chinesesimp: 防守

Key.Original: Defend Yourself
Key.Chinese: 保護你自己
Key.Chinesesimp: 保护你自己

Key.Original: Neutralize all hostiles.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭所有敌人。

Key.Original: CAPTURE
Key.Chinese: 逮捕
Key.Chinesesimp: 逮捕

Key.Original: Capture Warlock
Key.Chinese: 逮捕"術士"
Key.Chinesesimp: 逮捕"术士"

Key.Original: Clear the %2target area%1 and capture %3Warlock%1.
Key.Chinese: 肅清%2目標區%1並逮捕%3"術士"%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清%2目标区%1并逮捕%3"术士"%1。

Key.Original: Blocking Position
Key.Chinese: 阻擋位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 阻挡位置

Container.name: f05_Viper_Syndikat
Container.situation: syndikat and viper talking to each other in english

Key.Original: I don't know what you're trying to tell me. We did everything you asked.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道你想試著告訴我些什麼。我們照著你們所有的要求都做了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道你想试着告诉我些什么。我们照着你们所有的要求都做了。

Key.Original: What did you expect? That we could manage them alone?
Key.Chinese: 你們期待著什麼?讓我們單獨討論並解決它?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们期待什么？让我们自己收拾它？

Key.Original: It was your men who failed!
Key.Chinese: 那是你的人馬失敗了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是你的人失败了！

Key.Original: Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 靠!
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠！

Key.Original: We gave you instructions. You failed to follow them.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經給了你們指示。但你們卻沒有照著做。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经给了你们指示。但你们却没有照着做。

Key.Original: You do not want to die today. Lower your weapon.
Key.Chinese: 你今天並不用死。放下你的武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你今天并不用死。放下你的武器。

Key.Original: Good. Stand down, Lieutenant.
Key.Chinese: 很好。解除戒備，中尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。解除戒备，中尉。

Container.name: f01_Viper_Reveal
Container.situation: chinese dialogue that miller overhears from viper operators while broadcasting his live feed

Key.Original: Hold here.
Key.Chinese: 停住。
Key.Chinesesimp: 停住。

Key.Original: Enemy agents in sight, Commander. Ready to engage.
Key.Chinese: 已經能看到敵人了，指揮官。準備好進行交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已经能看到敌人了，指挥官。准备好进行交战。

Key.Original: Yes, sir. Both teams are surrounded.
Key.Chinese: 是的，長官。兩隊都已經被包圍了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，长官。两队都已经被包围了。

Key.Original: Understood, Commander. They will not escape. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，指揮官。他們是跑不掉的。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，指挥官。他们是跑不掉的。通话完毕。

Container.name: 70_End
Container.participants: EXC B SOF Liaison;EXC B CTRG Commander;

Key.Original: It was unrelated to the Task Force. Not your concern.
Key.Chinese: 這與特遣隊無關。你並不需要關心這個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这与特遣队无关。你并不需要关心这个。

Key.Original: Hold it there. Play that back.
Key.Chinese: 這邊暫停下。再重播一次。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这边暂停下。再重播一次。

Key.Original: You haven't told me everything, have you?
Key.Chinese: 你並沒有告訴我全部的事情，是嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你并没有告诉我全部的事情，是吗？

Key.Original: Looks like you just made it my concern, Major.
Key.Chinese: 但看起來你已經引起我的關心了，少校。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但看起来你已经引起我的关心了，少校。

Container.name: x10_Waiting
Container.situation: players are taking too long to get to the exfil

Key.Original: Hurry the fuck up, guys.
Key.Chinese: 他媽的給我快點，大伙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的给我快点，大伙。

Container.name: x05_Spotted
Container.situation: players were less than careful

Key.Original: Watchtower, SITREP, Raider 2's in contact with the enemy now, out.
Key.Chinese: "守望塔"，狀況回報，"突襲者2"正與敵人交戰中，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "守望塔"，状况回报，"突袭者2"正与敌人交战中，通话完毕。

Container.name: x01_Fire
Container.situation: players enter a small building with a fireplace

Key.Original: An open flame in a wooden house.
Key.Chinese: 把火堆生在木造屋子裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把火堆生在木造屋子里。

Key.Original: That's smart.
Key.Chinese: 這可真聰明啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这可真聪明啊。

Container.name: b35_Connect
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: We're talking about inner-circle leadership here. Ex-paramilitary types. They'll spook easy.
Key.Chinese: 我們將在這邊逮捕他們的高層。特戰行動類型。保持潛行會比較好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将在这边逮捕他们的高层。特战行动类型。保持潜行会比较好。

Key.Original: A small strike team's got a better chance of getting the job done. We'll get in and out with our boats.
Key.Chinese: 一支小型突擊隊會比較勝任這次任務。我們將使用我們自己的載具來進出。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一支小型突击队会比较胜任这次任务。我们将使用我们自己的载具来进出。

Key.Original: What about NATO support?
Key.Chinese: 那需要北約的支援嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那需要北约的支援吗？

Key.Original: I'll connect the feed.
Key.Chinese: 讓我來開啟實況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我来开启实况。

Key.Original: Your call.
Key.Chinese: 照你的決定吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你决定吧。

Container.name: b30_Situation_4
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: The compound's here ... east of this remote village.
Key.Chinese: 就這群建築...偏遠村莊的東方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就这群建筑...偏远村庄的东方。

Key.Original: We have assets en route to the area now. Their insertion should be ... here.
Key.Chinese: 我們的單位正在前往的路上了。他們的進入點應該就在...這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的单位正在前往的路上了。他们的进入点应该就在...这里。

Key.Original: This is a snatch and grab.
Key.Chinese: 這是個逮捕並撤離的任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是个逮捕并撤离的任务。

Key.Original: What's the execution?
Key.Chinese: 任務計劃呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务计划呢？

Key.Original: Sounds simple.
Key.Chinese: 聽起來頗簡單。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来很简单。

Container.name: b25_Situation_3
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: Yeah. Many demand a response. They want to hit the multinationals.
Key.Chinese: 是阿。許多人都向他提出請求。他們想要攻擊不同的企業。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。许多人想让他做出回应。他们想要攻击跨国企业。

Key.Original: Sure, and the rest. Everyone's a target.
Key.Chinese: 當然，還有其他人。每個人都是他們的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，还有其他人。每个人都是他们的目标。

Key.Original: Warlock must have a lot on his plate.
Key.Chinese: "術士"在他的地盤上肯定還握有很多。
Key.Chinesesimp: "术士"在他的地盘上肯定还握有很多。

Key.Original: Not exactly, but intel points to a high-level meet.
Key.Chinese: 不完全有，但情報指出他們即將有一場高峰會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不完全有，但情报指出他们即将有一场高层会议。

Key.Original: Who, Daltgreen?
Key.Chinese: 誰，達特格林?
Key.Chinesesimp: 谁，达特格林？

Key.Original: Looks like it. 'Blue Cap' provided a location.
Key.Chinese: 看起來是的。'藍帽'向我們提供了開會地點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看起来是的。'蓝帽'向我们提供了开会地点。

Key.Original: Anything concrete?
Key.Chinese: 有任何具體的事實嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有任何具体的事实吗？

Key.Original: One sec.
Key.Chinese: 稍等下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 稍等下。

Key.Original: Warlock?
Key.Chinese: "術士"辦的?
Key.Chinesesimp: "术士"办的？

Key.Original: Can you bring it up?
Key.Chinese: 你能指出位置嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你能指出位置吗？

Container.name: b20_Situation_2
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: So, as you can see, traffic's increased massively.
Key.Chinese: 恩，就像你所見到的，交通流量開始大幅提升。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，就像你所见到的，通信流量开始大幅提升。

Key.Original: We've been filtering out any actionable intel, and got a few decent hits.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經過濾掉許多多餘的情報，並只留下幾個有用的而已。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经过滤掉许多多余的情报，并发现了几个有价值的。

Key.Original: Mostly confirmed our previous knowledge. Very dispersed structure.
Key.Chinese: 大部分都是證實了我們以前的情報。他們組織非常鬆散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大部分都是证实了我们以前的情报。他们组织非常松散。

Key.Original: Lot of people expecting hardware deliveries. Lot of egos to smooth over now.
Key.Chinese: 許多人都還在期待著接收那些新裝備。他們都是懷有私心的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 许多人都还在期待着接收那些新装备。他们都是怀有私心的。

Key.Original: Details?
Key.Chinese: 細節呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 细节呢？

Container.name: b15_Situation_1
Container.participants: EXC B CTRG Commander;EXC B SOF Liaison;
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: Well, we definitely kicked the hornet's nest.
Key.Chinese: 這個嗎，我們肯定已經捅到蜂窩了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个吗，我们肯定已经捅到蜂窝了。

Key.Original: Oh, sure. I guess we were just taken aback by how many of those little fuckers came crawling out.
Key.Chinese: 恩，當然。我想我只是被他們跑出來的混蛋數量所嚇到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，当然。我想我只是被他们跑出来的混蛋数量所吓到。

Key.Original: Wasn't that the point?
Key.Chinese: 這不就是我們想要的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这不就是我们想要的吗？

Key.Original: Heh.
Key.Chinese: 嘿。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。

Container.name: b10_Interrupt
Container.situation: commanders introduction

Key.Original: Okay, let's get started. What's the latest?
Key.Chinese: 好的，讓我們開始吧。有什麼最新消息嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，让我们开始吧。有什么最新消息吗？

Container.name: b05_TanoaReport_2
Container.situation: extra background if there is time.
